original.value: Rocket Launcher RLGS-100

translation.value: 火箭发射器 RLGS-1000

original.value: Sharp-sighted rocket Launcher . Highly effective against armored units and large clusters of non-armored enemies.

translation.value: 精准的火箭发射器。能够高效打击装甲单位和大群非装甲敌人。

original.value: Tavor TAR-21

translation.value: Tavor TAR-21

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Tavor TAR-21 is an Israeli bullpup assault rifle chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition with a selective fire system. It is the standard issued weapon of the Israeli infantry.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n这款无托型突击步枪由以色列生产，是以色列步兵的标准武器。这件武器使用 5.56x45 毫米北约弹，配备有一个快慢机来选择射击模式。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nM4A1 是在尤金·斯通纳设计制造的 AR-15 的基础上研制的。这个枪族由 R16 发展而来。

original.value: AUG A3

translation.value: AUG A3

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe AUG A3 is an Austrian bullpup 5.56mm assault rifle, designed in the early 1970s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG (formerly Steyr-Daimler-Puch).

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n这件武器由斯泰尔-曼利夏武器有限公司（前身为）于 1970 年代早期设计的。它是一款奥地利生产的无托型 5.56 毫米突击步枪。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n这款 AK-74M 步枪的改型被俄罗斯的数个特种执法部门所使用。相比使用 5.45 毫米弹药的枪械，他们更乐意使用发射 7.62 毫米弹药，阻滞能力更为优秀的 АK-103。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe XM8 was the U.S. military designation for a lightweight assault rifle system under development by the United States Army from the late 1990s to early 2000s.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n美国陆军曾使用过这把于 1990 年代末至 2000 年代初研制的轻量化突击武器。

original.value: H&K G36K

translation.value: H&K G36K

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe G36K is a German made assault rifle manufactured by Heckler and Koch. It is a variant of the H&K G36. K stands for Kurz, which means short in German.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n这把由德国黑克勒&科赫公司制造的突击步枪是 H&K G36 的一个改型。武器名称中的字母 K 代表德语单词 “ Kurz ”，意思是“短的”。

original.value: CALICO M955A

translation.value: Calico M955A

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe CALICO M955A is a blowback-operated full auto dynamic purpose rifle chambered in .22 LR or 9x19mm Parabellum, manufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems in Hillsboro, Oregon, USA.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。 。后坐力： 中等\n位于美国俄勒冈州希尔斯伯勒的 Calico 轻武器系统公司生产的 Calico M955A 是一款枪机后坐式全自动步枪。

original.value: SIG 551

translation.value: SIG 551

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe SG 551 has a short pattern 363 mm (14.3 in) barrel, gas tube and piston compared to the SG 550. The SG 551 series rifles have a 466 mm (18.3 in) long sight radius. The handguards were also changed and the bipod removed.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n改进过的护木和被去掉的两脚架是 SIG 551 区别于 SIG 550 的两个特征。它有一根 363 毫米的短版枪管，及与之相配套的导气管与活塞。该枪的瞄准基线长 466 毫米 （合 18.3 英寸）。

original.value: Daewoo K2

translation.value: Daewoo K2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe K2 is an assault rifle of the Republic of Korea Armed Forces, manufactured by S&T Daewoo. It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n由 S&T Daewoo 公司生产的 Daewoo K2 是大韩民国国军的主力突击步枪。该把配备快慢机的突击步枪使用 20 或 30 发弹匣供弹，采用导气式原理，需要抵肩射击。

original.value: FN F2000

translation.value: FN F2000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe FN F2000 is a 5.56x45mm NATO bullpup assault rifle, designed by FN Herstal in Belgium. The F2000 made its debut in March 2001 at the IDEX defense exhibition held in Abu Dhabi, in the United Arab Emirates.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nFN F2000 是北约制无托型突击步枪。这件武器为了便于携带和射击，采用了具有未来风格的设计。而宽大的外形则使它具备对极端情况的耐受性。

original.value: FN SCAR-H

translation.value: FN SCAR-H

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe Special Operations Forces (SOF) Combat Assault Rifle, or SCAR, is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM). The H fires the more powerful 7.62?51mm NATO from a newly designed 20-round magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nFN SCAR-H 是针对美军特战司令部提出的规格而专门设计制造的枪械。

original.value: Gold FN SCAR-H

translation.value: 黄金版 FN SCAR-H

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Golden version of the FN SCAR-H. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Combat Assault Rifle, or SCAR, is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM). The H fires the more powerful 7.62×51mm NATO from a newly designed 20-round magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大 黄金版 FN SCAR-H。 这件武器对改造人有 +50% 伤害增益。 一款为美军特战司令部定制的模块化步枪。FN SCAR-H 使用全新设计的 25 发弹匣，装填威力更强的 7.62*51 毫米子弹。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe M16A4, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nM16A3 现在是美国海军陆战队和某些陆军单位的前线人员的标准配置。它取消了固定式提把和机械瞄具的组合，将其换成了导轨，使这把枪可以同时安装提把和大多数军用或民用瞄准镜或观察设备。

original.value: Gold M16A3 Custom

translation.value: 黄金版 M16A3

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Golden version of the M16A3 Custom. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The M16A3 Custom, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大 黄金版 M16A3。 这件武器对改造人有 +50% 伤害增益。 M16A3 现在是美国海军陆战队和某些陆军单位的前线人员的标准配置。它取消了固定式提把和机械瞄具的组合，将其换成了导轨，使这把枪可以同时安装提把和大多数军用或民用瞄准镜或观察设备。

original.value: Famas F1

translation.value: Famas F1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe FAMAS is a bullpup-styled assault rifle designed and manufactured in France by MAS located in Saint-?tienne, which is now a member of the French government-owned Nexter group. It is the service rifle of the French military.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nFamas F1 是法国设计制造的无托型突击步枪，也是法国陆军的现役步枪。

original.value: Assault rifle 14

translation.value: 突击步枪 14

original.value: Assault rifle 14

translation.value: 突击步枪 14

original.value: Type 97B

translation.value: Type 97B

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nType 97B is a bullpup style military CQB assault rifle manufactured by Arsenal 266. Type 97B is chambered for 5.56 mm NATO instead of the original Chinese 5.8 mm cartridge and has a deep magazine well designed to accept STANAG magazines.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nType 97B 是一款无托型军用 CQB 突击步枪。Type 97B 使用 5.56 毫米北约弹取代了原版的中国产 5.8 毫米弹药，拥有一个设计精良的加深机匣来容纳 STANAG 弹匣。

original.value: Type 97

translation.value: Type 97

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Chinese have constructed an export version, the Type 97, which is similar to the Type 95 in all respects except that it is chambered for 5.56 mm NATO instead of the original Chinese 5.8 mm cartridge and has a deep magazine well, designed to accept STANAG magazines.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nType 97 是 T95 的出口版，填装 5.56 毫米北约弹而不是 T95 的中国产 5.8 毫米弹药。该枪的弹匣经过重新设计后可兼容 STANAG 弹匣。

original.value: Galil AR

translation.value: Galil AR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Galil's design is optimized for operation in arid conditions and is based on the Finnish RK 62. It was selected as the winner of a competition for the Israel Defense Forces and was formally accepted into service in 1972, replacing the FN FAL.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nGalil AR 是在芬兰 RK 62 的基础上研制，为干旱环境中的战斗进行了优化。该枪于 1972 年开始服役，在以色列国防军的竞标中获胜之后取代了 GUL 。

original.value: Assault rifle 18

translation.value: 突击步枪 18

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs.\n Crown version of ACR. It has Increased clip capacity, Improved accuracy and Increased damage.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n这把武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。\n皇冠版 ACR。装弹量更大，精准度更高，伤害也有所提升。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe ACR is abbreviation of Advanced Combat Rifle. It was developed by United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n高级战斗步枪，简称 ACR ，是美国陆军一项耗资 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62?39mm assault rifle, first developed in the USSR by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is also known as a Kalashnikov, an "AK", or in Russian slang, Kalash. Even after six decades the model and its variants remain the most widely used and popular assault rifles in the world because of their durability, low production cost, and ease of use.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口，瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等\n这把枪具有低成本、耐久性好和易操作的特点，即使距离最初设计已有六十多年，它的各种改型及其原始版本依然是世界上使用最为广泛的突击步枪。AK-47 最早在苏联由米哈伊尔·卡拉什尼科夫开发，是一款配备快慢机的导气式 7.62x39 毫米突击步枪。

original.value: Gold AK-47

translation.value: 黄金版 AK-47

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of the AK-47. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62×39mm assault rifle, first developed in the USSR by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is also known as a Kalashnikov, an "AK", or in Russian slang, Kalash. Even after six decades the model and its variants remain the most widely used and popular assault rifles in the world because of their durability, low production cost, and ease of use.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等 黄金版 AK-47。 这件武器对改造人有 +50% 伤害增益。 这把枪具有低成本、耐久性好和易操作的特点，即使距离最初设计已有六十多年，它依然是世界上使用最为广泛的突击步枪。AK-47 最早在苏联由米哈伊尔·卡拉什尼科夫开发，是一款导气式 7.62x39 毫米突击步枪。亲身体验一番，才会明白为什么它是世界上最受欢迎的枪。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\n The AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\n苏联设计的 AS-"VAL" （突击步枪 Garotta）是配有整体抑制器的一把突击步枪。开发于 1980 年代，被不同的俄罗斯和苏联军队，例如雪域特战队、MVD、FSB 和俄军的一些单位所使用。从 1987 年开始它就成为了苏军和克格勃所使用的武器。它可以使用 SP-6 和 SP-5 的 9x39 毫米子弹。

original.value: IMBEL IA2

translation.value: IMBEL IA2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nIA2 突击步枪是为特种部队研发的，用于取代上一型武器。IA2优点众多：威力大，远程射击精准度高，对于极端环境有着很高的耐久性和可靠性。

original.value: Enfield L85A2 Custom

translation.value: Enfield L85A2 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nIt`s a custom 3-burst round British bullpup assault rifle. It has high cyclic rate of fire with minimal recoil. The L85A2 is a revamped version of the L85A1 with improved internal and external components. As a result, these rifles are recognized as reliable, very accurate and easy to use.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n一把可 3 发点射的英式无托型突击步枪。拥有高射速和低后坐力。L85A2 是 L85A1 的改型，配置有更好的内外部组件。因此，这几款步枪也被认为可靠、十分精准并且易于操作。

translation.value: MSBS Radon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nMSBS Radon modular weapon system is an indigenous development of Polish Military Technical Academy (Wojskowa Akademia Techniczna) and Fabryka Broni „Lucznik” – Radom weapons factory. MSBS stands for “Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej” – modular small arms system.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nMSBS Radon 是由波兰军事科技学院开发的模块化武器。MS 代表着 “Modulowy Sytema” - 模块化系统。MSBS Radon 在长点射后依然能够保持易操控的性能，它注定会进入每位有自尊心的步枪手的枪柜。

The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

The Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

Recoil: High\nThe StG 44 (abbreviation of Sturmgewehr 44, "assault rifle 44") is a German assault rifle developed during World War II that was the first of its kind to see major deployment and is considered by many historians to be the first modern assault rifle.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\n德国在二战时研制的 Sturmgewehr 44 （44 式突击步枪）被认为是最早的突击步枪，也是最先大量装备的这类武器。

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nMG240B 是美国海军陆战队单位的现役标准装备，同时也是美国陆军的标准步兵中型机枪。
H&K MG4

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe MG4 is a belt-fed 5.56 mm light machine gun designed and developed by the German company Heckler & Koch. The weapon was developed in the late 1990s and was first seen publicly in September 2001.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n德制 H&K MG4 开发于 90 年代，是一款由黑克勒&科赫公司研制生产的弹链式轻机枪。该枪最早于 2001 年 9 月在公开场合露面。

original.value: Daewoo K3

translation.value: Daewoo K3

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe K3 is a light machine gun resembling the FN Minimi and uses a standard 5.56 mm NATO cartridge. Its greatest advantage is that it is lighter than the M60 and can interchange cartridges with both the K1A and K2.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n由 S&T Daewoo 公司生产的 Daewoo K3 是一款比 M60 更轻的轻机枪，可以与 Daewoo K1A 和 Daewoo K2 互换弹药。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe RPK (Ruchnoy Pulemyot Kalashnikova) is a 7.62x39mm light machine gun of Soviet design, developed by Mikhail Kalashnikov in the late 1950s, parallel with the AKM assault rifle. It was created as part of a program designed to standardize the small arms inventory of the Red Army.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nRPK 是苏联红军装备标准化项目的一部分。这把 7.62x39 毫米轻机枪是苏式设计的标志性产物。

original.value: XM8 LMG

translation.value: XM8 LMG

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe XM8 LMG is special version with notelonger barrel and 100 round dueal drum "Beta C-Mag".

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nXM8 LMG 由美国陆军在 XM8 突击步枪的基础上研制，是一款于 1990 年代末至 2000 年代初制造的轻量化机枪。

original.value: H&K MG36

translation.value: H&K MG36

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe MG36 was a German made light machine gun manufactured by Heckler und Koch. It was proposed as a squad automatic variant of the H&K G36, however it was abandoned after the Bundeswehr withdrew interest in the project. It has a double-drum magazine and a long handguard.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n德制 H&K MG36 是一款装有双鼓型弹鼓和长护木的轻机枪。该枪原计划用作 H&K G36 的班用火力支援型号，但在德国国防军失去了对该项目的兴趣之后就被废弃了。

original.value: M249 Para

translation.value: M249 Para

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nIt's gas operated and air cooled. It has a quick-change barrel, allowing the gunner to rapidly replace an overheated or jammed barrel. A folding bipod is attached near the front of the gun, though an M192 LGM tripod is also available.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nM249 是一款采用了风冷和导气式自动原理的机枪。它的快拆枪管允许射手在枪管过热或卡弹时快速更换枪管。

It has a quick-change barrel, allowing the gunner to rapidly replace an overheated or jammed barrel. A folding bipod is attached near the front of the gun, though an M192 LGM tripod is also available.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等 黄金版 M249 Para。 这件武器对改造人有 +50% 伤害增益。 M249 是一款采用了风冷和导气式自动原理的机枪。它的快拆枪管允许射手在枪管过热或卡弹时快速更换枪管。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium\nThe MG 3 is a German general purpose machine gun chambered for the 7.62x51mm NATO cartridge. The weapon's design is derived from the World War II era MG 42 universal machine gun that fired the 7.92x57mm Mauser round.

Recoil: Low\nOriginally known as the Colt M16 LMG or simply as the Colt LMG (LMG standing for Light Machine Gun in this context), this weapon was developed as a join venture by Colt and Diemaco, a Canadian firm licensed by Colt to produce variants of the M16 family.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n这款轻机枪原先以 M16 LMG （“轻机枪”的缩写）的名字广为人知，它的知名度使其成为轻机枪类武器中最为经典的款式。

original.value: PKP Pecheneg

translation.value: PKP Pecheneg

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe PKP Pecheneg is a Russian machine gun chambered for the 7.62×54mm round. It has great damage, high firing range and good accuracy. It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nPKP Pecheneg 是一款使用 7.62x54 毫米弹药的俄制轻机枪。该枪具有威力大，射程远，射击精准度良好的特点。其自带的可折叠两脚架提高了卧姿射击时的稳定性和远程射击精准度。

It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

original.value: COLT Python Elite

translation.value: COLT Python Elite

translation.value: Calico M950

original.value: Browning High Power

translation.value: 勃朗宁大威力手枪

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Browning High Power is a single-action, 9 mm semi-automatic handgun. It is based on a design by American firearms inventor John Browning, and completed by Dieudonne Saive.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\n勃朗宁大威力手枪也被称为 BHP ，是在美国枪械设计师约翰·勃朗宁的设计基础上开发，由Dieudonne Saive完成的一款手枪。这是一款可靠的单动式 9 毫米半自动手枪。

Recoil: Medium\nThe Steyr M9A1 is a series of semi-automatic pistols developed by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG of Austria for police services and the civilian shooting market. Design work on the new pistol began in the early 1990s and the final product known as the M9.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等\n半自动手枪 Steyr M9A1 是为警察和民用市场开发的一系列型号之一。斯泰尔-曼利夏武器有限公司于 1990 年代初开始了这款新手枪的研发工作。最终的产品就是人们熟知的 M9。

original.value: Beretta M9

translation.value: Beretta M9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Beretta M9, formally Pistol, Semi-automatic, 9mm, M9, is a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol of the United States military adopted in 1985. It is basically a military specification Beretta 92F, later the 92FS.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\n1985 年美国军队将使用 9x19 毫米帕拉贝鲁姆弹的手枪 Beretta M9 改进为它的第一个军用型号 92F ，后来又将其改进为 92F。

original.value: Daewoo K5

translation.value: Daewoo K5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Daewoo K5 is a 9 mm semi-automatic pistol produced by S&T Daewoo of South Korea. It is a compact, lightweight pistol with an unconventional trigger mechanism called "fast action". The frame is composed of an aluminum alloy with a matte finish, while the slide is of blued steel.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\nDaewoo K5 是韩国 S&T Daewoo 公司生产的紧凑型 9 毫米半自动手枪。这款轻量型手枪有一个独特的“快动”扳机结构。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle, Scope. Recoil: Medium\nDesigned to meet, and exceed, rigorous military standards, the P226 Combat performs like no other 9mm available.Internal parts and controls are phosphated for extreme corrosion resistance and reduced friction while the barrel is hard chromed which easily passes the military’s accuracy requirements. The SIG Sauer P226 and its variants are in service with numerous law enforcement and military organizations worldwide.

Designed to meet, and exceed, rigorous military standards, the P226 Combat performs like no other 9mm available.Internal parts and controls are phosphated for extreme corrosion resistance and reduced friction while the barrel is hard chromed which easily passes the military’s accuracy requirements. The SIG Sauer P226 and its variants are in service with numerous law enforcement and military organizations worldwide.

translation.value: Beretta M93R

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nBeretta M93R It's a n automatic pistol with Burst firemode and 20-rounds magazie. This special purpose sidearm was intended for police and military forces who may require improved firepower in compact weapon during the close-quarter combat.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\n为警察和军队开发的 Beretta M9 是一款特种用途手枪，具有短点射模式并配备 20 发弹匣。相比其他紧凑型武器，这款自动手枪能在近距离战斗中提供更强的火力。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\nR1911 作为美国军队的标配手枪参加了两次世界大战、朝鲜战争和越南战争。该枪的改进型被美国军队采用之后作为一件功勋卓著的武器一直服役到 1980 年代中期。

original.value: Glock 18C

translation.value: Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 大\nGlock 18C 是一款全自动手枪，位于底部的拉杆式快慢机可以使它进行全自动射击。该枪是 Glock 17 的改型，应奥地利反恐单位的要求而开发。

original.value: FN Five-seveN

translation.value: FN Five Seven

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe FN Five-seven, trademarked as the Five-seveN, is a semi-automatic pistol designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. The pistol is named for its 5.7-mm (.224 in) bullet diameter, and the trademark capitalization style is intended to emphasize the manufacturer's initials—FN (Fabrique Nationale of Herstal).

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等\n这款半自动手枪因其使用的弹药口径为 5.7 毫米（.244 英寸）而得名。它的全称是 FN Five-seveN，既 5.7 毫米手枪。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe QSZ-92 Services Pistol is a semi-automatic pistol designed by Norinco and it is in limited service in the People's Liberation Army since the late 1990s.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\nQSZ-92 军用手枪是一款半自动手枪，于 1990 年代后期投入使用。

original.value: Nagant M1895

translation.value: Nagant M1895

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Nagant M1895 Revolver is a seven-shot, gas-seal revolver designed and produced by Belgian industrialist L?on Nagant for the Russian Empire. The M1895 revolver was used extensively by the Russian Imperial Army and later by the Soviet Union after the Russian Revolution. In Russian service, it was known for its extreme sturdiness and ability to withstand abuse. As one former Imperial Russian officer stated, "if anything went wrong with the M1895, you could fix it with a hammer"

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等\nNagant M1895 曾被沙俄陆军以及十月革命后的苏联大量装备，以其无与伦比的坚固程度和对暴力使用的耐受性闻名于世。这把七发弹容的气密式左轮由法国工业家多米尼克·米歇尔为俄罗斯帝国研制制造。一位前帝国军官曾经说过，“如果 Nagant M1895 出了什么问题，用一把榔头就能修好”。

original.value: RHINO 60DS

translation.value: Rhino 60 DS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Chiappa Rhino is a revolver produced by Chiappa Firearms of Italy.The new Chiappa Rhino has revolutionized the revolver with a patented design that tames the prehistoric characteristic that most revolvers possess. It is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nRhino 60 DS 的专利设计给左轮手枪带来了一场革命。位于该枪底部的空腔是自发明以来大多数左轮手枪都不曾有过的设计。枪的重心因此降低，从而减少了后坐力和枪口的上跳。

original.value: Mateba Autorevolver

translation.value: Mateba Autorevolver

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: High\nThe Mateba Model 6 Unica (often known simply as the Mateba or the Mateba Autorevolver) is a semi-automatic revolver, one of only a few of this type ever produced. It was developed in Italy and sold by the Mateba company.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\n这款意大利研制的半自动左轮手枪总共只生产了很少的数量。

original.value: MP-443 Grach

translation.value: MP-443 Grach

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThis handgun was developed under designation "Grach" in response to Russian military trials, which began in 1993. In 2003, it was adopted as a standard sidearm for all branches of Russian military and law enforcement, alongside Makarov PM, GSh-18, and SPS. It is chambered for the high-powered 9x19mm 7N21 cartridge, the Russian version of 9mm NATO, loaded to comparable pressure specifications. The 7N21 features an armour-piercing bullet with a tempered steel core.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\nMP-443 Grach 使用俄罗斯版的 9 毫米北约弹，这种穿甲弹使用回火钢核心。它已被用作俄罗斯所有军队以及执法单位的标准副武器。

original.value: Walther P99

translation.value: Walther P99

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThis semi-automatic pistol is widely used as a duty pistol for law enforcement all over the world because of high quality, great hip accuracy and original design. It has a lot of pros: double-action trigger, puddle-style magazine release for both hands, manual decocker and interchangeable backstraps.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\n这款半自动手枪因其高品质、腰射时的高精准度以及原创设计被全世界的执法部门广泛使用。它具有许多优点，包括双动式扳机、左右手都可以操作的下凹式弹匣释放按钮、手动式击锤降下杆和可更换的背带。

translation.value: CZ 75-Auto

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

手套枪！

translation.value: 附件槽：无。后坐力： 中等\n来体验一下前所未有的空手战斗吧！只需要那么一点点想象力，你的手就会变成向你对手的内心发射恐惧（或者说欢乐）的武器。来接受这挑战，击败你的对手，你“有可能”因为你的努力获得奖励！\n搞不好你会发现自己其实真的有念动力！

original.value: Remington Model 870

translation.value: Remington Model 870

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Remington Model 870 is a U.S.-made pump-action shotgun manufactured by Remington Arms Company, Inc. It is widely used by the public for sport shooting, hunting, and self-defense. It is also commonly used by law enforcement and military organizations worldwide.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n美制 Remington Model 870 是一款由雷明顿武器公司制造的泵动霰弹枪，不仅被用于运动射击和狩猎，同时也被世界各国的执法部门和军事组织所使用。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: none. Recoil: Medium\nThe Pancor Corporation Jackhammer is a 12-gauge, gas-operated automatic shotgun. It is one of very few fully automatic shotguns, and although patented in 1987, it never entered full-scale production.

translation.value: 附件槽： 无。后坐力： 中等\nJackhammer 是一款非常少见的导气式全自动 12 号霰弹枪。该枪于 1987 年获得专利，但从未投入全面生产。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nSaiga 是一款 12 号口径导气式战斗霰弹枪，使用弹匣供弹。该枪可以进行多项改装以满足世界各地武装力量的不同需求。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Vepr 12 is produced by "Molot" factory, which also makes RPK-74 machine guns and Vepr brand semi-automatic hunting rifles. All "Vepr" brand rifles and shotguns are broadly based on the RPK-74 light machinegun designs, adapted for civilian purpose and appropriate ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n所有“Vepr”品牌的步枪与霰弹枪基本上都是从 PRK 的基础上发展而来的，为满足民用需求以及发射对应的弹药进行了改进。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Daewoo Precision Industries USAS-12 is an automatic shotgun designed as a combat shotgun manufactured in South Korea by Daewoo Precision Industries during the 1980s.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nUs-12 于 80 年代由韩国寰宇精密工业公司研制和制造。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Spas-12 is a combat shotgun that was manufactured by the Italian firearms company Franchi S.p.A. from 1979 to 2000. The SPAS-12 is a dual-mode shotgun, meaning it can be used as a semi-automatic or pump-action firearm.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n截止到 2000 年停止生产时， SPAS-12 已经出口到了世界上的许多个军用，警用和民用市场。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe AK-9 is based on the so-called "hundred series" of Kalashnikov assault rifles, such as AK-104. It's especially effective with 9x39 subsonic ammunition. Magazine is made of black polymer, holds 20 rounds of ammunition.

It was designed as a compact but powerful firearm for vehicle crews, operators of crew-served weapons, support personnel, special forces and counter-terrorist groups.

original.value: MPA 10SST-X

translation.value: MPA 10SST-X

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe MPA10SST-X is highly customizable modern weapon, compact weapon constructions and high RPM makes it very effective in close combat.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n在德国陆军武器局意识到他们需要一款适合配发给装甲车乘员和伞兵部队的凑型冲锋枪后， 他们选择了将 MPA 10SST-X 冲锋枪加入现役。

original.value: Skorpion vz. 83

translation.value: Skorpion vz. 83

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail. Recoil: Low\nThe Skorpion vz. 83 is a Czechoslovak .380ACP submachine gun developed in 1959 by Miroslav Rybar (1924–1970) and produced under the official designation Samopal vzor 61 ("submachine gun model 1961") by the Ceska zbrojovka arms factory in Uhersky Brod.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨。后坐力： 小\n开发于 1950 年代的 Skorpion vz. 83 是一款捷克产 .380ACP 冲锋枪。

original.value: H&K UMP

translation.value: H&K UMP

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe UMP is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler & Koch. It is a recoil-operated, magazine-fed submachine gun firing from a closed bolt. The UMP is chambered for larger cartridges than other submachine guns like the MP5.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n由黑克勒&科赫公司研制生产的 UMP 是一款使用枪管后坐原理，弹匣供弹、闭膛待击构造的冲锋枪。与其他冲锋枪不同，该枪使用口径更大的弹药以提升其阻滞力。

original.value: PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n为了给反恐和执法单位配发一件在近距离战斗中具有高射速和高精准度的武器，俄罗斯内务部向著名枪械设计师卡拉什尼科夫的儿子发出了开发需求。枪管下方的圆筒常被误认为榴弹发射器，但它实际上是一个筒型弹匣。

original.value: SIG 552

translation.value: SIG 552

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe compact SG 552 Commando carbine was revealed in 1998. It has a shorter 226 mm (8.9 in) barrel and gas tube, ventilated handguards and a redesigned bolt carrier group that was integrated with the piston rod to form a single moving assembly.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n结构紧凑的 SIG 552 Commando 卡宾枪于 1998 年公开，装有 226 毫米短枪管，配套的导气管和通风护木。该枪的机框导轨进行过重新设计以使射击精准度得到更大提升。

original.value: B&T MP-9

translation.value: B&T MP-9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe Br?gger & Thomet MP9 (Machine Pistol 9mm) is a machine pistol designed and manufactured by Br?gger & Thomet of Switzerland. The MP9 is a selective-fire 9?19mm Parabellum caliber machine pistol. It uses 15, 20, 25, and 30 round transparent polymer detachable box magazines.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n由位于瑞士 Brügger & Thomet AG 公司生产的 B&T MP-9 是一款配备快慢机，使用 9x19 毫米口径弹药的全自动手枪。其可拆卸式弹匣能容纳 15 ， 20 ，25 或 30 发弹药。

original.value: ACR CQB

translation.value: ACR CQB

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe ACR CQB is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nACR CQB 是现代战斗步枪的冲锋枪型，具有更好的机动性。原版 ACR 是由美国陆军提出的研发计划的产物，旨在研发一款可以替代 M16 突击步枪的枪械。

original.value: Berretta MX4 Storm

translation.value: Beretta MX4 Storm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nBeretta MX4 submachine gun is the newest product of the world’s oldest gun making company, Beretta of Italy. It uses original blowback operated action with polymer body of the gun and fixed shoulder stock, as well as same ambidextrous control. Beretta MX4 submachine gun is normally equipped with iron sights, and an integral Picatinny rail is provided at the top of the receiver for installation of additional sights.\n The most effective submachine gun when shooting at long distances

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nBeretta MX4 冲锋枪是全球最古老的军火公司之一的最新产品。它采用了原始的枪机后坐式原理，主打聚合物枪体、固定肩部枪托以及良好的操控性。Beretta MX4 通常配备机械瞄具，并在机匣上方提供完整的皮卡汀尼导轨，用于安装额外的瞄准镜。

original.value: JS 9mm

translation.value: JS 9mm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe JS 9 mm is a commercial export version of the QCW-05 (with the exception of different chambering). It is a suppressed submachine gun developed by the Jianshe Industries (Group) Corporation of Chongqing.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n由建设工业（集团）公司研制的 JS 9mm 是 QCW-05 的外贸版。这两款消声冲锋枪所使用的弹药是唯一的不同点，前者因而具有更高的阻滞力。

original.value: SCAR-L PDW

translation.value: SCAR-L PDW

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe FN SCAR PDW is a tailored design to meet the needs of aircraft, watercraft, vehicle operators and personal security details who have confined operational spaces or who have a desire to conceal their weapon. Small sizes combined with high efficiency, high reliability and ease of use.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\nSCAR-L PDW 能满足海陆空载具驾驶员以及私人安保人员在密闭空间的火力需要。适合携带的小尺寸，配上高效率、高可靠性及易操作的特点，使它成为了一件杀人利器。

Recoil: Low\nThe SR-2 Veresk submachine gun has been in development since mid-1990s; It wasdeveloped by the Central Scientific-Research Institute of Precise Mechanical Engineering (TSNIITOCHMASH) under request of FSB. original.value: Dragunov SVU-AS

translation.value: Dragunov SVU-AS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.\nThe OTs-03 SVU aka Sniper Rifle Shortened is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. A special muzzle brake was added that could absorb up to 40% of the recoil energy and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. The other main improvements made to the SVU over the SVD include replacement of the butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight; and shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieved perfect balance for the weapon.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：小\n该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。\nDragunov SVU-AS 满足了俄罗斯内务部安保部队需求的产品。这把枪上加装了能吸收多达 40% 后坐能量的枪口制退器，并且在机匣上柔性连接了装有迭板殚簧的可伸缩枪托。过大的枪声也通过增加的消音器得到了改善。其他改进还还包括升级枪托、手枪式握把、扳机以及装配式瞄具。最终，对枪管的 100 毫米缩短使得这件武器达到了完美的平衡。

original.value: Golden Dragunov SVU-AS

translation.value: 黄金版 Dragunov SVU-AS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low\nGolden version of Dragunov SVU-AS.\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 100%.The OTs-03 SVU aka Sniper Rifle Shortened is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. A special muzzle brake was added that could absorb up to 40% of the recoil energy and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. The other main improvements made to the SVU over the SVD include replacement of the butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight; and shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieved perfect balance for the weapon.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：小 黄金版 Dragunov SVU-AS。 该武器可对改造人造成 100% 的额外伤害。 受 AST-41 Dragunov SR 的启发，Dragunov SVU-AS 是在 SVT 的基础上进行研发，并满足了俄罗斯内务部安保部队需求的产品。这把枪上加装了能吸收多达 40% 后坐能量的枪口制退器，并且在机匣上柔性连接了装有迭板殚簧的可伸缩枪托。过大的枪声也通过增加的消音器得到了改善。其他改进还还包括升级枪托、手枪式握把、扳机以及装配式瞄具。最终，对枪管的 100 毫米缩短使得这件武器达到了完美的平衡。

The Crazy Horse or M14SE is a semi-automatic sniper rifle. It is chambered for the 7.62×51mm NATO cartridge and is built by Smith Enterprise Inc. and is used by various units within the US Military.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 黄金版 Krazy horse。 该武器可对改造人造成 100% 的额外伤害。 R14 疯马是一把半自动狙击步枪。它使用 7.62x51 毫米北约弹，被美军的各单位广泛使用。

original.value: Accuracy International AT308

translation.value: Accuracy International AT308

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nHave unique attachment Razor HD Gen II 4.7x Fast Riflescope.\n The AT (Accuracy Tactical) continues the legacy of the combat proven AW308 and takes the AW to new levels. AT308 has a fixed stock with 24 inch, quick change, plain barrel. The AT is ideal for Law Enforcement and civilian users.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n装备有一个附件：Razor HD 第 II 代 4.7x 快速步枪瞄准镜。\nAT （Accuracy Tactical）继承了经过战斗洗礼的 308 的遗产，将其带上了一个新高度。AT308 有一个固定枪托和 24 英尺长的快装平整枪管。是执法单位和民用的不二之选。

original.value: Mosin Model 1891/30

translation.value: Mosin Model 1891/30

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nModel 1891/30 is the most prolific version of the Mosin–Nagant. It was produced for standard issue to all Soviet infantry from 1930 to 1945. Most Dragoon rifles were also converted to the M1891/30 standard. It was commonly used as a sniper rifle in World War II. Early sniper versions had a 4x PE or PEM scope, a Soviet-made copy of a Zeiss design, while later rifles used smaller, simpler, and easier-to-produce 3.5x PU scopes.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 大\n在二战中经常被用作狙击步枪的 M 1891/30 是苏联步兵在 1930 年到 1945 年间的标准配置。由于该枪在二战中经常作为狙击步枪使用，使得大多数 Dragunov 步枪也被改装成了 M1891/30 的制式。早期版本装有一个 4x 瞄准镜，但后来的产品改用了更小更简单，也容易生产的 3.5x 瞄准镜。

Protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies even at long range!

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等\nBushmaster BA50 是一把栓动式弹匣上弹步枪，使用 .50 BMG 弹药！\n这把狙击步枪几乎可以做到枪枪必杀。即使相隔很远、身着全套防弹装备的敌人，也无法在这把武器的枪口下幸免。

original.value: Katana This sword can hit enemies on increased distance. Katana has increased damage. Secondary melee attack is so strong that even will kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! It has historically been associated with the samurai of feudal Japan and has become renowned for its sharpness and strength.

original.value: Jagdkommando \n Jagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value:
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>狩猎之令是一把独特的刀，它是由一整片不锈钢磨制而成的。以奥地利武装部队特种作战群命名的这把刀称得上名副其实。三面锋利的刀边最终拧成一股，多洞血槽能在击中的同时放血，一气呵成。</font>
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>主要攻击数据：
伤害：</font><font size='14' color='#42EBF8'>90</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
射程：</font><font size='14' color='#42EBF8'>2</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>

translation.value: 厄运匕首

original.value: Punishing Sword \n Punish your enemies with true weapon of justice!\n The weapon is probably useless against unicorns

translation.value:
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>如果你在寻觅一把个性十足的武器，那就是它了。拥有如此强力的武器，埋葬你的敌人自然会轻而易举。</font>

伤害：</font><font size='14' color='#42EBF8'>100</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>

original.value: Basic Armor Kit

translation.value: 基础护甲工具包

original.value: Basic Armor Kit \n Basic equipment for damaged armor repairing. This kit provides only basic ability of armor reparing.

translation.value: 使用护甲工具包对损坏的护甲进行紧急修复。

original.value: Plate Armor Kit

translation.value: “板甲”护甲工具包

original.value: Plate Armor Kit Ideal choice for team players who rely not only on themselves but also used to help allies on the battlefield. This armor kit can restore armor with increased speed. Also plate armor kit can restore armor on increased distance.

translation.value: “板甲”护甲工具包 能在战场上自力更生和支援队友的团队型玩家的理想选择。 这个护甲工具包能以 更快的速度和 在更远的距离恢复护甲。

original.value: Composite Armor Kit

translation.value: “复合物”护甲工具包

original.value: Composite Armor Kit Ideal choice for independent fighters who rely only on themselves. This armor kit can restore armor with increased speed. Lightweight composite kit has slightly increased armor recovery rate.

translation.value: “复合物”护甲工具包\n在战场上自力更生的独行战士的理想选择。\n这个护甲工具包能以最快的速度恢复护甲， 而且可以略微提高护甲恢复速度。

original.value: Basic Ammo Pack

translation.value: 基础弹药包

original.value: Basic Ammo Pack \n Basic equipment for resupplying ammo to players. Numbers of bullet supply is limited

translation.value: 为你的队友补充弹药，有数量限制。

original.value: Сapacious Ammo Pack

translation.value: “野战排”弹药包

original.value: Сapacious Ammo Pack Capacious ammo pack has increased ammunition replenishment speed But amount of boxes restricted to 5 You can hit your foe with this box pretty badly !

translation.value: “野战排”弹药包\n“野战排”弹药包 能提升弹药补充速度, 装备它能让你对敌人造成更高的伤害。

original.value: Infantry Ammo Pack

translation.value: “侦察兵”弹药包

original.value: Infantry Ammo Pack Handy infantry ammo pack has significalty increased speed of replenishment of ammunition Soldier can carry 15 boxes

translation.value: “侦察兵”弹药包 这个方便的“侦察兵”弹药包能显著提升弹药补充速度。 士兵能够携带最多 15 个 弹药包进入战场

original.value: M18 Claymore

translation.value: 克莱莫地雷

original.value: M18 Claymore \n The M18A1 Claymore is a directional anti-personnel mine used by the U.S. military.

translation.value: 克莱莫地雷是美国军队使用的一种定向反步兵地雷。

original.value: Anti-personnel mine

translation.value: 反步兵地雷

original.value: Anti-personnel mine \n Special mine, which has a 360 degrees activation trigger.

translation.value: 这种特殊的地雷有一个 360 度的触发引信。

original.value: Crywar Claymore

translation.value: 战嚎阔剑地雷

original.value: TBD_Ammor Kit III

translation.value: TBD_护甲工具包 III

original.value: Anti-personnel mine \n Special mine, which has a 360 degrees activation trigger. \n Consumable item! Item will disappear after being used.

translation.value: 这种特殊的地雷有一个 360 度的触发引信。此消耗品会在使用后消失。

original.value: Christmas Claymore

translation.value: 圣诞节礼物盒

original.value: Christmas Claymore. In the days of Christmas necessary to be kind and cheerful ! And be sure to give gifts, even to your enemies… This explosive present is designed exactly to such purpose! Gladden your opponent with burst of joy =)

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>圣诞节是欢乐开怀的时光！\n过节一定要送礼，包括送给你的敌人们…\n这个会爆炸的礼物就很适合他们 ^_^</font>

original.value: Basic Defibrillator

translation.value: 基础除颤器

original.value: Basic Defibrillator \n This defibrillator can revive dead teammate. After used, medic has to wait some time to use once more.

translation.value: 医疗兵使用除颤器复活队友之后需要等待充电完成才能再次使用。

original.value: Resuscitation Defibrillator

translation.value: “复活”除颤器

original.value: Resuscitation defibrillator \n This defibrillator has increased range of resurection \n

translation.value: “复活”除颤器\n这个除颤器有更大的复活范围\n

original.value: Portable Defibrillator

translation.value: “便携”除颤器

original.value: Portable defibrillator This defibrillator reanimates allies with increased ammount of health Energy efficient batteries provides increased speed of operation. Also, this defibrillator is ideal to fry enemies with high voltage !

translation.value: “便携”除颤器\n这个除颤器让被复活的盟友拥有更高的生命值\n高能效电池提升了运行速度，也让它成为用高压电烤焦敌人的理想工具！
手雷

original.value: M26 \n The M26 is a fragmentation grenade developed by the United States military. Its distinct lemon shape led it to being nicknamed the "lemon grenade".

translation.value: M26 是由美国军队开发的破片手雷。独特的外形使它得到了“柠檬手雷”的绰号。

original.value: Crywar Grenade

translation.value: 战嚎手雷

original.value: Crywar Grenade\n This grenade has increased damage.

translation.value: 这个威力强大的手雷能造成更多伤害。

original.value: Knock-back Grenade\n This grenade has knock-back effect. \n Consumable item! Item will disappear after being used.

translation.value: 它的爆炸造成的冲击效应会将敌人击倒。此消耗品会在使用后消失。

original.value: Destructive Grenade

translation.value: FG4 手雷

original.value: Destructive Grenade\n This grenade has increased blast radius and damage. An excellent weapon against a large cluster of enemies..

translation.value: <font size='14'>防御性手雷</font>\n<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>该手雷有<font color='#42ebf8'>更大的爆炸半径，伤害也更大</font>。使用它来清理向你和队友逼近的敌群。</font>

original.value: Offensive grenade

translation.value: 攻击性手雷

original.value: Offensive grenade\n This grenade has increased explosion delay.

translation.value: <font size='18'>攻击性手雷</font>\n<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>这个手雷的起爆延时更长。算准投掷时间来摧毁敌方队列。</font>

original.value: Zongzi Grenade

translation.value: 焰火手榴弹

original.value: Zongzi Grenade \n Unique grenade specially designed for Dragon Boat Festival. It has an unique visual effect of explosion.

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>这个独特的爆炸物会召唤一条巨龙扑向你的敌人。</font>

original.value: M84 \n This is basic flash grenade of the United States Army.

translation.value: 美国陆军使用的基础闪光弹。

original.value: M84 II

translation.value: M84 II

original.value: M84 II\n This is advanced version of M84 - blind time and blind area are increased in this grenade.

translation.value: 高级版的 M84 提升了致盲范围和使敌人无法视物的时间

original.value: M84 II

translation.value: M84 II

original.value: Crywar flash

translation.value: 战嚎闪光弹

original.value: TBD_Crywar Flash

translation.value: TBD_战嚎闪光弹

original.value: Gas Grenade

translation.value: 催泪弹

original.value: Gas Grenade \n is basic flash grenade that soldier can use. It is a typical flash grenade.

translation.value: 在熟练的使用者手里会产生毁灭性效果的基础闪光弹。

original.value: Knockback Grenade

translation.value: 击倒手雷

original.value: Knockback Grenade \n is basic knockback grenade that soldier can use. When player or AI hit by this grenade, he will knockdown.

translation.value: 用这件威力巨大的战争武器使敌人倒地。
医疗包

original.value: Medkit \n This medkit can heal wounded teammate. Total amount of healing at one time is limited.

translation.value: 使医疗兵可以为队友进行有限的治疗。

original.value: Paramedic Medkit

translation.value: “护理员”医疗包

original.value: "Paramedic" MedKit Ideal choice for team players who rely not only on themselves but also used to help allies on the battlefield. This MedKit can restore health with increased speed. "Paramedic" MedKit restore health on increased distance

translation.value: “护理员”医疗包\n能在战场上自力更生和支援队友的团队型玩家的理想选择。\n这个医疗包能够 以更快的速度，在更远的距离恢复生命值。

original.value: Plantago Medkit

translation.value: “肾上腺素”医疗包

original.value: "Plantago" MedKit Ideal choice for independent fighters who rely only on themselves. This MedKit can restore HP with increased speed. MedKit has increased recovery amount of health.

translation.value: “肾上腺素”医疗包\n在战场上自力更生的独行战士的理想选择。\n这个医疗包能以更快的速度恢复生命值还能 提升恢复的生命值。

original.value: Smoke Grenade

translation.value: 白色烟雾弹

original.value: Smoke Grenade \n White smoke from grenade blocks player's sight.

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>用白色烟雾阻碍敌人的视线。</font>

original.value: Smoke Grenade II

translation.value: 红色烟雾弹

original.value: Smoke Grenade II \n Red smoke grenade.

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>用红色烟雾阻碍敌人的视线。</font>

original.value: Smoke Grenade III

translation.value: 黄色烟雾弹

original.value: Smoke Grenade III\n Yellow smoke grenade.

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>用黄色烟雾阻碍敌人的视线。</font>

original.value: Smoke Grenade IV

translation.value: 蓝色烟雾弹

original.value: Smoke Grenade IV\n Blue smoke grenade.

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>用蓝色烟雾阻碍敌人的视线。</font>

original.value: Green Smoke Grenade

translation.value: 绿色烟雾弹

original.value: Green Smoke Grenade\n NEOGIDANNO - Green smoke grenade.

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>用绿色烟雾阻碍敌人的视线。</font>

translation.value: “乌克兰”烟雾弹 就用这颗爱国烟雾弹 获得你所需的掩护！ 为你的国家释放烟雾！

original.value: Smoke Grenade "Wales"

translation.value: “威尔士”烟雾弹

original.value: Smoke Grenade "Wales" This Grenade looks great ! Smoke effect is really interesting! Enjoy!

translation.value: “威尔士”烟雾弹 就用这颗爱国烟雾弹 获得你所需的掩护！ 为你的国家释放烟雾！

original.value: Gold Smoke Grenade

translation.value: 黄金烟雾弹

original.value: <font size='14' color='#42EBF8'>Gold Smoke Grenade</font>\n <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>It has an unique<font color='#42ebf8'> visual effect</font> of smoke.

translation.value: 用<font size='14' color='#D4AF37'>金色</font>阻碍敌人的视线。

original.value: Desert Eagle Camo

translation.value: 迷彩版沙漠之鹰

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\n The Desert Eagle Camo is a large-framed gas-operated semi-automatic pistol designed by Magnum Research in the U.S., and manufactured primarily in Israel by IMI (Israel Military Industries, now Israel Weapon Industries).

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口\n尺寸巨大的导气式半自动手枪沙漠之鹰由美国马格纳斯研究所设计，主要由以色列军事工业公司负责制造。

original.value: Glock 18C Platinum

translation.value: 白金版 Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Special platinum version of the Glock 17.\n The Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\nGlock 18C 是使用快慢机的 Glock 17 改型，应奥地利反恐单位的要求开发。这款全自动手枪装有一个拉杆式快慢机。这个位于枪身底部的拉杆可以使这把手枪切换到全自动模式。

original.value: M4 CQB Platinum

translation.value: 白金版 M4 CQB

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special platinum version of the M4CQB.\n The Close Quarters Battle Receiver (CQBR) is a replacement upper receiver for the M4A1 Carbine. The CQBR replaces the M4 with a barrel 10.3 in (262 mm) length making it the modern equivalent of the Colt Commando short-barrel M16 variants of the past.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n白金特殊版 M4 CQB 配有 262 毫米枪管，是著名的突击队员型的现代化版本，取代了 M4A1 卡宾枪。

original.value: Platinum Skin

translation.value: 白金皮肤

original.value: Special Platinum Skin for the M4 CQB\nThis is only a cosmetic skin. You still need to obtain the original weapon.

translation.value: M4 CQB 的白金特殊皮肤\n这是一款装饰皮肤，请先获取原始武器。

original.value: Platinum Skin

translation.value: 白金皮肤

original.value: Special Platinum Skin for the Glock 18C\nThis is only a cosmetic skin. You still need to obtain the original weapon.

translation.value: Glock 18C 的白金特殊皮肤\n这是一款装饰皮肤，请先获取原始武器。

original.value: M4A1 Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 M4A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special Winter camouflage version of the M4A1. \n The M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n冬季迷彩特殊版 M4A1。\nM4A1 是由尤金·斯通纳设计、阿玛莱特制造的 R15 的基础上研制的。这个枪族由 R-15 发展而来。

original.value: CALICO M955A Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 Calico M955A

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the CALICO M955A. \n The CALICO M955A is a blowback-operated full auto dynamic purpose rifle chambered in .22 LR or 9x19mm Parabellum, manufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems in Hillsboro, Oregon, USA.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。冬季迷彩特殊版 Calico M955A。。后坐力： 小\n位于美国俄勒冈州希尔斯伯勒的 Calico 轻武器系统公司生产的 Calico M955A 是一款枪机后坐式全自动步枪。

original.value: AUG A3 9mm XS Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 AUG A3 9mm XS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the AUG A3 9mm XS. \n The original Steyr AUG Para 9mm submachine gun is a reversible conversion of the original Steyr AUG assault rifle, intended mostly for short-range police and special operations work. This weapons combines relatively compact dimensions with very good accuracy.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 AUG A3 9mm XS。\n作为为警务行动和特种作战中的近距离交战开发的枪械，原版 Para 9mm SMG 兼具相对紧凑的结构和非常好的射击精准度。这是一款基于 AUG A3 突击步枪的改型。

original.value: MC 255 12 Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 MC 255 12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the MC 255 12. \n Revolving shotgun MC 255 12 developed int the Central Design Bureau of Research sporting and hunting weapons (CDBR SHW) in Tula in the 1990s.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 MC 255 12。\n转轮式霰弹枪 MC 255 12 由中央运动与狩猎武器设计局于 1990 年代研制。由于其独特设计，这把霰弹枪深受民间枪械爱好者喜爱。

original.value: H&K MP5 Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 H&K MP5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the H&K MP5. \n The H&K MP5 is a 9mm submachine gun of German design, developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K).

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 H&K MP5。\nH&K MP5 于 60 年代由来自德国轻武器制造商黑克勒&科赫公司的工程师团队研制，是一款 9 毫米冲锋枪。

original.value: H&K USP Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 H&K USP

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the H&K USP. \n The USP is a semi-automatic pistol developed in Germany by Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K).

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 H&K USP。\n德制 USP 是一款由黑克勒&科赫公司研制的半自动手枪，在好几支特种部队中服役。

original.value: Saiga Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 Saiga

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the Saiga. \n The Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 Saiga。\nSaiga 是一款 12 号口径导气式战斗霰弹枪，使用弹匣供弹。该枪可以进行多项改装以满足世界各地武装力量的不同需求。

original.value: AWM Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 AWM

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Winter camouflage version of the AWM. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. The AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International. The AWM features a detachable box magazine which holds five rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，导轨，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 AWM。\n由精密国际公司生产的 AWM （Arctic Warfare Magnum）是一款使用可拆卸 5 发弹匣的狙击步枪，同时也是第一款“狙击手专用”型号。

original.value: CheyTac M200 Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 CheyTac M200

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special Winter camouflage version of the CheyTac M200. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. The CheyTac Intervention is an American bolt action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac LLC for long range soft target interdiction. It is fed by a detachable single stack magazine, which holds 7 rounds. CheyTac one of the longest ranges of all modern-day sniper rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等 该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 冬季迷彩特殊版 CheyTac M200。 CheyTac M200 使用能容纳 7 发弹药的可拆卸单排弹匣供弹。其射程之远，大多数现代狙击步枪都难以与之相媲美。这款为远距离交战设计的单发栓动狙击步枪是美国产的。

original.value: AUG A3 H_bar Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 AUG A3 Hbar

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the AUG A3 H_bar. \n AUG A3 H_bar a longer, heavier-barreled version of AUG A3, used as a light machine gun.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n冬季迷彩特殊版 AUG A3 Hbar。\nAUG A3 Hbar 是 AUG A3 加长加重枪管的版本，作为轻机枪使用。

original.value: FN P90 Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 FN P90

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the FN P90. \n The FN P90 is a selective fire personal defense weapon (PDW) designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. It was designed as a compact but powerful firearm for vehicle crews, operators of crew-served weapons, support personnel, special forces and counter-terrorist groups.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 FN P90。\n以结构紧凑但火力强大为目的设计的 FN P90是一款配备快慢机的个人防卫武器，专为车辆乘员、后勤人员、特种部队和反恐单位研制。该枪由比利时生产制造，其另类设计在冲锋枪家族中前无来者。

original.value: Benelli Nova tactical Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 Benelli Nova Tactical

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the Benelli Nova tactical. \n The Nova shotgun is the latest development in the pump shotguns from famous Italian company Benelli Armi. Nova tactical shotgun is built to use most powerful 3 and 3 1/2 inch magnum shotshells.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 Benelli Nova Tactical。\n著名的意大利贝内利武器公司研发的最新型号，使用威力巨大的 3 英寸和 3 又 1/2 英寸马格南弹药。

original.value: XM8 Sharpshooter Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 XM8 Sharpshooter

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special Winter camouflage version of the XM8 Sharpshooter. The XM8 Sharpshooter is special modification of XM8 which turns it to highly effective weapon for long-distance combat.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 冬季迷彩特别版 XM8 Sharpshooter。 XM8 Sharpshooter 是经过专门改装的 XM8 ，一款在远程战斗中具有很高效能的武器。

original.value: Steyr M9A1 Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版 Steyr M9A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the Steyr M9A1.\n The Steyr M9A1 is a series of semi-automatic pistols developed by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG of Austria for police services and the civilian shooting market. Design work on the new pistol began in the early 1990s and the final product known as the M9.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等\n冬季迷彩特殊版 Steyr M9A1。\n半自动手枪 Steyr M9A1 是为警察和民用市场开发的一系列型号之一。斯泰尔-曼利夏武器有限公司于 1990 年代初开始了这款新手枪的研发工作。最终的产品就是人们熟知的 M9。

original.value: Sapper shovel Winter Camo

translation.value: 冬季迷彩版工兵铲

original.value: Sapper SVL \n Special Winter camouflage version of the Sapper shovel. \n Provides strong attack to nearby enemies. Damage range has increased.

translation.value:

original.value: H&K G36K Jungle

translation.value: 丛林版 H&K G36K

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial jungle camo version of the G36K.\n The G36K is a German made assault rifle manufactured by Heckler and Koch. It is a variant of the H&K G36. K stands for Kurz, which means short in German..

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n丛林特殊版 H&K G36K。\n这把由德国黑克勒&科赫公司生产的突击步枪是 H&K G36 的一个改型。武器名称中的字母 K 代表德语单词 “ Kurz ”，意思是“短的”。

original.value: Cobray Striker Jungle

translation.value: 丛林版 Cobray Striker

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial jungle camo version of the Corbray Striker.\n The Cobray Striker (also known as Sentinel Arms Co Striker-12, Protecta) is a revolver 12-gauge shotgun designed for riot control and combat. It was created in Zimbabwe by Hilton Walker in the early 1980s.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n丛林特殊版 Cobray Strike。\n为镇暴和防暴战斗设计的 Cobray Strike 是一把兼顾阻滞力和机动性的 12 号霰弹枪。

original.value: H&K MP7 Jungle

translation.value: 丛林版 H&K MP7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial jungle camo version of the MP7.\n The MP7 is a German submachine gun manufactured by Heckler & Koch (H&K) and chambered for the 4.6x30mm cartridge. It was designed in conjunction with the new cartridge to meet NATO requirements published in 1980 calling for a personal defense weapon class firearm.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n丛林特殊版 H&K MP7。\n黑克勒&科赫公司生产的 H&K MP7 是一款德制冲锋枪，使用 4.6x30 毫米弹药。该枪是为满足北约于 1980 年代对个人防卫级武器的需求设计的。

translation.value: 丛林版 Dragunov SR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special jungle camo version of the Dragunov SR. The legendary semi-automatic sniper rifle chambered in 7.62x54mmR and developed in the Soviet Union.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 丛林特别版 Dragunov SR。 这把声名远扬的半自动狙击步枪是苏联设计研制的。

original.value: Special Jungle Skin for the Remington Model 870 CB\nThis is only a cosmetic skin. You still need to obtain the original weapon.

translation.value: Remington Model 870 CB 的丛林特殊皮肤\n这是一款装饰皮肤，请先获取原始武器。

original.value: AK-103 City

translation.value: 都市版 AK-103

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial city version of the AK-103.\n The Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nAK-103 的特殊都市版。\nAK-103 被俄罗斯的数个特种执法部门所使用。相比使用 5.45 毫米弹药的枪械，他们更乐意使用发射 7.62 毫米弹药，阻滞能力更为优秀的 AK-103。

original.value: Hawk Pump City

translation.value: 都市版 Hawk Pump

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial city version of the Hawk Pump.\n Chinese company Hawk Industries produces a line of pump-action shotguns forhunting and security / police purposes, which are based on US-made Remington 870 shotguns.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nHawk Pump 的特殊都市版。\n这个基于 Remington Model 870 设计的泵动霰弹枪枪系在中国生产，用于狩猎和安保用途。

original.value: Kriss super V City

translation.value: 都市版 Kriss Super V

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial city version of the Kriss super V.\n The TDI Vector series is a family of .45 ACP submachine guns developed by Transformational Defense Industries. They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nKriss Super V 的特殊都市版。\nAxial 系列采用了非对称后坐和同轴设计以减少枪口上跳，属于 .45ACP 冲锋枪枪族。

original.value: SIG 550 City

translation.value: 都市版 SIG 550

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special city version of the SIG 550. Another member of the SG 550 family is the SG 550 Sniper variant designed specifically for Swiss security forces. This accurized rifle has a refined two-stage trigger.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 丛林特别版 SIG 550。 SIG 550 狙击型专为瑞士安全部队设计。这把提升了射击精准度的步枪装有一个改良过的两道火扳机。

original.value: АK-103 Shiny metal set

translation.value: 抛光金属涂装 AK-103

original.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial polished metal version of the АK-103.\nThis variant of the AK-74M rifle is in use by various Russian special law enforcement groups. They prefer the АK-103 with the 7.62mm over the 5.45mm ammo for its better stopping power.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n抛光金属色特殊版 AK-103。\n这款 AK-74M 步枪的改型被俄罗斯的数个特种执法部门所使用。相比使用 5.45 毫米弹药的枪械，他们更乐意使用发射 7.62 毫米弹药，阻滞能力更为优秀的 AK-103。

original.value: AK-9 Shiny metal set

translation.value: 抛光金属涂装 AK-9

original.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial polished metal version of the AK-9.\nLike the AK-104, the AK-9 is based on the so-called "hundred series" of the AK variants. With its 9x39mm subsonic ammunition, it is especially effective, and each of the black polymer magazines holds 20 rounds of ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n抛光金属色特殊版 AK-9。\n和 AK-104 类似， AK-9 是在号称“百改系列”的 AK 枪族的基础上研制的。该枪使用 9x39 毫米亚音速弹，效能非常高，每个黑色高分子聚合物弹匣都能容纳 20 发弹药。

original.value: Dragunov SR Shiny metal set

translation.value: 抛光金属涂装 Dragunov SR

original.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special polished metal version of the Dragunov SR. The legendary semi-automatic sniper rifle designed and developed in the Soviet Union.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 抛光金属色特别版 Dragunov SR。 这把声名远扬的半自动狙击步枪是苏联设计研制的。

original.value: Saiga Shiny metal set

translation.value: 抛光金属涂装 Saiga

original.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial polished metal version of the Saiga.\nThe Saiga is a 12 gauge gas-operated combat shotgun that feeds from a box magazine. It is available in a wide range of configurations to meet different expectations of different armed forces worldwide.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n抛光金属色特殊版 Saiga。\nSaiga 是一款 12 号口径导气式战斗霰弹枪，使用弹匣供弹。该枪可以进行多项改装以满足世界各地武装力量的不同需求。

original.value: Stechkin APS Shiny metal set

translation.value: 抛光金属涂装 Stechkin APS

original.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial polished metal version of the Stechkin APS.\nThe Russian Stechkin APS is a selective fire machine pistol intended as a sidearm for artillery soldiers, tank crews and aircraft personnel.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 大\n抛光金属色特殊版 Stechkin APS。\n俄制 Stechkin APS 是一款配备快慢机的全自动手枪，是作为炮兵、坦克乘员和飞行员的副武器研制的。

original.value: Type 97 China set

translation.value: 沙漠版 Type 97

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special China camo version of the Type 97, which is similar to the Type 95 in all respects except that it is chambered for 5.56 mm NATO instead of the original Chinese 5.8 mm cartridge and has a deep magazine well, designed to accept STANAG magazines.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n沙漠迷彩特殊版 Type 97。\nType 97 与 T95 完全相同，但它使用 5.56 毫米北约弹而非原版的中国产 5.8 毫米弹药，拥有一个设计精良的加深机匣来容纳 STANAG 弹匣。

original.value: QSZ-92 China set

translation.value: 沙漠版 QSZ-92

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Special China camo version of the QSZ-92 Services Pistol, which is a semi-automatic pistol designed by Norinco and it is in limited service in the People's Liberation Army since the late 1990s.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\n沙漠迷彩特殊版 QSZ-92。\nQSZ-92 军用手枪是一款半自动手枪，于 1990 年代后期投入使用。

original.value: Hawk Pump China set

translation.value: 沙漠版 Hawk Pump

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\n Special China camo version of Hawk Pump. Chinese company Hawk Industries produces a line of pump-action shotguns forhunting and security / police purposes, which are based on US-made Remington 870 shotguns.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口\n沙漠迷彩特殊版 Hawk Pump。\n这个基于 Remington 870 设计的泵动霰弹枪枪系在中国生产，用于狩猎和安保用途。

original.value: JS 9mm China set

translation.value: 沙漠版 JS 9mm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\n Special China camo version of The JS 9 mm, which is a commercial export version of the QCW-05 (with the exception of different chambering). It is a suppressed submachine gun developed by the Jianshe Industries (Group) Corporation of Chongqing.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口\n沙漠迷彩特殊版 JS 9mm。\n由建设工业（集团）公司研制的 JS 9mm 是 QCW-05 的外贸版。这两款消声冲锋枪所使用的弹药是唯一的不同点，前者因而具有更高的阻滞力。

original.value: QBU-88 China set

translation.value: 沙漠版 QBU-88

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.\nSpecial China camo version of The QBU-88 rifle, which was the first weapon of the newest generation of Chinese small arms, chambered for proprietary 5.8x42mm ammunition. At the present time the QBU-88 rifle is in service with PLA and Chinese police forces.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 沙漠迷彩特别版 QBU-88。 QBU-88 是中国最新一代轻武器中的第一件产品，使用 5.8x42 毫米弹药。目前 QBU-88 步枪由中国人民解放军和中国警察部队所使用。

original.value: M4A1 U.S. set

translation.value: 美国涂装版 M4A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special U.S. version of M4A1 which is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n美国涂装特殊版 M4A1。\nM4A1 是由尤金·斯通纳设计、阿玛莱特制造的 M16 的基础上研制的。这个枪族由 AR-15 发展而来。

original.value: Beretta M9 U.S. set

translation.value: 美国涂装版 Beretta M9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Special U.S. version of Beretta M9. The Beretta M9, formally Pistol, Semi-automatic, 9mm, M9, is a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol of the United States military adopted in 1985. It is basically a military specification Beretta 92F, later the 92FS.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\n美国涂装特殊版 Beretta M9。\n1985 年美国军队将使用 9x19 毫米帕拉贝鲁姆弹的手枪 Beretta M9 改进为它的第一个军用型号 92F ，后来又将其改进为 92FS。

original.value: Remington Model 870 U.S. set

translation.value: 美国涂装版 Remington Model 870

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial U.S. version of The Remington Model 870 which is a U.S.-made pump-action shotgun manufactured by Remington Arms Company, Inc. It is widely used by the public for sport shooting, hunting, and self-defense. It is also commonly used by law enforcement and military organizations worldwide.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n美国涂装特殊版 Remington Model 870。\n美制 Remington Model 870 是一款由里士满武器公司制造的泵动霰弹枪，不仅被用于运动射击和狩猎，同时也被世界各国的执法部门和军事组织所使用。

original.value: M4 CQB U.S. set

translation.value: 美国涂装版 M4 CQB

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special U.S. version of M4 CQB which is a replacement upper receiver for the M4A1 Carbine. The CQBR replaces the M4 with a barrel 10.3 in (262 mm) length making it the modern equivalent of the Colt Commando short-barrel M16 variants of the past.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n美国涂装特殊版 M4 CQB。\nM4 CQB 配有 262 毫米枪管，是著名的突击队员型的现代化版本，取代了 M4A1 卡宾枪。

original.value: M16 SPR Custom U.S. set

translation.value: 美国涂装版 M16 SPR 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.\nSpecial U.S. version of Special Purpose Rifle (SPR) which is a rifle in service with Special Operations Forces. SPR initially stood for Special Purpose Receiver, but that nomenclature has been replaced as the weapon became a stand-alone weapons system.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 美国涂装特别版 M16 SPR Custom。 随着这款被特种部队使用的武器发展成一个独立的武器系统，它原先依照系统命名法的名字“特种用途机匣型”被改成了“特种用途步枪”，简称 SPR 。

original.value: Christmas ACR

translation.value: 圣诞版 ACR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial christmas version of ACR.\n The ACR is abbreviation of Advanced Combat Rifle. It was developed by United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n圣诞特别版 ACR。\n现代战斗步枪，简称 ACR ，是美国陆军一项耗资 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。

original.value: Christmas M240B

translation.value: 圣诞版 MG240B

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe M240B was the standard infantry medium machine gun of the U.S. Army and is currently standard in the U.S. Marine Corps.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n圣诞特别版 MG240B 。\nMG240B 是美国陆军的标准步兵中型机枪，也是美国海军陆战队的现役标准装备。

original.value: Christmas Desert Eagle

translation.value: 圣诞版沙漠之鹰

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Desert Eagle.\n The Desert Eagle is a large-framed gas-operated semi-automatic pistol designed by Magnum Research in the U.S., and manufactured primarily in Israel by IMI (Israel Military Industries, now Israel Weapon Industries).

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n圣诞特别版沙漠之鹰。\n尺寸巨大的导气式半自动手枪沙漠之鹰由美国马格纳斯研究所设计，主要由以色列军事工业公司负责制造。

original.value: Christmas Beretta M9

translation.value: 圣诞版 Beretta M9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial christmas version of Beretta M9.\nThe Beretta M9, formally Pistol, Semi-automatic, 9mm, M9, is a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol of the United States military adopted in 1985. It is basically a military specification Beretta 92F, later the 92FS.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\n圣诞特别版 Beretta M9。\n1985 年美国军队将使用 9x19 毫米帕拉贝鲁姆弹的手枪 Beretta M9 改进为它的第一个军用型号 92F ，后来又将其改进为 92FS。

original.value: Christmas SPAS-12

translation.value: 圣诞版 SPAS-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Spas-12.\n The Spas-12 is a combat shotgun that was manufactured by the Italian firearms company Franchi S.p.A. from 1979 to 2000. The SPAS-12 is a dual-mode shotgun, meaning it can be used as a semi-automatic or pump-action firearm.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n圣诞特别版 SPAS-12。\n截止到 2000 年停止生产时， SPAS-12 已经出口到了世界上的许多个军用，警用和民用市场。

original.value: Christmas Cobray Striker

translation.value: 圣诞版 Cobray Striker

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Cobray Striker.\n The Cobray Striker (also known as Sentinel Arms Co Striker-12, Protecta) is a revolver 12-gauge shotgun designed for riot control and combat. It was created in Zimbabwe by Hilton Walker in the early 1980s.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n圣诞特别版 Cobray Strike。\n为镇暴和防暴战斗设计的 Cobray Strike 是一把兼顾阻滞力和机动性的 12 号霰弹枪。

original.value: Christmas Kriss super V

translation.value: 圣诞版 Kriss Super V5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Kriss super V.\n The TDI Vector series is a family of .45 ACP submachine guns developed by Transformational Defense Industries. They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n圣诞特别版 Kriss super V。\nAxial 系列采用了非对称后坐和同轴设计以减少枪口上跳，属于 .45ACP 冲锋枪枪族。

original.value: Christmas Daewoo K1

translation.value: 圣诞版 Daewoo K1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial christmas version of Deawoo K1.\n The Daewoo K1/K1A assault carbine is the first modern firearm developed by Agency of Defense Development (ADD) and manufactured by S&T Daewoo, and entered service in Republic of Korea Armed Forces in 1981.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n圣诞特别版 Daewoo K1。\n最初由大韩民国国军于 1981 年装备的 Daewoo K1/1A 突击步枪是防务发展局开发的第一款现代枪械，由 S&T Daewoo 公司负责生产。

original.value: Christmas Alpine

translation.value: 圣诞版 Alpine

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial christmas version of Alpine TPG-1.\n Unique Alpine TPG-1 rifle is manufactured in Austria by the Unique Alpine AG. TPG-1 is a modular, high precision rifle which can be used for special military and law enforcement applications.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n圣诞特殊版 Alpine。\nUnique Alpine 狙击步枪由澳大利亚的 Unique Alpine AG 公司制造。Alpine 是一款高精准度模块化步枪，可用于特种作战和执法行动。

original.value: Christmas AS50

translation.value: 圣诞版 AS50

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special christmas version of Alpine AS50. The AS50 is a .50 BMG sniper/anti-materiel rifle manufactured by British firearms producer Accuracy International. The AS50 enables operators to engage targets at very long range with high accuracy using explosive or incendiary ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 圣诞特别版 AS50。 AS50 是一款 .50BMG 狙击/反器材步枪。使用者可以用它射击距离非常远的目标。

original.value: Christmas Armor Kit

translation.value: 圣诞版护甲工具包

original.value: Christmas Armor Kit \n Basic equipment for damaged armor repairing. This kit provides only basic ability of armor reparing.

translation.value: 用这个基础工具包为损坏的护甲提供宝贵的修理，传播节日的欢快气氛。

original.value: Christmas Ammo Pack

translation.value: 圣诞版弹药包

original.value: Christmas Ammo Pack \n Basic equipment for resupplying ammo to players. Numbers of bullet supply is limited.

original.value: Christmas Medkit

translation.value: 圣诞节医疗包

original.value: Christmas Medkit \n This medkit can heal wounded team mate. Total amount of healing at one time is limited.

translation.value: 传递生命的礼物吧！使医疗兵可以为队友进行有限的治疗。

original.value: Christmas Grenade

translation.value: 圣诞版手雷
