original.value: NY ACR

translation.value: 黄帝 ACR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial New Year version of ACR which is abbreviation of Advanced Combat Rifle. It was developed by United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n中国新年特别版 ACR。\n现代战斗步枪，简称 ACR ，由美国陆军一项耗资 3 亿美元，为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的计划开发。

original.value: NY Desert Eagle

translation.value: 黄帝沙漠之鹰

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial New Year version of Desert Eagle which is a large-framed gas-operated semi-automatic pistol designed by Magnum Research in the U.S., and manufactured primarily in Israel by IMI (Israel Military Industries, now Israel Weapon Industries).

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n中国新年特别版沙漠之鹰。\n尺寸巨大的导气式半自动手枪沙漠之鹰由美国马格纳斯研究所设计，主要由以色列军事工业公司负责制造。

original.value: NY Cobray Striker

translation.value: 黄帝 Cobray Striker

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial New Year version of the Cobray Striker.\n The Cobray Striker (also known as Sentinel Arms Co Striker-12, Protecta) is a revolver 12-gauge shotgun designed for riot control and combat. It was created in Zimbabwe by Hilton Walker in the early 1980s.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n中国新年特别版 Cobray Strike。\n为镇暴和防暴战斗设计的 Cobray Strike 是一把兼顾阻滞力和机动性的 12 号霰弹枪。

original.value: NY Daewoo K1

translation.value: 黄帝 Daewoo K1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial New Year version of Daewoo K1/K1A assault carbine which is the first modern firearm developed by Agency of Defense Development (ADD) and manufactured by S&T Daewoo, and entered service in Republic of Korea Armed Forces in 1981.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\n中国新年特别版 Daewoo K1。\n最初由大韩民国国军于 1981 年装备的 Daewoo K1/1A 突击步枪是防务发展局开发的第一款现代枪械，由 S&T Daewoo 公司负责生产。

original.value: NY AS50

translation.value: 黄帝 AS50

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.\nSpecial New Year version of AS50 which is a .50 BMG sniper/anti-materiel rifle manufactured by British firearms producer Accuracy International. The AS50 enables operators to engage targets at very long range with high accuracy using explosive or incendiary ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 中国新年特别版 AS50。 AS50 是一款 .50BMG 狙击/反器材步枪。使用者可以用它射击距离非常远的目标。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: None. Recoil: Medium\nThe Luger is a toggle-locked recoil-operated semi-automatic pistol. The design was patented by Georg J. Luger in 1898 and produced by German arms manufacturer Deutsche Waffen- und Munitionsfabriken (DWM) starting in 1900.

original.value: M240B Crown

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Elite crown version of M240B. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. It has Increased reload speed, Improved accuracy, Increased damage and better damage distance.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小 “精英皇冠”版 MG240B。 这把武器对生物机器人造成的伤害要多 50%。 “精英皇冠”版有更高的伤害，以及提升的准确度、有效射程和装弹速度。它还具备全新的精英设计，让你在战斗中脱颖而出。

original.value: Anti-cyborgs Stechkin APS

translation.value: 恶作剧版 Stechkin APS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High -This weapon does increased damage to cyborgs. -Magazine capacity increased. -Increased ammunition amount. Dreadful version of the Stechkin APS. The Stechkin APS (Avtomaticheskiy Pistolet Stetchkina) is a Russian selective fire machine pistol. It bears the name of its developer, Igor Stechkin. Pistol was intended as a sidearm for artillery soldiers, tank crews and aircraft personnel.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 大\n恶作剧版 Stechkin APS。\n这把武器对改造人有 +200% 伤害增益、拥有更高的装弹量 和更高的备弹量。

original.value: Anti-cyborgs SPAS-12

translation.value: 恶作剧版 SPAS-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium -This weapon does increased damage to cyborgs. -Magazine capacity increased. -Increased ammunition amount. Dreadful version of the SPAS-12. The Spas-12 is a combat shotgun that was manufactured by the Italian firearms company Franchi S.p.A. from 1979 to 2000. The SPAS-12 is a dual-mode shotgun, meaning it can be used as a semi-automatic or pump-action firearm.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nSPAS-12 的恶作剧版。\n这把武器对改造人有 +200% 伤害增益、拥有更高的装弹量 和更高的备弹量。

original.value: Anti-cyborgs H&K G36C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low -This weapon does increased damage to cyborgs. -Magazine capacity increased. -Increased ammunition amount. Dreadful version of the H&K SL8. The G36C is a German-made assault rifle manufactured by Heckler und Koch. It is a variant of the H&K G36. C stands for Compact (sometimes mistaken to mean Commando). It has become a popular weapon among Counter-Terrorism Units all around the world.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nH&K G36C 的恶作剧版。\n这把武器对改造人有 +200% 伤害增益、拥有更高的装弹量 和更高的备弹量。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium -This weapon does increased damage to cyborgs. -Magazine capacity increased. -Increased ammunition amount. Dreadful version of the H&K SL8. The Heckler & Koch SL8 is a sporting rifle manufactured by Heckler & Koch. It is the civilian version of the Heckler & Koch G36. The rifle fires the .223 Remington or 5.56x45mm NATO cartridge and feeds from a 10, 20 or 30 round detachable magazine (depending on the variant of the rifle).

original.value: Anti-cyborgs H&K G36 MG

translation.value: 恶作剧版 H&K MG36

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n-This weapon does increased damage to cyborgs.\n The MG36 was a German made light machine gun manufactured by Heckler und Koch. It was proposed as a squad automatic variant of the H&K G36, however it was abandoned after the Bundeswehr withdrew interest in the project. It has a double-drum magazine and a long handguard.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\nH&K G36MG 的恶作剧版特别版。\n这把武器对改造人有 +200% 伤害增益 和更高的备弹量。

original.value: AK-103 Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 AK-103

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial basic version of the AK-103.\n The Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n城市作战版 AK-103。\n这款 AK-74M 步枪的改型被俄罗斯的数个特种执法部门所使用。相比使用 5.45 毫米弹药的枪械，他们更乐意使用发射 7.62 毫米弹药，阻滞能力更为优秀的 AK-103。

original.value: RPK Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 RPK

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial basic version of the RPK.\n The RPK (Ruchnoy Pulemyot Kalashnikova) is a 7.62x39mm light machine gun of Soviet design, developed by Mikhail Kalashnikov in the late 1950s, parallel with the AKM assault rifle. It was created as part of a program designed to standardize the small arms inventory of the Red Army.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n城市作战版 RPK。\n这把 7.62x39 毫米轻机枪是苏式设计产物。该枪是苏联红军装备标准化项目的一部分。

original.value: Kriss super V Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 Kriss Super V

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the Kriss super V.\n The TDI Vector series is a family of .45 ACP submachine guns developed by Transformational Defense Industries. They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n城市作战版 Kriss Super V。\nAxial 系列采用了非对称后坐和同轴设计以减少枪口上跳，属于 .45ACP 冲锋枪枪族。

original.value: AK-9 Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 AK-9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the AK-9.\n The AK-9 is based on the so-called "hundred series" of Kalashnikov assault rifles, such as AK-104. It's especially effective with 9x39 subsonic ammunition. Magazine is made of black polymer, holds 20 rounds of ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n城市作战版 AK-9。\n和 AK-104 类似， AK-9 是在号称“百改系列”的 AK 枪族的基础上研制的。该枪使用 9x39 毫米亚音速弹，效能非常高，每个黑色高分子聚合物弹匣都能容纳 20 发弹药。

original.value: VEPR Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 VEPR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the Vepr 12.\n The Vepr 12 is produced by "Molot" factory, which also makes RPK-74 machine guns and Vepr brand semi-automatic hunting rifles. All "Vepr" brand rifles and shotguns are broadly based on the RPK-74 light machinegun designs, adapted for civilian purpose and appropriate ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n城市作战版 VEPR。\nVEPR 由 Molot 工厂生产，该厂同时还生产 RPK-74 和 Vepr 品牌的半自动猎枪。所有“Vepr”品牌的步枪与霰弹枪基本上都是从 RPK 的基础上发展而来的，为满足民用需求以及发射对应的弹药进行了改进。

original.value: Cobray Striker Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 Cobray Striker

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the Cobray Striker.\n The Cobray Striker (also known as Sentinel Arms Co Striker-12, Protecta) is a revolver 12-gauge shotgun designed for riot control and combat. It was created in Zimbabwe by Hilton Walker in the early 1980s.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n城市作战版 Cobray Strike。\n为镇暴和防暴战斗设计的 Cobray Strike 是一把兼顾阻滞力和机动性的 12 号霰弹枪。

original.value: VSS Vintorez Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 VSS Vintorez

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special basic version of the VSS "Vintorez". The VSS "Vintorez" (thread cutter), is an undercover semi-automatic sniper rifle . The operating principle and sound suppression system are derived from the Val rifle.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、导轨。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 VSS Vintorez 的城市作战版。 VSS Vintorez 是一款便于藏匿的半自动狙击步枪。该枪的动作原理和抑制系统是从 FLA 步枪发展而来的。

original.value: AWM Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 AWM

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. Special basic version of the AVM. The AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International. The AWM features a detachable box magazine which holds five rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 城市作战版 AWM。 由精密国际公司生产的 AWM （Arctic Warfare Magnum）是一款使用可拆卸 5 发弹匣的狙击步枪，同时也是第一个“狙击手专用”型号。

original.value: M4A1 Basic

translation.value: 城市作战 M4A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial basic version of the M4A1.\n The M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n城市作战版 M4A1。\nM4A1 是由尤金·斯通纳设计、阿玛莱特制造的 M16 的基础上研制的。这个枪族由 AR-15 发展而来。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of Daewoo K2.\n The K2 is an assault rifle of the Republic of Korea Armed Forces, manufactured by S&T Daewoo. It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n韩服周年纪念特殊版 Daewoo K2。\nK2 是 S&T Daewoo 公司生产的突击步枪。 Daewoo K2 是大韩民国国军的主力突击步枪。该把配备快慢机的突击步枪使用 20 或 30 发弹匣供弹，采用导气式原理，需要抵肩射击。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of Daewoo K5.\n The Daewoo K5 is a 9 mm semi-automatic pistol produced by S&T Daewoo of South Korea. original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of Daewoo K7.\n The Daewoo Precision Industries K7 was announced in 2003 as a 9 mm suppressed submachine gun (with permanent suppressor) for use with the South-Korean special forces. original.value: M32A1 Multi Grenade Launcher \n The M32A1 MGL is a multiple-shot weapon, intended to significantly increase a small squad's firepower when compared to traditional single-shot grenade launchers. The MGL is designed to be simple, rugged, and reliable.\n It uses the well-proven revolver principle to achieve a high rate of accurate fire which can be rapidly brought to bear on a target. A variety of rounds such as HE, HEAT, anti-riot baton, irritant, and pyrotechnic can be loaded and fired as fast as the trigger can be pulled; the cylinder can be loaded or unloaded rapidly to maintain a high rate of fire..

translation.value: M32A1 榴弹发射器\n相较于其他榴弹发射器， M32A1 榴弹发射器能为使用者提供更强的火力，因为它能装填 6 发榴弹而非单发。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle Special developed for Spec Ops Squads. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased amount of ammo and increased damage. The RPK (Ruchnoy Pulemyot Kalashnikova) is a 7.62x39mm light machine gun of Soviet design, developed by Mikhail Kalashnikov in the late 1950s, parallel with the AKM assault rifle. It was created as part of a program designed to standardize the small arms inventory of the Red Army.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口 专为特种兵部队研制。 该枪械提供更高的装弹量、更高的备弹量和更高的伤害。 RPK 是苏联红军装备标准化项目的一部分。这把 7.62x39 毫米轻机枪是苏式设计的标志性产物。

The weapon's design is derived from the World War II era MG 42 universal machine gun that fired the 7.92x57mm Mauser round.

original.value: Jackhammer Special

translation.value: 特种兵版 Jackhammer

original.value: Attachment's Slots: none Jackhammer Special Forces version. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased amount of ammo and increased rpm value. The Pancor Corporation Jackhammer is a 12-gauge, gas-operated automatic shotgun. It is one of very few fully automatic shotguns, and although patented in 1987, it never entered full-scale production.

translation.value: 附件槽： 无\nJackhammer 的特种部队版本。\nJackhammer 是一款非常少见的导气式全自动 12 号霰弹枪。该枪于 1987 年获得专利，但从未投入全面生产。

original.value: AUG A3 H_bar Special

translation.value: 特种兵版 AUG A3 Hbar

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle AUG A3 H_bar Special Forces version. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased amount of ammo and increased rpm value. AUG A3 H_bar a longer, heavier-barreled version of AUG A3, used as a light machine gun.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\nAUG A3 Hbar 的特种部队版本。\nAUG A3 Hbar 是 AUG A3 加长加重枪管的版本，作为轻机枪使用。

original.value: H&K MG36 Special

translation.value: 特种兵版 H&K MG36

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle H&K MG36 Special Forces version. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased amount of ammo and increased rpm value. The MG36 was a German made light machine gun manufactured by Heckler und Koch. It was proposed as a squad automatic variant of the H&K G36, however it was abandoned after the Bundeswehr withdrew interest in the project. It has a double-drum magazine and a long handguard.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\nH&K MG36 的特种部队版本。\n德制 H&K MG36 是一款装有双鼓型弹鼓和长护木的轻机枪。该枪原计划用作 H&K G36 的班用火力支援型号，但在德国国防军失去了对该项目的兴趣之后就被废弃了。

original.value: Katana Mk.60 Mod

translation.value: 武士刀 Mk.60 Mod

original.value: Katana Mk.60 Mod The top of military development of Weapon Department of Blackwood Corp. Made with using of last technologies in research of arms industry. This weapon provides increased hit radius, increased range and increased damage. Secondary melee attack is so strong that even will kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! The katana is characterized by its distinctive appearance: a curved, slender, single-edged blade with a circular or squared guard and long grip to accommodate two hands. It has historically been associated with the samurai of feudal Japan and has become renowned for its sharpness and strength.

translation.value: 武士刀 Mk.60 Mod 武士刀以其锋利程度举世闻名。它曾被日本封建时代的武士所使用，通常需要双手挥动。 主要攻击数据： 伤害：110 射程：3 攻击速度：3.57 攻击次数/秒 DPS：392 次要攻击数据： 伤害：200 射程：3.5 攻击速度：1.17 攻击次数/秒 DPS：234

original.value: Red Neon Skin

translation.value: 红色霓虹皮肤

original.value: <font size='14' color='#ff4400'>Special Red Neon Skin for the Katana</font>\n<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>This is only a cosmetic skin. You still need to obtain the original weapon.</font>

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#ff4400'>武士刀的红色霓虹特殊皮肤</font>\n<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>这是一款装饰皮肤，请先获取原始武器。</font>

original.value: FN F2000 Black Dragon

translation.value: FN F2000 黑龙

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Elite Black Dragon version of the FN F2000.\n The FN F2000 is a 5.56x45mm NATO bullpup assault rifle, designed by FN Herstal in Belgium. The F2000 made its debut in March 2001 at the IDEX defense exhibition held in Abu Dhabi, in the United Arab Emirates.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n精英黑龙版 FN F2000。\nFN F2000 是北约制无托型突击步枪。这件武器为了便于携带和射击，采用了具有未来风格的设计。而宽大的外形则使它具备对极端情况的耐受性。

original.value: Jackhammer Black Dragon

translation.value: Jackhammer 黑龙

original.value: Attachment's Slots: none\n Elite Black Dragon version of the Jackhammer.\n The Pancor Corporation Jackhammer is a 12-gauge, gas-operated automatic shotgun. It is one of very few fully automatic shotguns, and although patented in 1987, it never entered full-scale production.

translation.value: 附件槽： 无\n精英黑龙版 Jackhammer。\nJackhammer 是一款非常少见的导气式全自动 12 号霰弹枪。该枪于 1987 年获得专利，但从未投入全面生产。

original.value: CheyTac M200 Black Dragon

translation.value: CheyTac M200 黑龙

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope\n Elite Black Dragon version of the CheyTac M200.\n The CheyTac Intervention is an American bolt action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac LLC for long range soft target interdiction. It is fed by a detachable single stack magazine, which holds 7 rounds. CheyTac one of the longest ranges of all modern-day sniper rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜\n精英黑龙版 CheyTac M200。\nCheyTac M200 使用能容纳 7 发弹药的可拆卸单排弹匣供弹。其射程之远，大多数现代狙击步枪都难以与之相媲美。这款为远距离交战设计的单发栓动狙击步枪是美国产的。

original.value: Mateba Autorevolver Black Dragon

translation.value: Mateba Autorevolver 黑龙

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Elite Black Dragon version of the Mateba Autorevolver.\n The Mateba Model 6 Unica (often known simply as the Mateba or the Mateba Autorevolver) is a semi-automatic revolver, one of only a few of this type ever produced. It was developed in Italy and sold by the Mateba company.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜\n精英黑龙版 Mateba Autorevolver。\n这款意大利研制的半自动左轮手枪总共只生产了很少的数量。

original.value: M4 CQB Black Dragon

translation.value: M4 CQB 黑龙

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Elite Black Dragon version of the M4 CQB.\n The Close Quarters Battle Receiver (CQBR) is a replacement upper receiver for the M4A1 Carbine. The CQBR replaces the M4 with a barrel 10.3 in (262 mm) length making it the modern equivalent of the Colt Commando short-barrel M16 variants of the past.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n精英黑龙版 M4 CQB。\nM4 CQB 配有 262 毫米枪管，是著名的突击队员型的现代化版本，取代了 M4A1 卡宾枪。

original.value: M4A1 Anniversary

translation.value: 周年纪念版 M4A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special Enhanced Anniversary version of M4A1.\n The M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n周年纪念特别加强版 M4A1。\nM4A1 是由尤金·斯通纳设计、阿玛莱特制造的的 M16 的基础上研制的。这个枪族由 AR-15 发展而来。

original.value: Remington 870 CB Anniversary

translation.value: 周年纪念版 Remington 870 CB

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\n Special Enhanced Anniversary version of Remington 870 CB.\n Special combat build of Remington 870 which is a U.S.-made pump-action shotgun manufactured by Remington Arms Company, Inc.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口\n周年纪念特别加强版 Remington 870 CB。\n美制泵动霰弹枪 Remington 870 的特种作战型号，由雷明顿武器公司生产。

original.value: H&K UMP Anniversary

translation.value: 周年纪念版 H&K UMP

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special Enhanced Anniversary version of H&K UMP.\n The UMP is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler & Koch. It is a recoil-operated, magazine-fed submachine gun firing from a closed bolt. The UMP is chambered for larger cartridges than other submachine guns like the MP5.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口\n周年纪念特别加强版 H&K UMP。\n由黑克勒&科赫公司研制生产的 UMP 是一款使用枪管后坐原理，弹匣供弹、闭膛待击构造的冲锋枪。与其他冲锋枪不同，该枪使用口径更大的弹药以提升其阻滞力。

original.value: AWM Anniversary

translation.value: 周年纪念版 AWM

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. Special Enhanced Anniversary version of AWM. The AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International. The AWM features a detachable box magazine which holds five rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 周年纪念特别加强版 AWM。 由精密国际公司生产的 AWM （Arctic Warfare Magnum）是一款使用可拆卸 5 发弹匣的狙击步枪，同时也是第一款“狙击手专用”型号。

original.value: Beretta M9 Anniversary

translation.value: 周年纪念版 Beretta M9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Special Enhanced Anniversary version of Beretta M9.\n The Beretta M9, formally Pistol, Semi-automatic, 9mm, M9, is a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol of the United States military adopted in 1985. It is basically a military specification Beretta 92F, later the 92FS.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\n周年纪念特别加强版 Beretta M9。\n1985 年美国军队将使用 9x19 毫米帕拉贝鲁姆弹的手枪 Beretta M9 改进为它的第一个军用型号 92F ，后来又将其改进为 92FS。

original.value: FN-SCAR-H RU Anniversary

translation.value: 城市作战 FN SCAR-H

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nRussian Anniversary version of FH-SCAR-H.\n The FH-SCAR-H is an assault rifle of the The Operations Forces (SOF) Combat Assault Rifle, manufactured by S&T Daewoo. It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小\n城市作战版 FH-SCAR-H。\n FH-SCAR-H 是由 S&T Daewoo 公司制造的特种部队（SOF）作战突击步枪。这是一把抵肩射击，配置有快慢机的导气式突击步枪，使用 5.56 毫米北约弹，可装填 20 或 30 发子弹的弹匣。

original.value: Barrett M107 RU Anniversary

translation.value: 城市作战 Barrett M107

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Russian Anniversary version of Barrett M107 . The Barett M107 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 Barrett M107 的城市作战版。 Barrett M107 是一款枪管后坐式半自动反器材步枪，由美国巴雷特武器制造公司研发。作为一款被全球众多单位和军队使用重型 SASR（特殊用途狙击步枪），它也因为使用 50 BMG（12.7x99 毫米北约弹）而被称作“轻型点五零”。

original.value: XM8 Compact RU Anniversary

translation.value: 城市作战 XM8 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nRussian Anniversary version of XM8 Compact .\n The XM8 Compact is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 城市作战版 XM8 Compact。 于 1990 年代至 2000 年代初由美国陆军开发的 XM8 Compact 步枪是一款轻量型突击武器，对恶劣环境有很强耐受性。

translation.value: 城市作战 Benelli M4 Super 90

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nRussian Anniversary version of Benelli M4 Super 90 .\n The Benelli M4 Super 90 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

original.value: Pinkie-Micro Desert Eagle

translation.value: 粉色微型鹰眼

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Oh my God !! What a nice little handgun! So cute ... Sharing all the family traits of the world-famous Desert Eagle pistol, Magnum’s Micro Desert Eagle pistol, chambered in .380 ACP, is the ultimate in compact personal protection. Small enough to nest comfortably at home, in a pocket or in a purse, the double action only Micro Desert Eagle is proudly made in the U.S. and weighs less than 14 oz. But don’t let its size fool you. The Micro Desert Eagle provides big-time protection with a gas-assisted blowback system for ultimate reliability and amazing accuracy. Which only goes to prove that good things do indeed come in small packages.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口 我的天啊，好可爱的一把手枪！ 真可爱... 和世界著名的沙漠之鹰手枪同宗同源的微型沙漠之鹰手枪采用了 .380 ACP 弹药，是贴身个人防护的终极选择。小到足以隐蔽地放进口袋或者手包里，双动击发的微型沙漠之鹰是美国的骄傲，重量低于 14 盎司。但是千万别让尺寸蒙蔽了你。微型沙漠之鹰提供了一流的保护，它的气体辅助枪机后坐式系统提供了可靠度和极佳的精准度-好东西不在于大尺寸。

original.value: FN-SCAR-H Gamescom

Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Gamescom version of FH-SCAR-H.\nThe FH-SCAR-H is an assault rifle of the The Operations Forces (SOF) Combat Assault Rifle, manufactured by S&T Daewoo. It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.
Barrett M107 Gamescom

Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special Gamescom version of Barrett M107 . The Barett M107 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.
XM8 Compact Gamescom

original.value: M16A3 Custom EURO 2016

translation.value: 嘉年华版 M16A3

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special EURO 2016 camouflage version of the M16A3. Football is life…Get in the Game! The M16A3 Custom, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n足球嘉年华特别版 M16A3。\nM16A3 现在是美国海军陆战队和某些陆军单位的前线人员的标准配置。它取消了固定式提把和机械瞄具的组合，将其换成了导轨，使这把枪可以同时安装提把和大多数军用或民用瞄准镜或观察设备。

original.value: Honey Badger EURO CUP

translation.value: 嘉年华版Honey Badge

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: High Special EURO 2016 camouflage version of the Honey Badger. Football is life…Get in the Game! The AAC Honey Badger PDW is an special PDW weapon based on the AR-15.Have integrated customized sub-sonic silencer. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，导轨。后坐力： 大\n足球嘉年华特别版 Honey Badger\nHoney Badger獾是一把特殊的 PDW 武器，配有整体定制的消音器。这把枪专为使用特殊的 ACR 口径亚音速弹药制造，用于取代 H&K MP5 和相似的 CQB 武器系统。

original.value: Fabarm STF 12 Compact EURO CUP

translation.value: 嘉年华版 Fabarm STF 12 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special EURO 2016 camouflage version of the Fabarm STF 12 Compact. Football is life…Get in the Game! Fabarm STF12 Compact is collection of innovative technologies for close combat fire arms. It use latest developments and materials and improve expirience of high dynamic combat for operator in fire, pump-action, reload, movement and other important areas of use of a weapon in the battle.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口\n足球嘉年华特别版 Fabarm STF 12 Compact。\nFabarm STF 12 Compact 将近距离战斗枪械的创新性技术以及最新材料开发的优秀材料融为一体。在所有重要作战场合都能提供了高度动态的战斗体验。

original.value: Remington R11 RSASS EURO CUP

translation.value: 嘉年华版 Remington R11 RSASS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special EURO 2016 camouflage version of the Remington R11 RSASS. Football is life…Get in the Game! Manufactured by: Remington Arms. This weapon succeeds where others fail, meeting any and all mission requirements with ease.The Remington Semi Automatic Sniper System is the culmination of a joint effort between Remington Arms and JP Enterprises to develop a highly accurate and superbly built rapid firing sniper rifle.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 足球嘉年华特别版 Remington R11 RSASS。 制造商：雷明顿武器公司。 这件武器弥补了其他武器的不足，轻松满足了所有任务的需求。雷明顿半自动狙击系统将这件武器变为了高精准度、高规格的速射狙击步枪。

original.value: IMBEL IA2 Jogos 2016

translation.value: 活力版IMBEL IA2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Jogos 2016 camouflage version of the IMBEL IA2. \n The IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nIMBEL IA2 的活力版。\nIA2 突击步枪是为特种部队研发的，用于取代上一型武器。IA2 优点众多：威力大，远程射击精准度高，对于极端环境有着很高的耐久性和可靠性。

original.value: Kel-Tec Jogos 2016

translation.value: 活力版 Kel-Tec 霰弹枪

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Jogos 2016 camouflage version of the Kel-Tec Shotgun. \n The Kel-Tec KSG is a bullpup pump action shotgun. It was developed by private US-based arms-making company Kel-tec CNC industries, which is known for their innovative products. It was officially announced at the ShotShow-2011, and production is scheduled to mid-2011.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nKel-Tec 霰弹枪的活力版。\nKel-Tec 是一款 12 号泵动霰弹枪，装有两个管状弹仓。每个弹仓可以容纳 7 发 2.75 英寸或 6 发 3 英寸霰弹。

original.value: CheyTac M200 Jogos 2016

translation.value: 活力版 CheyTac M200

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial Jogos 2016 camouflage version of the CheyTac M200. \n The CheyTac Intervention is an American bolt action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac LLC for long range soft target interdiction. It is fed by a detachable single stack magazine, which holds 7 rounds. CheyTac one of the longest ranges of all modern-day sniper rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\nCheyTac M200 的活力版。\nCheyTac M200 使用能容纳 7 发弹药的可拆卸单排弹匣供弹。其射程之远，大多数现代狙击步枪都难以与之相媲美。这款为远距离交战设计的单发栓动狙击步枪是美国产的。

original.value: SR-2 Veresk Jogos 2016

translation.value: 活力版 SR-2 Veresk

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Jogos 2016 camouflage version of the SR-2 Veresk. \n The SR-2 Veresk submachine gun has been in development since mid-1990s; It wasdeveloped by the Central Scientific-Research Institute of Precise Mechanical Engineering (TSNIITOCHMASH) under request of FSB. Afterthe successful development of powerful 9x21 SP-10armor piercing ammunition and SR-1 pistol to fire it, FSB also requested a submachine gun to fire same ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\nSR-2 Veresk 的活力版。\nSR-2 Veresk 冲锋枪是由精密机械工程中央科学研究院（TSNIITOCHMASH）所开发的。它是第一把发射强力的 9x21 毫米穿甲弹的冲锋枪。

original.value: Cyber Slayer FN SCAR-H

translation.value: 黑鲨 FN SCAR-H

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special "Cyber Slayer" version of FN SCAR-H. This weapon slightly increase damage against cyborgs. The Special Operations Forces (SOF) Combat Assault Rifle, or SCAR, is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM). The H fires the more powerful 7.62×51mm NATO from a newly designed 20-round magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大 黑鲨特别版 FN SCAR-H 。 这件武器对改造人有 +20% 伤害增益。 FN SCAR-H 是针对美军特战司令部提出的规格而专门设计制造的枪械。

original.value: Cyber Slayer Saiga Bullpup

translation.value: 黑鲨 Saiga 无托型

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Cyber Slayer" version of Saiga Bullpup. This weapon slightly increase damage against cyborgs. The Saiga 12S is the longer barreled version of saiga. In general Saiga are reliable and effective close hunting or close combat weapon, being much cheaper than its famous western counterparts.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等 黑鲨特别版 Saiga 无托型 这件武器对改造人有 +20% 伤害增益。 Saiga 无托型是 Saiga 的枪管加长版，用于近距离狩猎或者作为近距离战斗武器使用。它的造价远远低于那些更为知名的西方产竞争对手。

original.value: Cyber Slayer XM8 Compact

translation.value: 黑鲨 XM8 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special "Cyber Slayer" version of XM8 Compact. This weapon slightly increase damage against cyborgs. The XM8 Compact is special configuration with shortened barrel. This version of XM8 is very effective for close quarters battle (CQB).

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小 黑鲨特别版 XM8 Compact 。 这件武器对改造人有 +20% 伤害增益。 于 1990 年代至 2000 年代初由美国陆军开发的 XM8 Compact 步枪是一款轻量型突击武器，对恶劣环境有很强耐受性。

original.value: Cyber Slayer Stayer Scout

translation.value: 黑鲨 Steyr Scout

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special "Cyber Slayer" version of Stayer Scout. This weapon slightly increase damage against cyborgs. Scout Elite - compact and lightweight bolt-action sniper rifle. Designed in 1997 by an Austrian company in collaboration with the legendary marine Jeff Cooper. It has extensive list of innovatives: butt- store for an extra mag, original silencer and integral folding bipod. These features provide universality, high accuracy and high chance to make one shot kill.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小 黑鲨特别版 Steyr Scout 这件武器对改造人有 +220% 伤害增益。 Scout Elite 是一款紧凑的轻量化栓动狙击步枪。该枪于 90 年代末由一家和海军陆战队合作的奥地利公司设计，有许多创新之处：可容纳额外弹匣的枪托、可收缩的应急瞄具和整合在枪上的折叠式两脚架等等。

original.value: Cyber Slayer Glock 18C

translation.value: 黑鲨 Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High Special "Cyber Slayer" version of Glock 18C. This weapon slightly increase damage against cyborgs. The Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 大 黑鲨特别版 Glock 18C。 这件武器对改造人有 +20% 伤害增益。 Glock 18C 是一款全自动手枪，其拉杆式快慢机可以使它进行全自动射击。该枪是 Glock 17 的改型，应奥地利反恐单位的要求而开发。

original.value: Cyber Slayer Tactical Axe

translation.value: 黑鲨战术斧

original.value: TACTICAL AXE This Axe can hit enemies on increased distance. Tactical Axe increased damage. Secondary melee attack could kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! Special "Cyber Slayer" version of Tactical Axe. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

original.value: Cyber Slayer Fabarm STF 12 Compact

translation.value: 黑鲨 Fabarm STF 12 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle Special "Cyber Slayer" version of Fabarm STF12 Compact. This weapon slightly increase damage against cyborgs. Fabarm STF12 Compact is collection of innovative technologies for close combat fire arms. It use latest developments and materials and improve expirience of high dynamic combat for operator in fire, pump-action, reload, movement and other important areas of use of a weapon in the battle.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口后坐力： 中等 黑鲨特别版 Fabarm STF 12 Compact。 这件武器对改造人有 +20% 伤害增益。 Fabarm STF 12 Compact 将近距离战斗枪械的创新性技术以及最新材料开发的优秀材料融为一体。在所有重要作战场合都能提供了高度动态的战斗体验。

original.value: AK-103 Evil Santa

translation.value: 邪恶圣诞老人版 AK-103

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nEvil Santa version of the AK-103. \n The Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nAK-103 的邪恶圣诞老人版。\n这款 AK-74M 步枪的改型被俄罗斯的数个特种执法部门所使用。相比这把使用 5.45 毫米弹药的枪械，他们更乐意使用发射 7.62 毫米弹药，阻滞能力更为优秀的 AK-103。

original.value: FN Five-seveN Evil Santa

translation.value: 邪恶圣诞老人版 FN Five Seven

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nEvil Santa version of the FN Five-seveN. \n The FN Five-seven, trademarked as the Five-seveN, is a semi-automatic pistol designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. The pistol is named for its 5.7-mm (.224 in) bullet diameter, and the trademark capitalization style is intended to emphasize the manufacturer's initials—FN (Fabrique Nationale of Herstal).

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFN Five Seven 的邪恶圣诞老人版。\n这把半自动手枪以其 5.7 毫米 （.244 英寸）的子弹口径而命名。

original.value: Benelli M4 Super 90 Evil Santa

translation.value: 邪恶圣诞老人版 Benelli M4 Super 90

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nEvil Santa version of the Benelli M4 Super 90. \n The Benelli M4 Super 90 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nBenelli M4 Super 90 的邪恶圣诞老人版。\n这款由意大利贝内利武器公司生产的霰弹枪是半自动的，采用导气式原理，填装 12 号弹药。

original.value: PP-19 Bizon Evil Santa

translation.value: 邪恶圣诞老人版 PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Evil Santa version of the PP-19 Bizon. PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nPP-19 Bizon 的邪恶圣诞老人版。\n为了给反恐和执法单位配发一件在近距离战斗中具有高射速和高精准度的武器，俄罗斯内务部向著名枪械设计师卡拉什尼科夫的儿子发出了开发需求。枪管下方的圆筒常被误认为榴弹发射器，但它实际上是一个筒型弹匣。

original.value: AMP DSR-1 Evil Santa

translation.value: 邪恶圣诞老人版 AMP DSR-1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nEvil Santa version of the AMP DSR-1. \n The DSR-1 is a compact bolt-action rifle designed, manufactured and marketed by the German company DSR-Precision GmbH and was (until 2004) marketed also by the German company AMP Technical Services as a specialized sniper rifle for police sharpshooters. It has been adopted by the German GSG 9 counter-terrorist unit, as well as by other European special police units and agencies.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nAMP DSR-1 的邪恶圣诞老人版。\n这款专业化的狙击步枪被特警单位和有关部门所使用。其中最为人熟知的是德国反恐单位 GSG-9 也选用了这一枪械。一击即可穿透防护背心。

original.value: Frozen M16A3 Custom

translation.value: 破冰者 M16A3

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nFrozen version of M16A3 Custom has been made of unidentified material in unknown laboratory.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nM16A3 的破冰者版本，在秘密实验室中使用一种未知材料制造而成。

original.value: Frozen Honey Badger

translation.value: 破冰者 Honey Badge

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，导轨。后坐力： 大\nHoney Badge 的破冰者版本，在秘密实验室中使用一种未知材料制造而成。

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小\n该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。\nSteyr Scout 的破冰者版本，在秘密实验室中使用一种未知材料制造而成。

original.value: ATLAS MSBS Radon

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 MSBS Radon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\n"ATLAS" version of MSBS Radon\n MSBS Radon modular weapon system is an indigenous development of Polish Military Technical Academy (Wojskowa Akademia Techniczna) and Fabryka Broni „Lucznik” – Radom weapons factory. MSBS stands for “Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej” – modular small arms system.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n“阿特拉斯”版 MSBS Radon\nMSBS Radon 是由波兰军事科技学院开发的模块化武器。MS 代表着 “Modulowy Sytema” - 模块化系统。

original.value: ATLAS Derya MK-10 VR 102

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 Derya MK-10 VR 102

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium "ATLAS" version of Derya MK-10 VR 102 Manufactured by: Derya International Arms. Derya MK-10 VR 102 is modern shotgun with Vertical Magazine. This weapon manufactured according to SAAMI and CIP standards, also aluminum raw material and high-tech CNC machines used for production.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等 “阿特拉斯”版 Derya MK-10 VR 102 由德里亚国际武器公司制造。 Derya MK-10 VR 102 是一把使用垂直弹匣的现代霰弹枪。这是一把根据 SAAMI 和 CIP 标准制造的高质量武器，其制造过程中使用了铝作为材料，并在生产过程中使用了高科技的电脑数控机床。

original.value: ATLAS PM-84 Glauberyt Custom

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 PM-84 Glauberyt Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of PM-84 Glauberyt Custom\n The PM-84 Glauberyt Custom is a 4-burst round Polish submachine gun. It features a compact design, very good accuracy, high cyclic rate of fire and high damage. These characteristics provide the best way to make easiest one burst kill into upper-body and even hands.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿特拉斯”版 PM-84 Glauberyt Custom\nPM-84 Glauberyt Custom 是一把波兰的 4 连发冲锋枪。主打紧凑设计的枪身，有着非常好的精准度和极高的射速和伤害。这些特性使得对准上半身甚至手部连射成为了最简单的击杀方式。

original.value: ATLAS M40A5

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 M40A5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of M40A5\n This heavy bolt-action sniper rifle was based on the Remington 700 Short Action with .308 bolt face. It widely used by US Marine Corps because of high power, long range and high-capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿特拉斯”版 M40A5\n这把重型栓动狙击步枪因其大威力、长射程和高弹容被海军陆战队广泛使用。

original.value: ATLAS M1911A1

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 M1911A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"ATLAS" version of M1911A1\n The M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\n“阿特拉斯”版 M1911A1\nM1911A1 作为美国军队的标配手枪参加了两次世界大战、朝鲜战争和越南战争。该枪的改进型被美国军队采用之后作为一件功勋卓著的武器一直服役到 1980 年代中期。

original.value: ATLAS Jagdkommando

translation.value: 阿特拉斯狩猎之令

original.value: "ATLAS" version of Jagdkommando\n Jagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: “阿特拉斯”版狩猎之令\n狩猎之令是一把独特的刀，它是由一整片不锈钢磨制而成的。三面锋利的刀边最终拧成一股，多洞血槽能在击中的同时放血，一气呵成。

original.value: ATLAS M249 Para

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 M249 Para

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"ATLAS" version of M249 Para\n It's gas operated and air cooled. It has a quick-change barrel, allowing the gunner to rapidly replace an overheated or jammed barrel. A folding bipod is attached near the front of the gun, though an M192 LGM tripod is also available.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n“阿特拉斯”版 M249 Para\nM249 是一款采用了风冷和导气式自动原理的机枪。它的快拆枪管允许射手在枪管过热或卡弹时快速更换枪管。

original.value: ATLAS MAG-7

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 MAG-7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of MAG-7\n The MAG-7 was developed as a close quarters combat weapon, which would combine the aspects of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿特拉斯”版 MAG-7\nMAG-7 是被作为近距离战斗武器而开发的，它将冲锋枪的紧凑结构与泵动式霰弹枪结合了起来。

original.value: ATLAS Magpul FMG-9

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 Magpul FMG 9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of Magpul FMG-9\n The Magpul FMG-9 is a prototype for a new generation of folding submachine guns, designed by Magpul Industries in 2008. It has detachable iron sigh with very fast zoom in and insanely high rate of fire. These features make this submachine gun incredibly dangerous at close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿特拉斯”版 Magpul FMG 9\nMagpul FMG 9 是一把次世代的可折叠冲锋枪原型产品。它配有可快速瞄准的可拆卸机械瞄具，并且有着疯狂的射速。这些特点使得这把冲锋枪在近距离时极其危险。

original.value: ATLAS Dragunov SVU-AS

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 Dragunov SVU-AS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. "ATLAS" version of Dragunov SVU-AS The OTs-03 SVU aka Sniper Rifle Shortened is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. A special muzzle brake was added that could absorb up to 40% of the recoil energy and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. The other main improvements made to the SVU over the SVD include replacement of the butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight; and shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieved perfect balance for the weapon.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 “阿特拉斯”版 Dragunov SVU-AS 受 AST-41 Dragunov SR 的启发，Dragunov SVU-AS 是在 SVT 的基础上进行研发，并满足了俄罗斯内务部安保部队需求的产品。这把枪上加装了能吸收多达 40% 后坐能量的枪口制退器，并且在机匣上柔性连接了装有迭板殚簧的可伸缩枪托。过大的枪声也通过增加的消音器得到了改善。其他改进还还包括升级枪托、手枪式握把、扳机以及装配式瞄具。最终，对枪管的 100 毫米缩短使得这件武器达到了完美的平衡。

original.value: ATLAS CZ 75-Auto

translation.value: 阿特拉斯 CZ 75-Auto

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of CZ 75-Auto\n The CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿特拉斯”版 CZ 75-Auto\n由捷克共和国制造的 CZ 75-Auto 是一把配备快慢机、且同时拥有半自动和全自动两种开火模式的手枪。1986 年亮相的它拥有双层弹匣和锤锻枪管，并且采用全金属构造。

original.value: ATLAS Tactical Axe

translation.value: 阿特拉斯战术斧

original.value: "ATLAS" version of Tactical Axe\n Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

translation.value: “阿特拉斯”版战术斧\n战术斧既是工具也是优秀的近战武器，这就是近来战术斧在执法单位和现役军事组织中越来越受欢迎的原因。

original.value: FN-SCAR-H BRA Anniversary

translation.value: 巴服周年纪念版 FN SCAR-H

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nBrazil Anniversary version of FH-SCAR-H.\n The FH-SCAR-H is an assault rifle of the The Operations Forces (SOF) Combat Assault Rifle, manufactured by S&T Daewoo. It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口\n巴服周年纪念版 FN SCAR-H。\nFN SCAR-H 是根据美军特战司令部要求的规格进行特别设计和制造的。该把配备快慢机的突击步枪使用 20 或 30 发弹匣供弹，采用导气式原理，需要抵肩射击，填装5.56 毫米北约弹。

original.value: Barrett M107 BRA Anniversary

translation.value: 巴服周年纪念版 Barrett M107

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle Brazil Anniversary version of Barrett M107. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The Barett M107 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 巴服周年纪念版 Barrett M107。 Barrett M107 是一款枪管后坐式半自动反器材步枪，被世界上许多作战单位和军队所使用。

original.value: XM8 Compact BRA Anniversary

translation.value: 巴服周年纪念版 XM8 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nBrazil Anniversary version of XM8 Compact .\n The XM8 Compact is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口\n巴服周年纪念版 XM8 Compact.\n于 1990 年代至 2000 年代初由美国陆军开发的 XM8 Compact 步枪是一款轻量型突击武器，极其轻便，对恶劣环境有很强耐受性。

original.value: Benelli M4 Super 90 BRA Anniversary

translation.value: 巴服周年纪念版 Benelli M4 Super 90

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\nBrazil Anniversary version of Benelli M4 Super 90 .\n The Benelli M4 Super 90 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口\n巴服周年纪念版 Benelli M4 Super 90。\n这款由意大利贝内利武器公司生产的霰弹枪是半自动的，采用导气式原理，填装 12 号弹药。

original.value: Anubis AK-103

translation.value: “阿努比斯”AK-103

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Anubis" version of AK-103\n The Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n“阿努比斯”版 AK-103\n这款 AK-74M 步枪的改型被俄罗斯的数个特种执法单位所使用。相比这把使用 5.45 毫米弹药的枪械，他们更乐意使用发射 7.62 毫米弹药，阻滞能力更为优秀的 AK-103。

original.value: Anubis MSBS Radon

translation.value: “阿努比斯”MSBS Radon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\n"Anubis" version of MSBS Radon\n MSBS Radon modular weapon system is an indigenous development of Polish Military Technical Academy (Wojskowa Akademia Techniczna) and Fabryka Broni „Lucznik” – Radom weapons factory. MSBS stands for “Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej” – modular small arms system.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nMSBS Radon 是一件由波兰军事科技学院开发的模块化武器。MS 代表“Modulowy Systema ”模块化系统。MSBS Radon 在长点射后依然能够保持易操控的性能，它注定会进入每位有自尊心的步枪手的枪柜。

original.value: Anubis VEPR

translation.value: “阿努比斯”VEPR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Anubis" version of VEPR\n The Vepr 12 is produced by "Molot" factory, which also makes RPK-74 machine guns and Vepr brand semi-automatic hunting rifles. All "Vepr" brand rifles and shotguns are broadly based on the RPK-74 light machinegun designs, adapted for civilian purpose and appropriate ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n“阿努比斯”版 VEPR\n所有“VEPR”品牌的步枪与霰弹枪基本上都是从 RPK 的基础上发展而来的，为满足民用需求以及发射对应的弹药进行了改进。

original.value: Anubis Sidewinder Venom

translation.value: “阿努比斯”Sidewinder Venom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"Anubis" version of Sidewinder Venom\n Sidewinder Venom is the mag-fed tactical pump-action shotgun system. It is the upgraded version of Mossberg 590. There are lots of features: the forend improves accuracy, detachable grip increases RPM, Drum Mag provides rapid reloads and high ammunition capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿努比斯”版 Sidewinder Venom\nSidewinder Venom 是一套弹匣供弹的战术泵动霰弹枪系统。它是 Mossberg 500 定制版的升级型号，其特点包括提升了精确度的前护木，提升射速的可拆卸握把，还装有弹鼓使其具有很快的装弹速度和很高的装弹量。

original.value: Anubis PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: “阿努比斯”PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium "Anubis" version of PP-19 Bizon PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n“阿努比斯”版 PP-19 Bizon\n为了给反恐和执法单位配发一件在近距离战斗中具有高射速和高精度的武器，俄罗斯内务部向著名枪械设计师卡拉什尼科夫的儿子发出了开发需求。枪管下方的圆筒常被误认为榴弹发射器，但它实际上是一个筒型弹匣。

original.value: Anubis PP2000

translation.value: “阿努比斯”PP2000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"Anubis" version of PP2000\n PP2000 is a Russian submachine gun. It was created by the KBP Instrument Design Bureau. It has high rate of fire and high damage, these make it extremely well suited to close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿努比斯”版 PP2000\nPP2000 是一款俄罗斯冲锋枪。由于同时具备高射速和高伤害，这款武器非常适合近距离战斗。

original.value: Anubis ALPINE

translation.value: “阿努比斯”Alpine

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\n"Anubis" version of ALPINE\n Unique Alpine TPG-1 rifle is manufactured in Austria by the Unique Alpine AG. TPG-1 is a modular, high precision rifle which can be used for special military and law enforcement applications.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\n“阿努比斯”版 Alpine\nUnique Alpine 狙击步枪由澳大利亚 Unique Alpine AG 制造，是一款高精准度模块化步枪。该枪在特种作战和执法行动中被广泛使用。

original.value: Anubis Orsis T-5000

translation.value: “阿努比斯”Orsis T-5000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"Anubis" version of Orsis T-5000\n The Orsis T-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS, and is produced in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at the international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil. The Sniper Rifle has high accuracy and high chance to make one shot kill. Now even protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies at close quarters and middle distances.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿努比斯”版 Orsis T-5000\nOrsis T-5000 是一把俄罗斯的栓动狙击步枪。该枪于 2011 年在一次俄罗斯武器国际展会中首次亮相。它拥有高精准度和极强的穿透力。即使是强力的防护装备也不能有效阻挡一次直接命中。

original.value: Anubis COLT Python Elite

translation.value: “阿努比斯”COLT Python Elite

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: High\n"Anubis" version of COLT Python Elite\n The Colt Python Elite is a .357 Magnum caliber revolver formerly manufactured by Colt's Manufacturing Company of Hartford, Connecticut . It is sometimes referred to as a "Combat Magnum".

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\n“阿努比斯”版 COLT Python Elite\nCOLT Python Elite也被称为“战斗型马格南”，是一款 .357 马格南口径左轮手枪。

original.value: Anubis Walther P99

translation.value: “阿努比斯”Walther P99

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"Anubis" version of Walther P99\n This semi-automatic pistol is widely used as a duty pistol for law enforcement all over the world because of high quality, great hip accuracy and original design. It has a lot of pros: double-action trigger, puddle-style magazine release for both hands, manual decocker and interchangeable backstraps.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\n“阿努比斯”版 Walther P99\n这款半自动手枪因其高品质、腰射时的高精度以及原创设计被全世界的执法部门广泛使用。它具有许多优点，包括双动式扳机、左右手都可以操作的下凹式弹匣释放按钮、手动式击锤降下杆和可更换的背带。

original.value: Glock 18C "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\n"Absolute Power" version of Glock 18C\nThe Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 大\n“绝对”版 Glock 18C\nGlock 18C 是一款全自动手枪，位于底部的拉杆式快慢机可以使它进行全自动射击。该枪是 Glock 17 的改型，应奥地利反恐单位的要求而开发。

original.value: Beretta ARX160 "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 Beretta ARX160

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\n"Absolute Power" version of Beretta ARX160\nThe Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n“绝对”版 Beretta ARX160\nBeretta ARX160 是生产于 2008 年的突击步枪。这把武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害或在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲子弹。

original.value: SAI GRY AR-15 "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 SAI GRY AR-15

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\n"Absolute Power" version of SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 is the great assault rifle for tactical operations and competitions. It`s a premium weapon that you can trust with original jailbrake muzzle and extended mag.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n“绝对”版 SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 是一把适用于战术行动和竞赛的绝佳突击步枪。配备原版越狱枪口与扩充弹匣，这是一把值得信赖的高级武器。

original.value: Saiga H.G.C. Custom "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 Saiga H.G.C 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Absolute Power" version of Saiga H.G.C. Custom\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n“绝对”版 Saiga H.G.C.定制版\nSaiga H.G.C.定制版是一把12 号口径的战斗霰弹枪，支持各类改装。和卡拉什尼科夫步枪的改型一样，这是一把滚转式枪击、弹匣供弹的导气式武器。

original.value: DP-12 "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 DP-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\n"Absolute Power" version of DP-12\nThe DP-12 double barrel pump is like no shotgun that you have ever seen before. The one of a kind shotgun not only supports two magazine tubes but two barrels that do double damage!

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等\n“绝对”版 DP-12\n双枪管泵动式的特性使得 DP-12 与其他霰弹枪截然不同。这把独一无二的霰弹枪不仅拥有双弹匣，更有能输出双倍伤害的双枪管。

original.value: H&K UMP "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 H&K UMP

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Absolute Power" version of H&K UMP\nThe UMP is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler & Koch. It is a recoil-operated, magazine-fed submachine gun firing from a closed bolt. The UMP is chambered for larger cartridges than other submachine guns like the MP5.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n“绝对”版 H&K UMP\n由黑克勒&科赫公司研制生产的 UMP 是一款使用枪管后坐原理，弹匣供弹、闭膛待击构造的冲锋枪。与其他冲锋枪不同，该枪使用口径更大的弹药以提升其阻滞力。

original.value: H&K MP5A5 Custom "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 H&K MP5A5 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Have the unique attachment RAMBO SP-6 1.8x Fast Scope. "Absolute Power" version of H&K MP5A5 Custom The H&K MP5 is the classic configuration of the MP5 submachine gun developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K). It features comfort recoil, great zoom in speed and high damage that guarantee headshot a close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小 独特附件：RAMBO SP-6 1.8x 快速瞄准镜。 “绝对”版 H&K MP5A5 定制版 定制版 H&K MP5A5 是经典配置版 H&K G36 冲锋枪，出自 1960 年代德国小型军火制造商黑克勒&科赫 (H&K) 公司之手。这件武器具有适度的后坐力、极佳的瞄准速度及高杀伤力，可保证近距离爆头。

"Absolute Power" version of M14 Crazy Horse The Crazy Horse or M14SE is a semi-automatic sniper rifle. It is chambered for the 7.62×51mm NATO cartridge and is built by Smith Enterprise Inc. and is used by various units within the US Military.

original.value: Halloween 2017 XM8 LMG

translation.value: 反半机械人版 XM8 LMG

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special "Halloween 2017" version of XM8 LMG. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. The XM8 LMG is special version with notelonger barrel and 100 round dueal drum "Beta C-Mag".

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大 XM8 LMG 的反半机械人”特别版。 这把武器可对改造人造成 100% 的额外伤害。 XM8 LMG 由美国陆军在 XM8 突击步枪的基础上研制，是一款于 1990 年代末至 2000 年代初制造的轻量化机枪。

original.value: Halloween 2017 VEPR

translation.value: 反半机械人版VEPR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Halloween 2017" version of VEPR. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 250%. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased ammount of ammo and increased rpm value. The Vepr 12 is produced by "Molot" factory, which also makes RPK-74 machine guns and Vepr brand semi-automatic hunting rifles. All "Vepr" brand rifles and shotguns are broadly based on the RPK-74 light machinegun designs, adapted for civilian purpose and appropriate ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 Vepr的“反半机械人版”特别版。 该枪械提供更高的装弹量、更高的备弹量以及更高的射速。 这把武器可对改造人造成 250% 的额外伤害。 所有“Vepr”品牌的步枪与霰弹枪基本上都是从 RPK 的基础上发展而来的，为满足民用需求以及发射对应的弹药进行了改进。

original.value: Halloween 2017 PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: 反半机械人版 PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Halloween 2017" version of PP-19 Bizon. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%.< PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 PP-19 Bizon 的“2017 万圣节反半机械人版”特别版。 这把武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 为了给反恐和执法单位配发一件在近距离战斗中具有高射速和高精度的武器，俄罗斯内务部向著名枪械设计师卡拉什尼科夫的儿子提出了开发要求。枪管下方的圆筒常被误认为榴弹发射器，但它实际上是一个筒型弹匣。

original.value: Halloween 2017 Tavor STAR-21

translation.value: 反半机械人版 Tavor SNR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Halloween 2017" version of Tavor STAR-21. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 250%. The Tavor STAR-21 is highly effective marksman rifle in the combat at long distances and modificated to single shot firemode.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 Tavor SNR 的“反半机械人版”特别版。 这把武器可对改造人造成 250% 的额外伤害。 Tavor TAR-21 是 Karkom 的特等射手步枪型，在远距离上具有很高的效能，同时该枪也延续了 Tavor TAR-21 枪族一贯的品质。

original.value: Halloween 2017 FN Five-seveN

translation.value: 反半机械人版 FN Five Seven

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Halloween 2017" version of FN Five-seveN. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 150%. The FN Five-seven, trademarked as the Five-seveN, is a semi-automatic pistol designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. The pistol is named for its 5.7-mm (.224 in) bullet diameter, and the trademark capitalization style is intended to emphasize the manufacturer's initials---FN (Fabrique Nationale of Herstal).

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等 FN Five Seven 的“反半机械人版”特别版。 这把武器可对改造人造成 150% 的额外伤害。 这款半自动手枪因其使用的弹药口径为 5.7 毫米（.244 英寸）而得名。它的全称是 FN Five-seveN，既 5.7 毫米手枪。

original.value: Ultimate Hunter MSBS Radon

translation.value: 终极猎手MSBS Radon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\n"Ultimate Hunter" version of MSBS Radon\nMSBS Radon modular weapon system is an indigenous development of Polish Military Technical Academy (Wojskowa Akademia Techniczna) and Fabryka Broni „Lucznik” – Radom weapons factory. MSBS stands for “Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej” – modular small arms system.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n“终极猎手”版 MSBS Radon\nMSBS Radon 是由波兰军事科技学院开发的模块化武器。MS 代表着 “Modulowy Sytema” - 模块化系统。MSBS Radon 在长点射后依然能够保持易操控的性能，它注定会进入每位有自尊心的步枪手的枪柜，成为他们的主要武器。

original.value: Gold ACR

translation.value: 黄金版 ACR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Golden version of the ACR . This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The ACR is abbreviation of Advanced Combat Rifle. It was developed by United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大 黄金版 ACR。 这把武器可对改造人造成更大伤害。 高级战斗步枪，简称 ACR ，是美国陆军一项耗资 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。

original.value: Radiation Beretta ARX160

translation.value: Beretta ARX160 “核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Radiation" version of Beretta ARX160.\nThe Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n特别的“核武器”版 Beretta ARX160。\nBeretta ARX160 是生产于 2008 年的突击步枪。这把武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害或在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲子弹。

original.value: Radiation PKP Pecheneg

translation.value: PKP Pecheneg “核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Radiation" version of PKP Pecheneg.\nThe PKP Pecheneg is a Russian machine gun chambered for the 7.62×54mm round. It has great damage, high firing range and good accuracy. It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n特别“核武器”版 PKP Pecheneg。\nPKP Pecheneg 是一款俄罗斯机枪，使用 7.62x54 毫米子弹，伤害值高、射程长且精准度出众。它有一个整体的折叠型两足支架，可以提高卧姿射击时的稳定性和长射程精确性。

original.value: Radiation MAG-7

translation.value: MAG-7 “核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Radiation" version of MAG-7.\nThe MAG-7 was developed as a close quarters combat weapon, which would combine the aspects of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\n特别“核武器”版 MAG-7。\n与广受欢迎的 Fabarm ATF-12 相比，造独特的 MAG-7 虽然火力弱了一些，但射程更长、每分钟转数更快。简而言之，当在战场上进行近距离厮杀时，MAG-7 一定不会让你失望。

original.value: Radiation DP-12

translation.value: DP-12 “核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Radiation" version of DP-12.\nThe DP-12 double barrel pump is like no shotgun that you have ever seen before. The one of a kind shotgun not only supports two magazine tubes but two barrels that do double damage!

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 小\n特别“核武器”版 DP-12。\n双枪管泵动式的特性使得 DP-12 与其他霰弹枪截然不同。这把独一无二的霰弹枪不仅拥有双弹匣，更有能输出双倍伤害的双枪管！

original.value: Radiation Honey Badger

translation.value: Honey Badge“核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Radiation" version of Honey Badger.\nThe AAC Honey Badger PDW is an special PDW weapon based on the AR-15.Have integrated customized sub-sonic silencer. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、导轨。后坐力： 大\n特别“核武器”版 Honey Badger。\nHoney Badger 是一款特别的单兵自卫武器，有着的集成定制消音器。它是专为特殊的次音速 ACR 口径子弹设计的，代替了 H&K MP5 和类似的近距离作战武器系统。

original.value: Radiation CZ Scorpion EVO

translation.value: CZ Scorpion EVO“核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Radiation" version of CZ Scorpion EVO.\nCZ Scorpion is the one of the best sub machine guns. EVO features futuristic design, comfort recoil and increased penetrability, high enough to make a hole in any helmet at close range.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n特别的“核武器”版 CZ Scorpion EVO。\nCZ Scorpion 是一款高品质武器，可与最出色的冲锋枪相媲美。Evo 版有着新潮的设计、可操纵的后坐力以及增强的穿透力 — 足以穿透近距离范围内的任何头盔。

original.value: Radiation AX308

translation.value: AX308 “核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Schmidt & Bender 4.5x fast-scope. Special "Radiation" version of AX308. Use high-caliber, heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs.. Accuracy International AX308 rifle was the first weapon of the newest generation of AW (Arctic Warfare) series. From their predecessors it inherited all positive qualities - durability, reliability, high accuracy, and due to last warfare technologies - ease of maintenance.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口 拥有独特附件Schmidt & Bender 4.5x 快速瞄准。 特别的“核武器”版 AX308。 采用大口径、重型穿甲子弹，可对四肢造成额外伤害。。 AX308 狙击步枪标志着新一代北冰洋作战武器的诞生，并且继承了所有前代的优秀品质：耐久、可靠、精准度高且容易维护。

original.value: Radiation R11 RSASS

translation.value: “核武器”Remington R11 RSASS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special "Radiation" version of R11 RSASS. Manufactured by: Remington Arms. This weapon succeeds where others fail, meeting any and all mission requirements with ease.The Remington Semi Automatic Sniper System is the culmination of a joint effort between Remington Arms and JP Enterprises to develop a highly accurate and superbly built rapid firing sniper rifle.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 “核武器”特别版 Remington R11 RSASS。 制造商：雷明顿武器公司。 这件武器弥补了其他武器的不足，轻松满足了所有任务的需求。雷明顿自动狙击系统将这件武器变为了高精准度、高规格的速射狙击步枪。

original.value: Radiation M1911A1

translation.value: M1911A1 “核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Radiation" version of M1911A1.\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口\n特别的“核武器”版 M1911A1。\n在一战、二战、朝鲜战争及越南战争期间，M1911A1 是美军的标配随身武器。美国军方采用了改良的设计，它出色服役直至 20 世纪 80 年代中期。

original.value: Radiation S&W M&P R8

translation.value: S&W M&P R8“核武器”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Radiation" version of S&W M&P R8.\nIt`s the eight-shot .357 modern tactical revolver, named the Military & Police (M&P) R8, staffed with a Leupold X1.3 DeltaPoint reflex sight. S&W M&P R8 features modern design, high damage and high accuracy.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜\n特别“核武器”版 S&W M&P R8。\n这是一款八发 .357 现代战术左轮手枪，被命名为 S&W M&P R8，配备 X1.3 倍反射式瞄准镜。R8 有着现代设计、高伤害值和高精准度。

original.value: Radiation Katana

translation.value: 武士刀 “核武器”

original.value: Katana This sword can hit enemies on increased distance. Katana has increased damage. Secondary melee attack is so strong that even will kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! Special "Radiation" version of Katana. The katana is characterized by its distinctive appearance: a curved, slender, single-edged blade with a circular or squared guard and long grip to accommodate two hands. It has historically been associated with the samurai of feudal Japan and has become renowned for its sharpness and strength.

translation.value: 武士刀 这把刀可击中更远的敌人。 武士刀有着的增加伤害。 它的二次近战攻击力非常强大，甚至能干掉身着防刺背心的敌人！ 特别的“核武器”版武士刀。 独特的外观是武士刀的一大特点：一把纤细、弯曲的单刃刀，带一个圆形或方形的护手，刀柄可容两只手抓握。在历史上，它经常被与日本封建武士联系在一起，以其锋利和力量而知名。

original.value: Radiation Tactical Axe

translation.value: 战术斧 “核武器”

original.value: TACTICAL AXE This Axe can hit enemies on increased distance. Tactical Axe increased damage. Secondary melee attack could kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! Special "Radiation" version of Tactical Axe. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

translation.value: 战术斧 这把斧头可击中更远的敌人。 战术斧有着的增加伤害。 它的二次近战攻击力非常强大，可以干掉身着防刺背心的敌人！ 特别的“核武器”版战术斧。 战术斧通常即被用作工具，也被用作良好的近战武器。这也是近年来战术斧在执法和现役军人群体中越来越受欢迎的原因。战术斧通常即被用作工具，也被用作良好的近战武器。

original.value: Xmas Imbel IA2

translation.value: IMBEL IA2 “光辉”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Xmas 2017 skin of Imbel IA2.\nThe IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\nIMBEL IA2 特别圣诞版皮肤。\nIA2 突击步枪是为特种部队研发的，用于取代上一型武器。IA2 优点众多：威力大，远程射击精准度高，在极端环境下有很高的耐久性和可靠性。

original.value: Xmas Fabarm P.S.S.10

translation.value: Fabarm P.S.S.10 “光辉”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Xmas skin of Fabarm P.S.S.10.\nFabarm P.S.S.10 is a modern semi-automatic shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. It has extremely high RPM, great accuracy and smooth recoil.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFabarm P.S.S.10 特别圣诞版皮肤。\nFabarm P.S.S.10 是一款半自动现代霰弹枪。射速极高，精准度出众，后坐力较小。

original.value: Xmas PP2000

translation.value: PP2000 “光辉”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Xmas 2017 skin of PP2000.\nPP2000 is a Russian submachine gun. It was created by the KBP Instrument Design Bureau. It has high rate of fire and high damage, these make it extremely well suited to close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nPP2000 特别圣诞版皮肤。\nPP2000 是一把俄制冲锋枪。它的高射速和高伤害尤其适合在近距离战斗中施展。

original.value: Xmas M40A5

translation.value: M40A5 “光辉”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special Xmas 2017 skin of M40A5. This heavy bolt-action sniper rifle was based on the Remington 700 Short Action with .308 bolt face. It widely used by US Marine Corps because of high power, long range and high-capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小 M40A5 特别圣诞版皮肤。 这把重型栓动狙击步枪因其大威力、长射程和高弹容被海军陆战队广泛使用。

original.value: Xmas Rhino 60DS

translation.value: Rhino 60 DS “光辉”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Xmas 2017 skin of Rhino 60DS.\nThe Chiappa Rhino is a revolver produced by Chiappa Firearms of Italy.The new Chiappa Rhino has revolutionized the revolver with a patented design that tames the prehistoric characteristic that most revolvers possess. It is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nRhino 60 DS 特别圣诞版皮肤。\nRhino 60 DS 的专利设计给左轮手枪带来了一场革命。位于该枪底部的空腔是自发明以来大多数左轮手枪都不曾有过的设计。枪的重心因此降低，从而减少了后坐力和枪口的上跳。

AK 阿尔法

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nAK 阿尔法是一种革命性的武器升级方法。一支由以色列国防军特种部队中精心挑选出来的专业神枪手和工程师组成的团队设计了这款阿尔法步枪。这样，射手就能够使用世界上最可靠的武器最大限度地发挥他的射击能力了。一个标志性的武器平台现在重生了，就像新版以色列的卡拉什尼科夫一样，成为尖端技术。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。AK 阿尔法配备了战术消音器、AK 阿尔法抑制器、战术握把、Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS 和哈特曼 MH1 RDS。

original.value: Gold Ak-Alpha

translation.value: 黄金版 AK 阿尔法

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of Ak-Alpha. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of the ACR CQB . This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The ACR CQB is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

original.value: Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: 猎豹 GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6 倍瞄准镜。 猎豹 GM6 Lynx 是一款匈牙利半自动反器材步枪，开发于 80 年代后期。它采用无托结构和伸缩枪管，对于有着如此火力的武器来说，它的造型相对紧凑。这把枪的重量分布也使得人们可以采用无依托立姿操作它，这对于其它大口径步枪来说要困难的多。

original.value: FN FAL DSA-58

translation.value: FN FAL DSA-58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n美国公司 DSA（David Selveggio Arms）制造了一种名为 DSA-58 的 FAL 复制版，它与 StG-58 使用同样的斯太尔-戴姆勒-普赫生产线设备。民用型号为半自动型，但是军事和执法单位的客户可以选择 620 发/分钟全自动循环速率的选射型号。该型号拥有别具特色的舒适战术握把以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。

original.value: Fostech Origin-12

translation.value: Fostech Origin-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nProduced by USA-based manufacturer Fostech Outdoors, Origin-12 is considered to be the fastest semi-automatic shotgun in the world. Mainly used for sports and hunting, it packs a substantial punch and can use drum magazines with up to 30 rounds. Combined with the impressive RPM, it can create a real storm of metal downrange.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n总部位于美国的制造商 Fostech Outdoors 生产的 Origin-12 被认为是世界上最快的半自动霰弹枪之一。主要用于体育运动和打猎，射击目标时杀伤力十足，而且弹鼓可容纳 30 发子弹。这款武器拥有惊人的射速，能让目标感受真正枪林弹雨的滋味。

translation.value: 黄金版 Fostech Origin-12
