Produced by USA-based manufacturer Fostech Outdoors, Origin-12 is considered to be the fastest semi-automatic shotgun in the world. Mainly used for sports and hunting, it packs a substantial punch and can use drum magazines with up to 30 rounds. Combined with the impressive RPM, it can create a real storm of metal downrange.

original.value: Uzi Pro

translation.value: Uzi Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nUZI PRO SMG is the newest member of the legendary UZI family one of the most popular weapon families in the world, with millions of units sold around the globe. The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nUZI PRO SMG 是传奇的 UZI 系列的最新成员，UZI 是全世界最受欢迎的武器系列，在全球已售出几百万套。UZI PRO 是执法机关、要员保镖以及特种部队隐蔽携带或公开使用的理想枪支。

original.value: Banana Claymore.\nMake fun of your opponents. Put a banana under his feet and knock him down!

translation.value: 香蕉大剑。\n戏弄一下你的对手。放一根香蕉在他们脚下，让他们滑倒吧！

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n克罗地亚 VHS-2 是 VHS 步枪的改良版本，它保留了原版的无托结构设计、口径、枪管长度以及内部机制，但引入了更加传统的全新单连发选择掣。经过重新设计的手提把手、长度可调节的枪托以及双手皆可操作的弹壳弹射系统，不到一分钟即可实现左右切换。

original.value: M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: M48 鲍威刀

original.value: M48 Bowie Knife \nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: M48 鲍威刀 \n它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身着防近战背心的敌人。\nM48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重制版，它具有坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。此武器可充分满足你所有炫酷的战术需求。

original.value: Remington MSR

translation.value: 雷明顿 MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHas unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor.\nRemington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n具备独特附件博士能 4x 瞄准镜和雷明顿 MSR 消音器。\n雷明顿 MSR 是一款轻铝材质手动栓式狙击步枪，在 21 世纪晚期由雷明顿武器公司开发。MSR 表示模块化狙击步枪，因为该武器可通过切换枪管和枪栓实现 .338, .300 和 7.62 口径快速切换。这是一款现代化的精准步枪，就是价格有点昂贵。美军以及其它几个国家已将 MSR 投入使用。

original.value: Gold Remington MSR

translation.value: 黄金版雷明顿 MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of the Remington MSR. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 黄金版雷明顿 MSR。 此武器对生物机器人造成的伤害有所提升。 具备独特附件博士能 4x 瞄准镜和雷明顿 MSR消音器。 雷明顿 MSR 是一款轻铝材质手动栓式狙击步枪，在 21 世纪晚期由雷明顿武器公司开发。MSR 表示模块化狙击步枪，因为该武器可通过切换枪管和枪栓实现 .338, .300 和 7.62 口径快速切换。这是一款现代化的精准步枪，就是价格有点昂贵。美军以及其它几个国家已将 MSR 投入使用。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope . Recoil: Medium\nThe Degtyaryov machine gun is a light machine gun firing the 7.62x54mmR cartridge that was primarily used by the Soviet Union starting in 1928\n The DP-27 was an improvement of the earlier DP-26, both designed by Vasily Degtyaryov. The DP-27 was relatively cheap and easy to manufacture - early models had fewer than 80 parts. The DP was especially able to withstand dirt in a reliable fashion. In tests it was buried in sand and mud and was still capable of firing more than 500 rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜 。后坐力： 中等\nDP-27 是一款轻型机枪，使用 7.62x54 弹药\n它的一些早期型号包含多大 80 个部件。这种轻型机枪的一个主要优势在于其稳定性，经过多次压力测试与时间证明。

original.value: Gold DP-27

translation.value: 黄金版 DP-27

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope . Recoil: Medium Golden version of DP-27. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The Degtyaryov machine gun is a light machine gun firing the 7.62x54mmR cartridge that was primarily used by the Soviet Union starting in 1928 The DP-27 was an improvement of the earlier DP-26, both designed by Vasily Degtyaryov. The DP-27 was relatively cheap and easy to manufacture - early models had fewer than 80 parts. The DP was especially able to withstand dirt in a reliable fashion. In tests it was buried in sand and mud and was still capable of firing more than 500 rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜 。后坐力： 中等 黄金版 DP-27。 该武器可对生物机器人造成 50% 额外伤害。 DP-27 是一款轻型机枪，使用 7.62x54 弹药 它的一些早期型号包含多大 80 个部件。这种轻型机枪的一个主要优势在于其稳定性，经过多次压力测试与时间证明。

original.value: Taurus Judge

translation.value: Taurus Judge

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nTaurus Judge is an extremely powerful revolver that uses .410 shotgun shells for ammo. Due to the short barrel, the pellet spread is enormous and makes the gun less effective at distance. Point-black, however, the Judge kicks like a horse. Ammunition size and weight limit the cylinder to only 5 rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等\nTaurus Judge 是一款使用 .410 霰弹枪弹药的超强大左轮手枪。因为枪筒较短的缘故，弹着散布很广，不过这把枪在近战中非常强大。

original.value: Football 2018 Enfield L85A2 Custom

translation.value: Enfield L85A2 Custom “世界锦标赛”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of Enfield L85A2 Custom.\nIt`s a custom 3-burst round British bullpup assault rifle. It has high cyclic rate of fire with minimal recoil. The L85A2 is a revamped version of the L85A1 with improved internal and external components. As a result, these rifles are recognized as reliable, very accurate and easy to use.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nEnfield L85A2 Custom 的特别 世界锦标赛版。\nL85A2 是一款可以连射 3 发子弹的英国突击步枪。它的优势在于高射速和低后坐力。

original.value: Football 2018 Mossberg 500 Custom

translation.value: Mossberg 500 Custom “世界锦标赛”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of Mossberg 500 Custom.\nSpecial custom version of Mossberg 500 with installed: Full Quad Rail System and MagPul MBUS front/rear sight, Angled Fore Grip, Forend, SGA Stock. This improvements allows easily and quickly equip and protect shotgun. Also provides a comfortable and stable user interface that reduces fatigue and allows for more precise weapon control.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nMossberg 500 Custom “世界锦标赛”特制版。\n这款 Mossberg 500 Custom 配有预安装四向导轨系统、直角前握把和前护木，不仅提高了后坐力控制和霰弹枪的射击精度，同时改善了人体工程学。

original.value: Football 2018 SCAR-L PDW

translation.value: SCAR-L PDW “世界锦标赛”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of SCAR-L PDW.\nThe FN SCAR PDW is a tailored design to meet the needs of aircraft, watercraft, vehicle operators and personal security details who have confined operational spaces or who have a desire to conceal their weapon. Small sizes combined with high efficiency, high reliability and ease of use.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\nSCAR-L PDW 世界锦标赛特制版。\nSCAR-L PDW 能满足海陆空载具驾驶员以及私人安保人员在密闭空间的火力需要。适合携带的小尺寸，配上高效率、高可靠性及易操作的特点，使它成为了一件杀人利器。

original.value: Football 2018 McMillan CS5

translation.value: McMillan CS5 “世界锦标赛”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special Football 2018 skin of McMillan CS5. The McMillan CS5 is designed for stealth and concealment in urban settings. The bolt action CS5 is specifically designed as a compact and concealable precision tactical rifle. It is available in suppressed configuration for military and law enforcement applications, as well as standard configuration.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 大\nMcMillan CS5 的 世界锦标赛特制版。\n这款紧凑型栓动狙击步枪专为城市环境下的隐蔽行动所设计。该枪存在两个不同的版本：普通版的目标用户是平民，军队和警察则使用强化军用级步枪，并附有升级版消音西横。

original.value: Football 2018 CZ 75-Auto

translation.value: CZ 75-Auto “世界锦标赛”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of CZ 75-Auto.\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: 附件槽： 枪管。后坐力： 小\nCZ 75-Auto 的 世界锦标赛特制版\n由捷克共和国制造的 CZ 75-Auto 是一把配备快慢机、且同时拥有半自动和全自动两种开火模式的手枪。1975 年亮相的它拥有双层弹匣和锤锻枪管，并且采用全金属构造。

original.value: Football 2018 Jagdkommando

translation.value: 狩猎之令“世界锦标赛”

original.value: Special Football 2018 skin of Jagdkommando \nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: 世界锦标赛版狩猎之令 \n狩猎之令是一把独特的刀，它是由一整片不锈钢磨制而成的。以奥地利武装部队特种作战群命名的这把刀称得上名副其实。三面锋利的刀边最终拧成一股，刀柄刻有花纹，握持感更佳。

translation.value: M40A5 的虎纹皮肤。\n这只是一件装饰皮肤，你仍需获取原始武器。

original.value: Tigerstripe Skin

translation.value: 虎纹皮肤

original.value: Tigerstripe skin for the AX308.\nThis is only a cosmetic skin, you still need to obtain the original weapon.

translation.value: AX308 的虎纹皮肤。\n这只是一件装饰皮肤，你仍需获取原始武器。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger IMBEL IA2

translation.value: 虎纹 IMBEL IA2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger " version of IMBEL IA2. \nThe IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高\nIMBEL IA2 的虎纹特别版。\nIMBEL IA2 突击步枪是被作为过时的 FN FAl 和 M16A2 的替代品正式部署在巴西军队的。它的优点有：通用的标准化弹匣、较高的威力和持久力、良好的长距离精准度和极端条件下的可靠性。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Beretta ARX160

translation.value: 虎纹 Beretta ARX160

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Beretta ARX160.\nThe Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高\nBeretta ARX160 的虎纹特别版。\nBeretta 公司在 2008 年开发出来的突击步枪。具有舒适的后坐力、较高的射速和穿透力等优点。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger PKP Pecheneg

translation.value: 虎纹 PKP Pecheneg

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of PKP Pecheneg.\nThe PKP Pecheneg is a Russian machine gun chambered for the 7.62Г—54mm round. It has great damage, high firing range and good accuracy. It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中等\nPKP Pecheneg 的虎纹特别版。\nPKP Pecheneg 是一款俄罗斯机枪，枪膛适用 7.62×54mm 子弹。其伤害值高、射程长。它有一个整体的折叠型两足支架，可以提高卧姿射击时的长射程精确性。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Army Jagdkommando

translation.value: 虎纹 Jagdkommando 刀

original.value: Special Vietnam Tiger version of Jagdkommando.\nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: Jagdkommando 刀虎纹特别版。 \n一款致命的三刃刀，采用坚固的钢磨制而成。以澳大利亚特种部队的名字命名。具有提升的速度和伤害值。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Mateba Autorevolver

translation.value: 虎纹 Mateba 自动左轮手枪

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Mateba Autorevolver.\nThe Mateba Model 6 Unica (often known simply as the Mateba or the Mateba Autorevolver) is a semi-automatic revolver, one of only a few of this type ever produced. It was developed in Italy and sold by the Mateba company.

translation.value: 附件槽： 枪口。后坐力：高\nMateba 自动左轮手枪的虎纹特别版。\nMateba Model 6 Unica 左轮手枪（也叫做 Mateba 自动左轮手枪）是稀有型自动左轮手枪的代表，在意大利开发和生产。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger CZ 75-Auto

translation.value: 虎纹 CZ 75-Auto

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of CZ 75-Auto\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: 附件槽： 枪口。后坐力：低\nCZ 75-Auto 的虎纹特别版。\n一款捷克手枪，于 1975 年在马德里的一次展览中首次面世。可以实现齐射。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Fabarm P.S.S.10

translation.value: 虎纹 Fabarm P.S.S.10

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Fabarm P.S.S.10.\nFabarm P.S.S.10 is a modern semi-automatic shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. It has extremely high RPM, great accuracy and smooth recoil.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中等\nFabarm P.S.S.10 的虎纹特别版。\nFabarm 公司开发的一款半自动霰弹枪。有着卓越的射速和较低的后坐力。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger MAG-7

translation.value: 虎纹 MAG-7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"Vietnam Tiger" version of MAG-7\nThe MAG-7 was developed as a close quarters combat weapon, which would combine the aspects of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口. 后坐力：低\nMAG-7 的虎纹特别版。\n一款基于 UZI 全自动手枪的紧凑型泵动式霰弹枪，专为短程射击而设计。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

translation.value: 虎纹 Fabarm S.A.T. 8 专业版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Vietnam Tiger" version of Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro - modern shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. S.A.T. means Semi-Automatic Tactical 8. This weapon designed as for law agencies and also for civilian and sport market. Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro is high quality, ergonomic and balance gun. It's automatic is less sensitive to dirt and high reliability.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中等\nFabarm S.A.T. 8 专业版的虎纹特别版。\nFabarm S.A.T. 8 专业版是一款半自动霰弹枪，由意大利公司 Fabarm 开发。它有着良好的人体工程学设计和卓越的平衡性。这把枪的自动模式对于灰尘不太敏感，这提升了它的可靠性。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Tavor CTAR-21

translation.value: 虎纹 Tavor CTAR-21

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Tavor CTAR-21.\nThe Tavor CTAR-21 is a compact short barrel version intended for commandos and special forces. High reliability and accuracy under extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、导轨、枪口。后坐力：中等\nTavor CTAR-21 的虎纹特别版。\n一款为特种部队开发的紧凑型全自动手枪。即使是在极端条件下，也具备较高的精准度和可靠性，同时有着独特的瞄准系统。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: 虎纹 PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Vietnam Tiger" version of PP-19 Bizon PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中等 PP-19 Bizon 的虎纹特别版。 Bizon是一款全自动手枪，枪膛适用 9x19 mm子弹，它是在Victor Kalashnikov的领导下开发出来的，Victor 是著名设计师Mikhail Kalashnikov的儿子。 Bizon的一个显著特征就是它有着高容量的弹匣，因为该弹匣位于枪管下方，因此经常与榴弹发射器混淆。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger CZ Scorpion EVO

translation.value: 虎纹 CZ Scorpion EVO 3 A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Radiation" version of CZ Scorpion EVO.\nCZ Scorpion is the one of the best sub machine guns. EVO features futuristic design, comfort recoil and increased penetrability, high enough to make a hole in any helmet at close range.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高\nCZ Scorpion EVO 3 A1 的虎纹特别版。\n一款捷克全自动手枪，有着新潮的设计和增强的穿透力，短距离内可以射穿任何头盔。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Desert Tech MDR-C

translation.value: 越南虎纹沙漠科技 MDR-C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Desert Tech MDR-C.\nThe Desert Tech Micro Dynamic Rifle Compact (MDR-C) is a bullpup SMG produced by US-based Desert Tech Inc. Features include: comfort recoil, fast reloading and great damage which provides great penetrability against helmets, even with a silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n沙漠科技 MDR-C 的虎纹特别版。\n一款枪管较短的无托结构武器，由 DesertTech Inc 公司开发。具有后坐力受控、装弹速度快、伤害值较高等优点，即使使用了消音器也能穿透头盔。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Calico M951S

translation.value: 虎纹 Calico M951S

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special "Vietnam Tiger" version of Calico M951S. The Calico M951 is a select fire version of the nearly identical M900 Semi Auto Carbine, except the 951 has a special compensator (much like a mini Cutts Compensator) that is larger than the compensator for the M900.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 虎纹特别版 Calico M951S。 几乎与 M900 半自动步枪完全相同。951 型唯一的不同之处在于它的特殊补偿器，比 M900 补偿器要大。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger M40A5

translation.value: 虎纹 M40A5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of M40A5\nThis heavy bolt-action sniper rifle was based on the Remington 700 Short Action with .308 bolt face. It widely used by US Marine Corps because of high power, long range and high-capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\nM40A5 的虎纹特别版。\n一款大口径栓式狙击步枪。由于其高火力和长射程，在美国海军陆战队得到了广泛应用。

original.value: Vietnam Tiger AX308

translation.value: 虎纹 AX308

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Schmidt & Bender 4.5x fast-scope. Special Vietnam Tiger version of AX308. Use high-caliber, heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs.. Accuracy International AX308 rifle was the first weapon of the newest generation of AW (Arctic Warfare) series. From their predecessors it inherited all positive qualities - durability, reliability, high accuracy, and due to last warfare technologies - ease of maintenance.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中等 配备有Schmidt & Bender (4.5x) 瞄准镜。 AX308的虎纹特别版。 新一代北极作战武器系列中的第一款步枪。 结合了其前代的所有优点 — 可靠性、耐久性、高精准度以及使用便捷。 使用大口径子弹，击中四肢时可造成额外伤害。

original.value: K.I.W.I. Tactical Axe

translation.value: K.I.W.I. 战术斧

original.value: Special "K.I.W.I." version of Tactical Axe\nTactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

translation.value: 战术斧的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。\n战术斧不只是一种有用的工具，还是与敌人近战时的绝佳武器。

original.value: K.I.W.I. M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: K.I.W.I. M48 鲍威刀

original.value: Special "K.I.W.I." version of M48 Bowie Knife \nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: K.I.W.I. 特别版 M48 鲍威刀。\n它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身着防近战背心的敌人。\nM48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重制版，它具有坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。这款武器的设计可以让你用炫酷的姿势出其不意地消灭敌人。

original.value: K.I.W.I. KABAR Kukri-machete

translation.value: K.I.W.I. KA-BAR 弯刀

original.value: Special "K.I.W.I." version of KABAR Kukri-machete \nSurviving the toughest field testing, the Kukri boasts excellent results in chopping and basic field use.

translation.value: KA-BAR 弯刀的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。\n一款得到完美平衡的刀，即使是在战场上最艰难的情况下，它也不会令你失望。

original.value: K.I.W.I. VHS-2

translation.value: K.I.W.I. VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中等\nVHS-2 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版\n一款克罗地亚无托结构步枪。配备有手提把手，枪托长度可调节，两边都有弹壳抛出口。

original.value: K.I.W.I. Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: K.I.W.I. 猎豹 GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Special "K.I.W.I." version of Gepard GM6 Lynx. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备有Schmidt & Bender v2（4.6 倍）瞄准器。 猎豹 GM6 Lynx 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。 一款匈牙利无托结构狙击步枪。有着口径小巧的优点。与其它大口径步枪相比，它不使用两足支架就可以轻松射击。

original.value: K.I.W.I. UZI PRO

translation.value: K.I.W.I. Uzi Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of UZI PRO.\nUZI PRO SMG is the newest member of the legendary UZI family one of the most popular weapon families in the world, with millions of units sold around the globe. The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、导轨、枪口。后坐力：中等\nUzi Pro 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。\nUzi Pro 是此以色列全自动手枪系列中的最新型号，非常适合隐蔽携带和执法队与特种部队使用。

original.value: K.I.W.I. MPA 930DMG

translation.value: K.I.W.I. MPA 930DMG

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special "K.I.W.I." version of MPA 930DMG. Have the unique attachment Silencer. The MPA 930DMG is a highly ergonomic modern 9-mm machine pistol that is capable of using standard Glock magazines.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：弱 MPA 930DMG 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版 独特附件：消音器。 一款符合人体工程学的 9 mm 小巧手枪。配备标准 Glock 弹匣。

original.value: K.I.W.I. Saiga Custom

translation.value: K.I.W.I. H.G.C. Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of Saiga Custom.\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低 H.G.C. Custom 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。 独特附件：特别战术消音器。 一款基于 Kalashnikov 步枪的12 口径狩猎卡宾枪，有多种型号。和 AK 一样，它也是气动式，采用盒式弹匣。

original.value: K.I.W.I. Fostech Origin-12

translation.value: K.I.W.I. Fostech Origin-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of Fostech Origin-12.\nProduced by USA-based manufacturer Fostech Outdoors, Origin-12 is considered to be the fastest semi-automatic shotgun in the world. Mainly used for sports and hunting, it packs a substantial punch and can use drum magazines with up to 30 rounds. Combined with the impressive RPM, it can create a real storm of metal downrange.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFostech Origin-12 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。\n一款半自动滑膛式霰弹枪，由 Fostech Outdoors 制造，具有射速高的优点。它最初是用于体育射击和狩猎的，但也用作执法武器。

original.value: K.I.W.I. S&W M&P R8

Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of S&W M&P R8.\nIt`s the eight-shot .357 modern tactical revolver, named the Military & Police (M&P) R8, staffed with a Leupold X1.3 DeltaPoint reflex sight. S&W M&P R8 features modern design, high damage and high accuracy.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：中等\nS&W M&P R8 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。\n一款现代版的八发左轮手枪，枪膛适用.357 弹药。配备有 DeltaPoint 准直式瞄准镜。这款武器具有高精准度、大火力的优点。

original.value: K.I.W.I. FN FAL DSA 58

translation.value: K.I.W.I. FN FAL DSA-58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of FN FAL DSA 58.\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、导轨、枪口。后坐力：中等\nFN FAL DSA-58 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。\n比利时 FN FAL 步枪的改良版，由美国 DS Arms 公司制造。这款武器配备有方便的战术把手，所使用的弹药可使对四肢造成的伤害增加，同时远距离射击时可造成额外伤害。

Use high-caliber, heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs.. Accuracy International AX308 rifle was the first weapon of the newest generation of AW (Arctic Warfare) series. From their predecessors it inherited all positive qualities - durability, reliability, high accuracy, and due to last warfare technologies - ease of maintenance.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中等 配备有Schmidt & Bender (4.5x) 瞄准镜。 AX308 的 K.I.W.I. 特别版。 新一代北极作战武器系列中的第一款步枪。 结合了其前代的所有优点 — 可靠性、耐久性、高精准度以及使用便捷。 使用大口径子弹，击中四肢时可造成额外伤害。

original.value: Special "Warfest" version of Tactical Axe\nTactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

translation.value: 战术斧的特殊战争前线嘉年华版\n战术斧通常即被用作工具，也被用作良好的近战武器。它作为突破武器和工具的多功能性让它成为了任何军火库的最爱。

original.value: Warfest M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: 战争前线嘉年华 M48 鲍威刀

original.value: Special "Warfest" version of M48 Bowie Knife \nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: 战争前线嘉年华特别版 M48 鲍威刀\n它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身着防近战背心的敌人。\nM48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重制版，它具有坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。这款武器的设计可以让你用炫酷的姿势出其不意地消灭敌人。

original.value: Warfest MP-443 Grach

translation.value: 战争前线嘉年华 MP-443 Grach

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low\nWarfest version of MP-443 Grach.\nThis handgun was developed under designation "Grach" in response to Russian military trials, which began in 1993. In 2003, it was adopted as a standard sidearm for all branches of Russian military and law enforcement, alongside Makarov PM, GSh-18, and SPS. It is chambered for the high-powered 9x19mm 7N21 cartridge, the Russian version of 9mm NATO, loaded to comparable pressure specifications. The 7N21 features an armour-piercing bullet with a tempered steel core.

translation.value: MP-443 Grach 的战争前线嘉年华版。\n这个型号的手枪是为了响应 1993 年开始的俄罗斯军事实验，以 Grach 为代号开发的。在 2003 年，它与 Makarov P、GSh-18 和 SPS 一起成了俄罗斯所有军队以及执法单位的标准副武器。它装填强力 9x19 毫米 7N21 弹匣，即 9 毫米北约弹的俄罗斯版。7N21 配有使用回火钢核心的破甲弹。

original.value: Desert Snake IMBEL IA2

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 IMBEL IA2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Desert Snake " version of IMBEL IA2. \nThe IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\nIMBEL IA2 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nIA2 突击步枪是为巴西军队研发的，用于取代 FN FAL 和 M16A2。IA2 优点众多：通用的标准化弹匣、威力大、远程射击精准度高，在极端环境下有很高的耐久性和可靠性。

original.value: Desert Snake Beretta ARX160

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 Beretta ARX160

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of Beretta ARX160.\nThe Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\nBeretta ARX160 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nBeretta ARX160 是Beretta 在 2008 年生产的突击步枪。这把武器的独特之处在于：适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害或在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲子弹。

original.value: Desert Snake PKP Pecheneg

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 PKP Pecheneg

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of PKP Pecheneg.\nThe PKP Pecheneg is a Russian machine gun chambered for the 7.62Г—54mm round. It has great damage, high firing range and good accuracy. It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\nPKP Pecheneg 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nPKP Pecheneg 是一款俄罗斯机枪，枪膛适用 7.62Г—54mm 子弹。其伤害值高、射程长。精准度高。它有一个整体的折叠型两足支架，可以提高稳定性和卧姿射击时的长射程精确性。

original.value: Desert Snake Army Jagdkommando

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 Army Jagdkommando

original.value: Special "Desert Snake" version of Jagdkommando.\nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: Jagdkommando 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nJagdkommando 一款独特的刀，采用坚固的不锈钢磨制而成。以澳大利亚特种部队的名字命名，它也没有辜负这样的英名。这把刀的三面利刃扭转至刀尖，凹槽面上带有钻孔，流畅地排列在一起。

original.value: Desert Snake Mateba Autorevolver

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 Mateba Autorevolver

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of Mateba Autorevolver.\nThe Mateba Model 6 Unica (often known simply as the Mateba or the Mateba Autorevolver) is a semi-automatic revolver, one of only a few of this type ever produced. It was developed in Italy and sold by the Mateba company.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\nMateba Autorevolver 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nMateba Model 6 Unica ，通常简称为 Mateba 或 Mateba Autorevolver，是一款半自动左轮手枪，这种类型的左轮手枪产量非常少。它是在意大利开发的，由 Mateba 公司进行销售。

original.value: Desert Snake CZ 75-Auto

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 CZ 75-Auto

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of CZ 75-Auto\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: 附件槽： 枪口。后坐力： 小\nCZ 75-Auto 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\n CZ 75 是一款由 (CZUB) 在捷克制造的手枪，有半自动版本和击发调变式版本。这款手枪于 1975 年首次面世，是最初的“神奇九式”之一，拥有双排弹匣、全钢结构和冷锻枪管，在世界各地有着广泛的应用。

original.value: Desert Snake Fabarm P.S.S.10

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 Fabarm P.S.S.10

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of Fabarm P.S.S.10.\nFabarm P.S.S.10 is a modern semi-automatic shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. It has extremely high RPM, great accuracy and smooth recoil.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFabarm P.S.S.10 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nFabarm P.S.S.10 是一款现代半自动霰弹枪，由 Fabarm 兵工厂制造，它的每分钟转数非常高，精准度出众，后坐力较小。

original.value: Desert Snake MAG-7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"Desert Snake" version of MAG-7\nThe MAG-7 was developed as a close quarters combat weapon, which would combine the aspects of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nMAG-7 的 Desert Snake 版。\n MAG-7 是被作为近距离作战武器设计开发的，它结合了紧凑型冲锋枪和泵动式霰弹枪的特点。

original.value: Desert Snake Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Desert Snake" version of Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro - modern shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. S.A.T. means Semi-Automatic Tactical 8. This weapon designed as for law agencies and also for civilian and sport market. Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro is high quality, ergonomic and balance gun. It's automatic is less sensitive to dirt and high reliability.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro 的 Desert Snake 版。\n FABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro 是一款由 Fabarm 兵工厂制造的现代霰弹枪。S.A.T. 表示半自动战术霰弹枪，8 发子弹。这款武器是针对执法人员、平民和体育市场设计的。Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro 是一款高品质手枪，具有良好的人体工学性能和平衡性。它的自动模式对于灰尘不太敏感，这提升了它的可靠性。

original.value: Desert Snake Tavor CTAR-21

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of Tavor CTAR-21.\nThe Tavor CTAR-21 is a compact short barrel version intended for commandos and special forces. High reliability and accuracy under extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、导轨、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nTavor CTAR-21 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\n Tavor CTAR-21 是为突击队和特种部队开发的紧凑型短枪管手枪。即使是在极端条件下，也具备较高的可靠性和精准度。

original.value: Desert Snake PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Desert Snake" version of PP-19 Bizon PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 PP-19 Bizon 的 Desert Snake 特别版。 PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm是由Victor Kalashnikov（大名鼎鼎的 AK-47 设计者 Mikhail Kalashnikov的儿子）带领的工程师团队应 俄罗斯内政部的要求设计的。 它主要是用于近距离作战时需要快速、精准火力的反恐和执法单位。 Bizon 的一个显著特征就是弹匣，它经常被误认为是榴弹发射器。枪管下方的这个弹膛实际上是一个 64发螺旋式供弹弹匣，类似于美国 Calico 系列所用的那种。

original.value: Desert Snake CZ Scorpion EVO

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 CZ Scorpion EVO

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of CZ Scorpion EVO.\nCZ Scorpion is the one of the best sub machine guns. EVO features futuristic design, comfort recoil and increased penetrability, high enough to make a hole in any helmet at close range.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\nCZ Scorpion EVO 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nCZ Scorpion 是最出色的冲锋枪之一。EVO 有着新潮的设计、适度的后坐力和增强的穿透力，短距离内可以射穿任何头盔。

original.value: Desert Snake Desert Tech MDR-C

translation.value: Desert Snake 版 Desert Tech MDR-C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of Desert Tech MDR-C.\nThe Desert Tech Micro Dynamic Rifle Compact (MDR-C) is a bullpup SMG produced by US-based Desert Tech Inc. Features include: comfort recoil, fast reloading and great damage which provides great penetrability against helmets, even with a silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nDesert Tech MDR-C 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\nDesert Tech 紧凑型微动步枪(MDR-C)是由美国 Desert Tech Inc. 公司设计的无托式冲锋枪。它的特点有：后坐力适度、装弹速度快、伤害值较高以及良好的穿透力，即使使用了消音器也能穿透头盔。

original.value: Desert Snake Calico M951S

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special "Desert Snake" version of Calico M951S. The Calico M951 is a select fire version of the nearly identical M900 Semi Auto Carbine, except the 951 has a special compensator (much like a mini Cutts Compensator) that is larger than the compensator for the M900.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 Calico M951S 的 Desert Snake 特别版。 Calico M951 是M900 半自动卡宾枪的击发调变式版本，两者几乎完全相同，唯一的不同之处在于 951 的特殊补偿器（更像是迷你卡茨补偿器）比 M900 的补偿器要大。

Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Desert Snake" version of M40A5\nThis heavy bolt-action sniper rifle was based on the Remington 700 Short Action with .308 bolt face. It widely used by US Marine Corps because of high power, long range and high-capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nM40A5 的 Desert Snake 特别版。\n这款重型栓式狙击步枪是基于带 .308 枪机的 Remington 700 短枪机设计的。由于其具备高火力、长射程以及大容量弹匣等特点，在美国海军陆战队得到了广泛应用。

Use high-caliber, heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs.. Accuracy International AX308 rifle was the first weapon of the newest generation of AW (Arctic Warfare) series. From their predecessors it inherited all positive qualities - durability, reliability, high accuracy, and due to last warfare technologies - ease of maintenance.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 拥有独特附件：Schmidt & Bender 4.5x 快速瞄准镜。 AX308 的 Desert Snake 特别版。 使用大口径、高穿透力的子弹，可对四肢造成额外伤害。 国际精准 AX308 步枪是新一代 AW（北极作战）系列中的第一款武器。 它结合了其前代的所有优点 — 可靠性、耐久性、高精准度，并且由于采用了最新作战技术，还非常便于维护。

MSBS stands for “Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej” – modular small arms system.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nHave unique attachment C-More red-dot sight.\nThe Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 小\n拥有独特附件：C-More 红点瞄准镜。\nCzechmate 系列（针对 IPSC Open 级）采用 9x19mm子弹，可以用 9mm 鲁格弹或 9mm 主重火力子弹，带有四孔补偿器。Czechmate 系列的单侧 CZ 支座上安装有 C-More 红点瞄准镜，颜色有全黑色和缤纷彩色“Parrot”。彩色“Parrot”包含三块红色硬铝底座、短而细的桔黄色手柄、紫色扳机杆、红色扳机、蓝色瞄准镜支座以及绿色弹匣室。

The Czechmate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

original.value: Saiga-12 Spike

translation.value: Saiga Spike

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSaaiga-12 Spike is a bull-pup modification of Saiga-12, manufactured by Center Balanced Systems. It allows for higher level of maneuverability and balance, all the while maintaining the traditional Saiga qualities. This specific modification also uses slug rounds, giving it an outstanding punch, at the cost of higher chance of missing your shot.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n Saiga Spike 是由 Center Balanced Systems 制造的 Saiga-12 的无托型改装枪型。它可以提供更高水准的机动性与平衡性，同时保持传统的 Saiga 系列品质。这个特殊改装枪型还使用独头弹，可实现无以伦比的击杀性能，不过所付出的代价就是增加错过目标的机率。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThis weapon deals double damage to the body and extremities.\nHCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR have seen action in both World Wars, and HCAR is a worthy successor for such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n该武器可对身体和四肢造成双重伤害。\nHCAR 是由俄亥俄州军械厂制作的具有传奇色彩的 BAR 步枪的现代化款式。最初的 BAR 已经在两次世界大战中都参加了行动，HCAR 就是这一传奇枪型前辈的出色承继者。这款半自动步枪使用口径为 30-06 的强大弹药，可发出强大的冲击力。与其前辈相比，它还极大减轻了重量，并具有改善的人体工程学性能。

original.value: Gold HCAR

translation.value: 黄金版 HCAR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of the HCAR. This weapon deals double damage to the body and extremities. This weapon deals increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. HCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR have seen action in both World Wars, and HCAR is a worthy successor for such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 HCAR 的黄金版。 该武器可对身体和四肢造成双重伤害。 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害 HCAR 是由俄亥俄州军械厂制作的具有传奇色彩的 BAR 步枪的现代化款式。最初的 BAR 已经在两次世界大战中都参加了行动，HCAR 就是这一传奇枪型前辈的出色承继者。这款半自动步枪使用强大的 30-06 弹药，可发出强大的冲击力。与其前辈相比，它还极大减轻了重量，并具有改善的人体工程学性能。

original.value: Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor.\nThe Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等\n具有独特附件特殊霰弹枪抑制器。\nUzkon UNG-12 霰弹枪由 Uzkon 制造，源自土耳其。Uzkon UNG-12 是一款极具吸引力的无托型自动弹匣供弹霰弹枪。它的设计亮点在于其超现实的风格，下段采用增强聚合物，上段则采用加工铝。Uzkon 枪身巨大，可不是一般的标准小规格无托型霰弹枪。同时，它还采用非常直观的操控配置，扳机护圈上方有一个十字按钮，拉机柄位于上方机匣左侧。

original.value: Gold Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: 黄金版 Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of Uzkon UNG-12. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. Have unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 中等 Uzkon UNG-12 的黄金版。 这件武器会对改造人造成更大伤害。 具有独特附件特殊霰弹枪抑制器。 Uzkon UNG-12 霰弹枪由 Uzkon 制造，源自土耳其。Uzkon UNG-12 是一款极具吸引力的无托型自动弹匣供弹霰弹枪。它的设计亮点在于其超现实的风格，下段采用增强聚合物，上段则采用加工铝。Uzkon 枪身巨大，可不是一般的标准小规格无托型霰弹枪。同时，它还采用非常直观的操控配置，扳机护圈上方有一个十字按钮，拉机柄位于上方机匣左侧。

original.value: Platinum Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: 白金版 Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Platinum version of Uzkon UNG-12.\nUzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic magazine-fed shotgun. It sports a futuristic design with a reinforced polymer lower and a machined aluminum upper constructions. Uzkon's dimensions are massive - it is not your standard, small sized bullpup. At the same time it offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: Uzkon UNG-12 的白金版\nUzkon UNG-12 霰弹枪由 Uzkon 制造，源自土耳其。Uzkon UNG-12 是一款极具吸引力的无托型自动弹匣供弹霰弹枪。它的设计亮点在于其超现实的风格，下段采用增强聚合物，上段则采用加工铝。Uzkon 枪身巨大，可不是一般的标准小规格无托型霰弹枪。同时，它还采用非常直观的操控配置，扳机护圈上方有一个十字按钮，拉机柄位于上方机匣左侧。

original.value: Carbon FN FAL DSA-58

translation.value: 碳 FN FAL DSA-58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Carbon version of FN FAL DSA-58. \nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFN FAL DSA-58 的碳特别版。\n美国公司 DSA（David Selveggio Arms）制造了一种名为 DSA-58 的 FAL 复制版，它与 StG-58 使用同样的斯太尔-戴姆勒-普赫生产线设备。民用型号为半自动型，但是军事和执法单位的客户可以选择 620 发/分钟全自动循环速率的选射型号。该型号拥有别具特色的舒适战术握把以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。

original.value: Carbon MSBS Radon

translation.value: 碳 MSBS Radon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Carbon version of MSBS Radon. \nMSBS Radon modular weapon system is an indigenous development of Polish Military Technical Academy (Wojskowa Akademia Techniczna) and Fabryka Broni Lucznik Radom weapons factory. MSBS stands for “Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej” – modular small arms system.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\nMSBS Radon 的碳特别版。\nMSBS Radon 模块化武器系统由波兰军事科技学院（Wojskowa Akademia Techniczna）和鲁兹尼克-拉多姆武器公司自主研发。MSBS 代表着“Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej”——模块化轻武器系统。

original.value: Carbon RPD Custom

translation.value: 碳 RPD 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special Carbon version of RPD Custom. RPD Custom is an old-school Soviet LMG, improved and outfitted by modern standards. Designed in 1944, RPD (Ruchnoy Pulemyot Degtyaryova) was a weapon ahead of its time, one of the first squad automatic weapons in the world.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大 RPD 定制版的碳特别版。 RPD 定制版是一款老式苏联 LMG，依照现代标准进行了改进和配备。 RPD（Ruchnoy Pulemyot Degtyaryova）设计于 1944 年，比同时代的武器更先进，是世界上最早的班用自动武器之一。

original.value: Carbon Fostech Origin-12

translation.value: 碳 Fostech Origin-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Carbon version of Fostech Origin-12. \nProduced by USA-based manufacturer Fostech Outdoors, Origin-12 is considered to be the fastest semi-automatic shotgun in the world. Mainly used for sports and hunting, it packs a substantial punch and can use drum magazines with up to 30 rounds. Combined with the impressive RPM, it can create a real storm of metal downrange.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFostech Origin-12 的碳特别版。\n总部位于美国的制造商 Fostech Outdoors 生产的 Origin-12 被认为是世界上最快的半自动霰弹枪。主要用于体育运动和打猎，射击目标时杀伤力十足，而且弹鼓可容纳 30 发子弹。这款武器拥有惊人的射速，能让目标感受真正枪林弹雨的滋味。

original.value: Carbon Fabarm P.S.S.10

translation.value: 碳 Fabarm P.S.S.10

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Carbon version of Fabarm P.S.S.10. \nFabarm P.S.S.10 is a modern semi-automatic shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. It has extremely high RPM, great accuracy and smooth recoil.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nFabarm P.S.S.10 的碳特别版。\nFabarm P.S.S.10 是由费巴尔姆武器厂制造的一款现代半自动霰弹枪。其射速极高，精准度出众，后坐力较小。

original.value: Carbon Sidewinder Venom

translation.value: 碳 Sidewinder Venom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Carbon version of Sidewinder Venom. \nSidewinder Venom is the mag-fed tactical pump-action shotgun system. It is the upgraded version of Mossberg 590. There are lots of features: the forend improves accuracy, detachable grip increases RPM, Drum Mag provides rapid reloads and high ammunition capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nSidewinder Venom 的碳特别版。\nSidewinder Venom 是一种使用弹匣供弹的战术泵动霰弹枪。它是 Mossberg 590 定制版的升级型号，其特点包括提升了精确度的前护木，提升射速的可拆卸握把，还装有弹鼓使其具有很快的装弹速度和很高的装弹量。

original.value: Carbon Magpul FMG-9

translation.value: 碳 Magpul FMG-9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Carbon version of Magpul FMG-9. \nThe Magpul FMG-9 is a prototype for a new generation of folding submachine guns, designed by Magpul Industries in 2008. It has detachable iron sigh with very fast zoom in and insanely high rate of fire. These features make this submachine gun incredibly dangerous at close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nMagpul FMG-9 的碳特别版。\nMagpul FMG-9 是一把次世代的可折叠冲锋枪原型产品，由麦格普工业公司于 2008 年设计。它配有可快速瞄准的可拆卸机械瞄具，并且有着疯狂的射速。这些特点使得这把冲锋枪在近距离时尤为危险。

original.value: Carbon PP2000

translation.value: 碳 PP2000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Carbon version of PP2000. \nPP2000 is a Russian submachine gun. It was created by the KBP Instrument Design Bureau. It has high rate of fire and high damage, these make it extremely well suited to close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\n PP2000 的碳特别版。\nPP2000 是一款俄罗斯冲锋枪，由图拉仪器制造设计局制造。它的高射速和高伤害尤其适合在近距离战斗中施展。

original.value: Carbon ACR CQB

translation.value: 碳 ACR CQB

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Carbon version of ACR CQB. \nThe ACR CQB is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nACR CQB 的碳特别版。\nACR CQB 作为自适应战斗步枪（简称 ACR）的改型，是美国陆军一项耗资约 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。由雷明顿武器公司负责制造。

original.value: Carbon AWM

translation.value: 碳 AWM

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Carbon version of AWM. \nThe AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International. The AWM features a detachable box magazine which holds five rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nAWM 的碳特别版。\nAWM（Arctic Warfare Magnum）是由 Accuracy International 制造的一款狙击步枪，使用可拆卸 5 发弹匣。

original.value: Carbon Remington MSR

translation.value: 碳雷明顿 MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Carbon version of Remington MSR. Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 雷明顿 MSR 的碳特别版。 有独特附件博士能 4x 瞄准镜和雷明顿 MSR 抑制器。 雷明顿 MSR 是一款轻铝材质手动栓式狙击步枪，在 21 世纪晚期由雷明顿武器公司开发。MSR 表示模块化狙击步枪，因为该武器可通过切换枪管和枪栓实现 .338、.300 和 7.62 口径快速切换。这是一款现代化的精准步枪，就是价格有点昂贵。美军以及其它几个国家已将 MSR 投入使用。

original.value: Carbon Orsis T-5000

translation.value: 碳 Orsis T-5000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Carbon version of Orsis T-5000. \nThe Orsis T-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS, and is produced in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at the international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil. The Sniper Rifle has high accuracy and high chance to make one shot kill. Now even protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies at close quarters and middle distances.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nOrsis T-5000 的碳特别版。\nOrsis T-5000 是一款俄罗斯栓动狙击步枪。作为 ORSIS 研发的第一款产品，由该公司的莫斯科工厂生产。这款步枪在2011俄罗斯下塔吉尔国际武器装备展上首次亮相，具有高精准度，且有很大几率一发毙命，现在，即使是防护手套和防护靴也无法在近距离和中距离战斗中拯救你的敌人。

original.value: Carbon CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: 碳 CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special Carbon version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 小 CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot 的碳特别版。 有独特附件C-More 红点瞄准镜。 Czechmate 系列（针对 IPSC Open 级）采用 9x19 毫米子弹，可以用 9 毫米鲁格弹或 9 毫米主重火力子弹，带有四孔补偿器。Czechmate 系列的单侧 CZ 支座上安装有 C-More 红点瞄准镜，颜色有全黑色和缤纷彩色“Parrot”。彩色“Parrot”包含三块红色硬铝底座、短而细的桔黄色手柄、紫色扳机杆、红色扳机、蓝色瞄准镜支座以及绿色弹匣室。

original.value: Carbon QSZ-92

translation.value: 碳 QSZ-92

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Carbon version of QSZ-92. \nThe QSZ-92 Services Pistol is a semi-automatic pistol designed by Norinco and it is in limited service in the People's Liberation Army since the late 1990s. .

translation.value: 附件槽： 枪口。后坐力： 小\nQSZ-92 的碳特别版。\nQSZ-92 军用手枪是一款半自动手枪，由 中国北方工业公司设计，且自 20 世纪 90 年代末以来，在中国人民解放军中服役。

original.value: Carbon RHINO 60DS

translation.value: 碳 Rhino 60 DS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Carbon version of Rhino 60DS. \nThe Chiappa Rhino is a revolver produced by Chiappa Firearms of Italy.The new Chiappa Rhino has revolutionized the revolver with a patented design that tames the prehistoric characteristic that most revolvers possess. It is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\nRhino 60 DS 的碳特别版。\nChiappa Rhino 是意大利齐亚帕武器公司生产的一款左轮手枪。全新的 Chiappa Rhino 左轮手枪的专利设计给左轮手枪带来了一场革命，也使其与其他绝大部分左轮手枪的原始特征相比更为出众。枪底部的空腔正是 Chiappa 最独特的关键零件。枪管的位置使得重心降低，使枪口中线与射击者的手臂形成一条直线，让枪手在遭遇目标时能更自然地“瞄准”。这也彻底降低了后坐力和枪口上跳，确保了对同一目标的后续射击能够更加迅速。

original.value: Carbon M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: 碳 M48 鲍威刀

original.value: M48 Bowie Knife \nSpecial Carbon version of M48 Bowie Knife. \nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: M48 鲍威刀 碳特别版 M48 鲍威刀。 它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身着防近战背心的敌人。 M48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重制版，它具有坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。这款武器的设计可以让你用炫酷的姿势出其不意地消灭敌人。

original.value: Carbon Black Hawk

translation.value: 碳黑鹰

original.value: BLACK HAWK \nSpecial Carbon version of Black Hawk. \nis various purpose melee weapon. It provides increased damage range.

translation.value: 黑鹰 \n黑鹰的碳特别版。\n黑鹰是一款多用途近战武器，可造成 更大的伤害半径。

original.value: Cadex Defence - Kraken CDX MC

translation.value: CDX-MC 北海巨妖

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment Defence Falcon Bipod, Cadex Defence Precision Silencer, Kraken Special Suppressor, ATACR 4.5x scope.\nThe CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 有独特附件反隼两脚架、Cadex Defence 精密消音器、特殊北海巨妖抑制器、ATACR 4.5x 瞄准镜。 一款多口径栓动步枪，由 Cadex Defence 制造。 使用会对四肢造成额外伤害的大口径弹药。一击即可穿透防护背心。

original.value: Syndicate Beretta ARX160

translation.value: 辛迪加 Beretta ARX160

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSyndicate version of Beretta ARX160\nThe Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n辛迪加版 Beretta ARX160\nBeretta ARX160 是一款由贝雷塔于 2008 年生产的突击步枪。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲子弹。

original.value: Syndicate SAI GRY AR-15

translation.value: 辛迪加 SAI GRY AR-15

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSyndicate version of SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 is the great assault rifle for tactical operations and competitions. It`s a premium weapon that you can trust with original jailbrake muzzle and extended mag.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n辛迪加版 SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 是一款适用于战术行动和竞赛的绝佳突击步枪。配备原版越狱枪口与扩充弹匣，这是一把值得信赖的高级武器。

original.value: Syndicate Ak-Alpha

translation.value: 辛迪加 AK 阿尔法

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSyndicate version of AK-Alfa\nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n辛迪加版 AK 阿尔法\nAK 阿尔法是一种革命性的武器升级方法。一支由以色列国防军特种部队中精心挑选出来的狙击手和工程师组成的团队设计了这款阿尔法步枪。这样，射手就能够使用世界上最可靠的武器最大限度地发挥他的射击能力了。一个标志性的武器平台现在重生了，伴随着新版以色列的卡拉什尼科夫，成为尖端技术。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲子弹。AK 阿尔法配备了战术消音器、AK 阿尔法抑制器、战术握把、Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS 和哈特曼 MH1 RDS。

original.value: Syndicate Fabarm XLR 5 Prestige

translation.value: 辛迪加 Fabarm XLR 5 Prestige

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSyndicate skin of XLR5.\nThe Fabarm XLR 5 is have not only amazing fire power capabilities but also cool visual design. Produced by Fabarm S.p.A. weapon company as extremely universal weapon and can be used for different situation as for hunt, or for self-defense, or even for offense.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nXLR5 辛迪加皮肤。\nFabarm XLR 5 Prestige 不只拥有出色的火力，还有炫酷的视觉设计。由 Fabarm 武器公司制造的这把武器得到了广泛的应用，出现在诸如狩猎、自卫和攻击中等多种场合。

original.value: Syndicate Saiga Custom

translation.value: 辛迪加 Saiga 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSyndicate version of Saiga Custom.\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\n辛迪加版 Saiga 定制版。\nSaiga 是一款卡拉什尼科夫式12 号口径战斗霰弹枪，支持各类改装。和卡拉什尼科夫步枪一样，这是一款滚转式枪击、弹匣供弹的导气式枪械。

original.value: Syndicate Saiga-12 Spike

translation.value: 辛迪加 Saiga Spike

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSyndicate version of Saiga-12 Spike.\nSaiga-12 Spike is a bull-pup modification of Saiga-12, manufactured by Center Balanced Systems. It allows for higher level of maneuverability and balance, all the while maintaining the traditional Saiga qualities. This specific modification also uses slug rounds, giving it an outstanding punch, at the cost of higher chance of missing your shot.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n辛迪加版 Saiga Spike。\nSaiga Spike 是由 Center Balanced Systems 制造的 Saiga-12 的无托型改装枪型。它可以提供更高水准的机动性与平衡性，同时保持传统的 Saiga 系列品质。这个特殊改装枪型还使用独头弹，可实现无以伦比的击杀性能，不过所付出的代价就是增加错过目标的机率。

original.value: Syndicate H&K MP5A5 Custom

translation.value: 辛迪加 H&K MP5A5 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Have the unique attachment RAMBO SP-6 1.8x Fast Scope. Syndicate version of H&K MP5A5 Custom The H&K MP5 is the classic configuration of the MP5 submachine gun developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K). It features comfort recoil, great zoom in speed and high damage that guarantee headshot a close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小 有独特附件RAMBO SP-6 1.8x 快速瞄准镜。 辛迪加版 H&K MP5A5 定制版 H&K MP5是经典配置版 MP5 冲锋枪，出自 1960 年代德国小型军火制造商黑克勒&科赫（H&K）公司之手。这件武器具有适度的后坐力、极佳的瞄准速度及高杀伤力，可保证近距离爆头。

original.value: Syndicate Micro-Roni CAA

translation.value: 辛迪加 Micro-Roni CAA

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low Has unique attachment Micro-Roni CAA Laser Sight Grip, Micro-Roni CAA Special Grip and Hartman MH1 Scope with fast zoom. Syndicate version of Micro-Roni CAA The Micro RONI is the latest pistol carbine conversion of CAA. Is the newest compact addition for a pistol carbine conversion kit. The light and sturdy platform for your various glocks and pistols is made of aluminum with a polymer body. The Micro RONI features a folding mechanism for a sturdier position and equipped with an adjustable nylon brace.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力： 小 有独特附件Micro-Roni CAA 激光瞄准器握把、Micro-Roni CAA 特殊握把和快速变焦哈特曼 MH1。 辛迪加版 Micro-Roni CAA Micro RONI 是由 CAA 开发的最新型号的手枪-驳壳枪转换器，也是手枪-卡宾枪转换套件的最新紧凑型产品，即由铝和高分子聚合物打造的轻盈、坚固的格洛克手枪和普通手枪平台。Micro RONI 配有折叠功能和可调整尼龙支架，可以提供更稳定的固定。

original.value: Syndicate TDI Kriss Super V

translation.value: 辛迪加 TDI Kriss Super V

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Syndicate version of TDI Kriss Super V. Has unique attachment KRISS Super V Tactical Grip, KRISS Super V Silencer and Redring MK2 Scope with fast zoom. The Kriss Super V submachine gun was developed by Transformational Defense Industries (TDI). Its name comes from Indonesian sword or large knife. Production of this weapon commenced in 2009. At some point the company became known as Kriss USA and the weapon was rebranded as Vector. TDI Vector or Kriss Super V has excellent accuracy even in continuous fire, making it reliable in various situation. It also comes with an attachable Silencer

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小 辛迪加版 TDI Kriss Super V。 有独特附件KRISS Super V 战术握把、KRISS Super V 消音器和快速变焦 Redring MK2 瞄准镜。 Kriss Super V 冲锋枪出自 Transformational Defense Industries（TDI）公司之手。Kriss Super V 得名于一种印尼剑或大刀，2009 年开始生产。而后来，TDI 公司更名为 KRISS USA，故而该武器也被重命名为 Vector 冲锋枪。TDI Vector 或 Kriss Super V 即使是在连续射击中也能保持极高的精准度，是适合各种情况的可靠之选。此外，它还自带消音器

original.value: Syndicate AT308

translation.value: 辛迪加 AT308

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Syndicate version of AT308 Have unique attachment Razor HD Gen II 4x Fast Riflescope. The AT (Accuracy Tactical) continues the legacy of the combat proven AW308 and takes the AW to new levels. AT308 has a fixed stock with 24 inch, quick change, plain barrel. The AT is ideal for Law Enforcement and civilian users.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小 辛迪加版 AT308 有独特附件Razor HD 第 II 代 4.7x 快速步枪瞄准镜。 AT（Accuracy Tactical）继承了经过战斗洗礼的 AW308 的遗产，将其带上了一个新高度。AT308 有一个固定枪托和 24 英尺长的快装平整枪管。是执法单位和民用的不二之选。

original.value: Syndicate Remington MSR

translation.value: 辛迪加雷明顿 MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Syndicate version of Remington MSR Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 辛迪加版雷明顿 MSR 有独特附件博士能 4x 瞄准镜和雷明顿 MSR 抑制器。 雷明顿 MSR 是一款轻铝材质手动栓式狙击步枪，在 21 世纪晚期由雷明顿武器公司开发。MSR 表示模块化狙击步枪，因为该武器可通过切换枪管和枪栓实现 .338、.300 和 7.62 口径快速切换。这是一款现代化的精准步枪，就是价格有点昂贵。美军以及其它几个国家已将 MSR 投入使用。

original.value: Syndicate Taurus Judge

translation.value: 辛迪加 Taurus Judge

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSyndicate version of Taurus Judge\nTaurus Judge is an extremely powerful revolver that uses .410 shotgun shells for ammo. Due to the short barrel, the pellet spread is enormous and makes the gun less effective at distance. Point-black, however, the Judge kicks like a horse. Ammunition size and weight limit the cylinder to only 5 rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等\n辛迪加版 Taurus Judge\nTaurus Judge 是一款使用 .410 霰弹枪弹药的超强大左轮手枪。因为枪筒较短的缘故，弹着散布很广，不适合远距离射击。不过这把枪在近战中非常强大，像一头真正的公牛。同时，由于弹药大小和重量的限制，弹筒只能容纳 5 发子弹。

original.value: Syndicate CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: 辛迪加 CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Syndicate version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 小 辛迪加版 CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot 拥有独特附件C-More 红点瞄准镜。 Czechmate 系列（针对 IPSC Open 级）采用 9x19mm子弹，可以用 9 毫米鲁格弹或 9 毫米主重火力子弹，带有四孔补偿器。Czechmate 系列的单侧 CZ 支座上安装有 C-More 红点瞄准镜，颜色有全黑色和缤纷彩色“Parrot”。彩色“Parrot”包含三块红色硬铝底座、短而细的桔黄色手柄、紫色扳机杆、红色扳机、蓝色瞄准镜支座以及绿色弹匣室。

original.value: Syndicate Cleaver

translation.value: 辛迪加切肉刀

original.value: Syndicate version of Cleaver\nOld chinese cleaver is largely used as a kitchen or butcher knife. But it could also be used as weapon.

translation.value: 辛迪加版切肉刀\n古老的中国切肉刀通常用来在厨房里制作美味的食物，但它同样也可以拿来当做趁手的武器。

original.value: Syndicate M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: 辛迪加 M48 鲍威刀

original.value: Syndicate version of M48 Bowie knife\nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: 辛迪加版 M48 鲍威刀\n它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身着防近战背心的敌人。\nM48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重制版，它具有坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。这款武器的设计可以让你用炫酷的姿势出其不意地消灭敌人。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Cartel" version of CZ 75-Auto\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 小\n特别“死亡之花”版 CZ 75-Auto。\n由捷克共和国制造的 CZ 75-Auto 是一把配备快慢机、且同时拥有半自动和全自动两种开火模式的手枪。1986 年亮相的它拥有双层弹匣和锤锻枪管，并且采用全金属构造。

original.value: Cartel PKP Pecheneg

translation.value: 死亡之花 PKP Pecheneg

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Cartel" version of PKP Pecheneg.\nThe PKP Pecheneg is a Russian machine gun chambered for the 7.62Р“вЂ”54mm round. It has great damage, high firing range and good accuracy. It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n特别“死亡之花”版 PKP Pecheneg。\nPKP Pecheneg 是一款俄罗斯机枪，使用 7.62x54 毫米子弹，伤害值高、射程长且精准度出众。Pecheneg 有一个整体的折叠型两足支架，可以提高卧姿射击时的稳定性和长射程精确性。

original.value: Cartel Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

translation.value: 死亡之花 Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Cartel" version of Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro - modern shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. S.A.T. means Semi-Automatic Tactical 8. This weapon designed as for law agencies and also for civilian and sport market. Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro is high quality, ergonomic and balance gun. It's automatic is less sensitive to dirt and high reliability.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n特别“死亡之花”版 Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro 是一款由 Fabarm 兵工厂制造的现代霰弹枪。S.A.T. 表示半自动战术。这款武器是为执法机构、普通民众和体育市场设计的。Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro 是一款高品质手枪，具有良好的人体工学性能和平衡性。它采用自动机制，对灰尘不敏感，可靠性很高。

original.value: Cartel CZ Scorpion EVO

translation.value: 死亡之花 CZ Scorpion EVO

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Cartel" version of CZ Scorpion EVO.\nCZ Scorpion is the one of the best sub machine guns. EVO features futuristic design, comfort recoil and increased penetrability, high enough to make a hole in any helmet at close range.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n特别“死亡之花”版 CZ Scorpion EVO。\nCZ Scorpion 是顶尖的冲锋枪之一。Evo 采用具有未来感的造型设计，拥有舒适的后坐力，其高超的穿透能力足以在近距离下击穿任何头盔。

original.value: Cartel AX308

translation.value: 死亡之花 AX308

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Schmidt & Bender 4.5x fast-scope. Special "Cartel" version of AX308. Use high-caliber, heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs.. Accuracy International AX308 rifle was the first weapon of the newest generation of AW (Arctic Warfare) series. From their predecessors it inherited all positive qualities - durability, reliability, high accuracy, and due to last warfare technologies - ease of maintenance.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 拥有独特附件Schmidt & Bender 4.5x 快速瞄准。 特别“死亡之花”版 AX308。 AX308 采用大口径、重型穿甲子弹，可对四肢造成额外伤害。。 Accuracy International AX308 步枪是新一代 AW（北极作战）系列中的第一款武器。 它结合了其前代的所有优点——可靠性、耐久性、高精准度，并且由于采用了最新作战技术，还非常便于维护。

original.value: Cartel AK-47

translation.value: 死亡之花 AK-47

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Cartel" version of AK-47.\nThe AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62Р“вЂ”39mm assault rifle, first developed in the USSR by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is also known as a Kalashnikov, an "AK", or in Russian slang, Kalash. Even after six decades the model and its variants remain the most widely used and popular assault rifles in the world because of their durability, low production cost, and ease of use.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口，。后坐力： 中等\n特别“死亡之花”版 AK-47。\nAK-47 最早在苏联由米哈伊尔·卡拉什尼科夫开发，是一款配备快慢机的导气式 39 毫米突击步枪。这款枪也被称为卡拉什尼科夫、AK 或者在俄语里被称为卡拉什。这种枪具有低成本、耐久性好和易操作的特点，即使面世已有六十多年，这种型号及其各种改型依然是世界上使用最为广泛的突击步枪。

original.value: Cartel AS VAL

translation.value: 死亡之花 AS VAL

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Cartel" version of AS VAL.\nThe AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\n特别“死亡之花”版 AS VAL。\nAS “Val” （特种自动 Val、特种自动步枪，代号：“铁杆”）是一款苏联设计的突击步枪，配有整体抑制器。由精密机械工程中央科学研究院（TSNIITOCHMASH）于二十世纪80年代后期开发，被俄罗斯雪域特战队、MVD、FSB 和俄军的一些精干部队所使用。从 1987 年开始它就成为了苏军和克格勃所使用的武器。由于使用 9x39 毫米重型亚音速弹 SP-6（高性能穿甲弹）和 VSS Vintorez 所用的 SP-5 实心弹，它的有效射程能达到大约 300 米。

original.value: Cartel M1911A1

translation.value: 死亡之花 M1911A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Cartel" version of M1911A1.\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等\n特别“死亡之花”版 M1911A1。\nM1911 是一款单动式弹匣供弹枪管后坐半自动手枪，采用 .45 ACP 口径子弹，在 1911 年至 1985 年间，一直是美军的标配随身武器。首次出现是在美菲战争的后期，后又参加了两次世界大战、朝鲜战争和越南战争。之后，美国军方采用改良设计，研制出 M1911A1 手枪，出色服役直至 20 世纪 80 年代中期。

original.value: Cartel UTAS UTS-15

translation.value: 死亡之花 UTAS UTS-15

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Cartel" version of UTAS UTS-15.\nThe UTS-15 was developed as a result of a request to UTAS made by Smith & Wesson in 2006 to develop "the ultimate police shotgun". Smith & Wesson's criteria for the shotgun were: 12 Gauge, pump-action, less than 30" overall length.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n特别“死亡之花”版 UTAS UTS-15。\nUTAS UTS-15 是应 2006 年的一项开发终极警用霰弹枪的需求在史密斯威森制造的 UTAS 基础上研制出的。史密斯威森的霰弹枪制造标准是：12 号口径、泵动并且全长不超过 30 英寸。

Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Cartel" version of Berreta MX4 Storm.\nBeretta MX4 submachine gun is the newest product of the worldвЂ™s oldest gun making company, Beretta of Italy. It uses original blowback operated action with polymer body of the gun and fixed shoulder stock, as well as same ambidextrous control. Beretta MX4 submachine gun is normally equipped with iron sights, and an integral Picatinny rail is provided at the top of the receiver for installation of additional sights.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨，瞄准镜，枪口。后坐力： 小\n特别“死亡之花”版 Beretta MX4 Storm。\nBeretta MX4 冲锋枪是全球资历最老的军火公司意大利 Beretta 的最新产品。它采用了原始的枪机后坐式原理，主打聚合物枪体、固定肩部枪托以及良好的操控性。Beretta MX4 冲锋枪通常配备机械瞄具，并在机匣上方配有完整的皮卡汀尼导轨，用于安装额外的瞄准镜。
