original.value: Frozen Beretta ARX160

translation.value: 破冰者 Beretta ARX160

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Frozen" version of Beretta ARX160.\nThe Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 高\n破冰者特别版 Beretta ARX160。\nBeretta ARX160 是由 Beretta 生产于 2008 年的突击步枪。这把武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害或在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲子弹。

original.value: Frozen CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: 破冰者 CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special Frozen version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 小 破冰者特别版 CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot 拥有独特附件C-More 红点瞄准镜。 Czechmate 系列（针对 IPSC Open 级）采用 9x19mm子弹，可以用 9 毫米鲁格弹或 9 毫米主重火力子弹，带有四孔补偿器。Czechmate 系列的单侧 CZ 支座上安装有 C-More 红点瞄具，颜色有全黑色和缤纷彩色“Parrot”。彩色“Parrot”包含三块红色硬铝底座、短而细的桔黄色手柄、紫色扳机杆、红色扳机、蓝色瞄准镜支座以及绿色弹匣。

original.value: Frozen CZ Scorpion EVO

translation.value: 破冰者 CZ Scorpion EVO

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Frozen" version of CZ Scorpion EVO.\nCZ Scorpion is the one of the best sub machine guns. EVO features futuristic design, comfort recoil and increased penetrability, high enough to make a hole in any helmet at close range.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n破冰者特别版 CZ Scorpion EVO。\nCZ Scorpion 是顶尖的冲锋枪之一。Evo 采用具有未来感的造型设计，拥有舒适的后坐力和出色的穿透能力，足以在近距离下击穿任何头盔。

original.value: Frozen DP-12

translation.value: 破冰者 DP-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Frozen" version of DP-12.\nThe DP-12 double barrel pump is like no shotgun that you have ever seen before. The one of a kind shotgun not only supports two magazine tubes but two barrels that do double damage!

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 小\n破冰者特别版 DP-12。\nDP-12 的双枪管泵使其与你所见过的其他霰弹枪都截然不同。这款独一无二的霰弹枪不仅拥有双弹匣管，更有能造成双倍伤害的双枪管！

original.value: Frozen Bushmaster BA50

translation.value: 破冰者 Bushmaster BA50

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special "Frozen" version of The Bushmaster BA50. The Bushmaster BA50 is a bolt action, magazine fed rifle designed to shoot the .50 BMG cartridge! The Sniper Rifle has extremely high chance to make one shot kill. Protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies even at long range!

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等 破冰者特别版 Bushmaster BA50。 Bushmaster BA50 是一把栓动式弹匣供弹步枪，使用 .50 BMG 弹药。 这种狙击步枪几乎可以做到枪枪必杀。即使相隔很远，武装到牙齿的敌人也无法在这种武器的枪口下幸免！

original.value: LWRC SMG-45

translation.value: LWRC SMG-45

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nHas unique attachment LWRC SMG-45 RDS and LWRC SMG-45 Angled Fore Grip.\nLWRC SMG-45 is a modern sub-machine gun from US-based manufacturer LWRC International, first unveiled in 2016. This powerful SMG takes HK UMP magazines with .45 ACP ammo. Compared to most other SMGs, .45 ACP offers a superb punch and stopping power. Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n配备独特附件LWRC SMG-45 RDS 和LWRC SMG-45 直角前握把。\nLWRC SMG-45 是一款由美国制造商 LWRC 国际公司研制的现代冲锋枪，于 2016 年面世。这款强大的 SMG 配备了 HK UMP 弹匣，采用 .45 ACP 弹药。与其他大多数 SMG 相比，.45 ACP 具有出色的冲击力和阻滞力。在结构紧凑的基础上，SMG-45 还采用了一种可折叠握把，并且双手可以随意切换，操作起来非常舒服。

original.value: Gold LWRC SMG-45

translation.value: 黄金版 LWRC SMG-45

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Golden version of LWRC SMG-45. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. Has unique attachment LWRC SMG-45 RDS and LWRC SMG-45 Angled Fore Grip. LWRC SMG-45 is a modern sub-machine gun from US-based manufacturer LWRC International, first unveiled in 2016. This powerful SMG takes HK UMP magazines with .45 ACP ammo. Compared to most other SMGs, .45 ACP offers a superb punch and stopping power. Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大 LWRC SMG-45 的黄金版。 这种武器会对改造人造成更大伤害。 配备独特附件LWRC SMG-45 RDS 和LWRC SMG-45 直角前握把。 LWRC SMG-45 是一款由美国制造商 LWRC 国际公司研制的现代冲锋枪，于 2016 年面世。这款强大的 SMG 配备了 HK UMP 弹匣，采用 .45 ACP 弹药。与其他大多数 SMG 相比，.45 ACP 具有出色的冲击力和阻滞力。在结构紧凑的基础上，SMG-45 还采用了一种可折叠握把，并且双手可以随意切换，操作起来非常舒服。

original.value: HK G28

translation.value: H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件H&K G28 消音器、H&K G28 抑制器、HK 型垂直握把、Schmidt Bender 3 4.5 倍瞄准镜、Vector Optics Maverick 红点瞄具。 G28 是民用半自动比赛步枪 MR308 的军用版本。指定射手步枪（DMR）采用成型的 7.62 x 51 口径，可确保 1.5 角分的精准度，同时完全具备夜间作战能力。在 600 米范围内，拥有最大有效射程和高首轮命中率的 H&K G28 还可以在 800 米范围内对人体尺寸的目标进行精准火力压制。

original.value: Gold HK G28

translation.value: 黄金版 H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of the HK G28. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 100%. Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 100% 的额外伤害。 H&K G28的黄金版 配备独特附件H&K G28 消音器、H&K G28 抑制器、HK 型垂直握把、Schmidt Bender 3 4.5 倍瞄准镜、Vector Optics Maverick 红点瞄具。 G28 是民用半自动比赛步枪 MR308 的军用版本。指定射手步枪（DMR）采用成型的 7.62 x 51 口径，可确保 1.5 角分的精准度，同时完全具备夜间作战能力。在 600 米范围内，拥有最大有效射程和高首轮命中率的 H&K G28 还可以在 800 米范围内对人体尺寸的目标进行精准火力压制。
姜饼枪

original.value: The Gingerbread Gun is the weapon for real connoisseurs of Christmas mood. You think it is just another harmless pastry? It could never be farther from the truth! Fire it point-blank at your opponent and see what this little tasty guy is capable of.

translation.value: 姜饼枪是为真正能够领悟圣诞节精神的鉴赏家提供的武器。你不会以为它就是一块无害的糕点吧？那就大错特错了！用它朝你的对手近距离平射，看看这个美味的东西到底能产生怎样的威力。

original.value: Xmas 2018 VHS-2

translation.value: 圣诞猪 VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Xmas 2018" version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\nVHS-2 的圣诞猪特别版。\n克罗地亚 VHS-2 是 VHS 步枪的改良版本，它保留了原版的无托结构设计、口径、枪管长度以及内部机制，但引入了更加传统的全新单连发选择掣。经过重新设计的手提把手、长度可调节的枪托以及双手皆可操作的弹壳弹射系统，不到一分钟即可完成左右弹射切换配置。

original.value: Xmas 2018 Saiga Custom

translation.value: 圣诞猪 Saiga 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Xmas 2018" version of Saiga Custom.\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\n圣诞猪特别版 Saiga 定制版。\nSaiga 是一款卡拉什尼科夫式12 号口径战斗霰弹枪，支持各类改装。和卡拉什尼科夫步枪改型一样，这是一款滚转式枪击、弹匣供弹的导气式枪械。

original.value: Xmas 2018 UZI PRO

translation.value: 圣诞猪 Uzi Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Xmas 2018" version of UZI PRO.\nUZI PRO SMG is the newest member of the legendary UZI family one of the most popular weapon families in the world, with millions of units sold around the globe. The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、导轨、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n圣诞猪特别版 Uzi Pro。\nUzi Pro SMG 是传奇的 UZI 系列的最新成员，UZI 是全世界最受欢迎的武器系列，在全球已售出几百万套。Uzi Pro 是执法机关、要员保镖以及特种部队隐蔽或公开携带使用的理想枪支。专门针对 AAC 300 灯火管制特制口径弹药打造。由先进武器装备公司制造，用来代替 HK MP5 以及类似的 CQB 武器系统。配备定制款集成消音器。

original.value: Xmas 2018 Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: 圣诞猪 Gepard GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Special "Xmas 2018" version of Gepard GM6 Lynx. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力： 中等 拥有独特附件Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6 倍瞄准镜。 圣诞猪特别版 Gepard GM6 Lynx。 Gepard GM6 Lynx 是一款匈牙利半自动反器材步枪，开发于 80 年代后期。它采用无托结构和伸缩枪管，对于有着如此火力的武器来说，它的造型相当紧凑。这把枪的重量分布也使得人们可以采用无依托立姿操作它，这对于其它大口径步枪来说要困难的多。

original.value: Xmas 2018 MPA 930DMG

translation.value: 圣诞猪 MPA 930DMG

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special "Xmas 2018" version of MPA 930DMG. Have the unique attachment Silencer. The MPA 930DMG is a highly ergonomic modern 9-mm machine pistol that is capable of using standard Glock magazines.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小 圣诞猪特别版 MPA 930DMG。 有独特附件：消音器。 MPA 930DMG 是一款高度符合人体工程学的 9 毫米全自动手枪，可使用标准 Glock 弹匣。

original.value: Xmas 2018 M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: 圣诞猪 M48 鲍威刀

original.value: Special "Xmas 2018" version of M48 Bowie Knife \nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: 圣诞猪特别版 M48 鲍威刀\n它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身着防近战背心的敌人。\nM48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重制版，它具有坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。这款武器的设计可以让你用炫酷的姿势出其不意地消灭敌人。

original.value: Ak-Alpha "Absolute Power"

translation.value: 绝对 AK 阿尔法

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Absolute Power" version of Ak-Alpha \nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n“绝对”版 AK 阿尔法\nAK 阿尔法是一种革命性的武器升级方法。一支由以色列国防军特种部队中精心挑选出来的专业神枪手和工程师组成的团队设计了这款阿尔法步枪。这样，射手就能够使用世界上最可靠的武器最大限度地发挥他的射击能力了。一个标志性的武器平台现在重生了，就像新版以色列的卡拉什尼科夫一样，成为尖端技术。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。AK 阿尔法配备了战术消音器、AK 阿尔法抑制器、战术握把、Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS 和哈特曼 MH1 RDS。

original.value: NY Fabarm STF 12 Compact

translation.value: 黄帝 Fabarm STF 12 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial NY skin of STF 12 Compact.\nFabarm STF12 Compact is collection of innovative technologies for close combat fire arms. It use latest developments and materials and improve expirience of high dynamic combat for operator in fire, pump-action, reload, movement and other important areas of use of a weapon in the battle.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Jogos version of Imbel IA2.\nThe IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n活力特别版 Imbel IA2。\nIA2 突击步枪是为巴西军队研发的，用于取代 FN FAL 和 M16A2。IA2 优点众多：通用的标准化弹匣、威力大、远程射击精准度高，在极端环境下有很高的耐久性和可靠性。

original.value: Jogos SR-2 Veresk

translation.value: 活力 SR-2 Veresk

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Jogos version of the SR-2 Veresk. \nThe SR-2 Veresk submachine gun has been in development since mid-1990s; It wasdeveloped by the Central Scientific-Research Institute of Precise Mechanical Engineering (TSNIITOCHMASH) under request of FSB. Afterthe successful development of powerful 9x21 SP-10armor piercing ammunition and SR-1 pistol to fire it, FSB also requested a submachine gun to fire same ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 小\n活力特别版 SR-2 Veresk。\nSR-2 Veresk 冲锋枪是由精密机械工程中央科学研究院（TSNIITOCHMASH）应 FSB 的要求开发的，它的开发工作始于 20 世纪 90 年代。在威力强大的 9x21 SP-10 穿甲弹以及用于射击该穿甲弹的 SR-1 手枪成功开发出来以后，FSB 又要求制造一款用于射击该弹的冲锋枪。

original.value: Jogos Kel-Tec

translation.value: 活力 Kel-Tec

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Jogos 2016 camouflage version of the Kel-Tec Shotgun. \nThe Kel-Tec KSG is a bullpup pump action shotgun. It was developed by private US-based arms-making company Kel-tec CNC industries, which is known for their innovative products. It was officially announced at the ShotShow-2011, and production is scheduled to mid-2011.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n活力特别版 Kel-Tec 霰弹枪。\nKel-Tec KSG 是一款无托型泵动式霰弹枪，由美国一家以产品创新闻名的私营武器制造公司凯尔科技数控工业公司打造。在 2011 年 ShotShow 上正式发布，按计划于 2011 年中期投产。

original.value: Jogos CheyTac M200

translation.value: 活力 CheyTac M200

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial Jogos 2016 camouflage version of the CheyTac M200. \nThe CheyTac Intervention is an American bolt action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac LLC for long range soft target interdiction. It is fed by a detachable single stack magazine, which holds 7 rounds. CheyTac one of the longest ranges of all modern-day sniper rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 大\n活力特别版 CheyTac M200。\nCheyTac 干预型是一款美式栓动狙击步枪，由CheyTac LLC 制造，用于阻截远距离软目标。它使用 7 发容量的可拆卸式单排弹匣供弹。其射程之远，大多数现代狙击步枪都难以与之相媲美。

original.value: Gold Glock 18C

translation.value: 黄金版 Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. Gold version of the Glock 18c. The Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 大 这种武器会对改造人造成额外伤害。 黄金版 Glock 18c。 Glock 18 是 Glock 17 使用快慢机的版本，应奥地利反恐部队 EKO Cobra 的要求开发。这款全自动手枪装有一个拉杆式快慢机。借助位于枪身底部的拉杆，这把手枪可以进行全自动射击。该武器通常使用 33 发容量的扩充弹匣。

original.value: Syndicate HK G28

translation.value: 辛迪加 H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Syndicate version of HK G28 Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 辛迪加版 H&K G28 配备独特附件H&K G28 消音器、H&K G28 抑制器、HK 型垂直握把、Schmidt Bender 3 4.5 倍瞄准镜、Vector Optics Maverick 红点瞄具。 G28 是民用半自动比赛步枪 MR308 的军用版本。指定射手步枪（DMR）采用成型的 7.62 x 51 口径，可确保 1.5 角分的精准度，同时完全具备夜间作战能力。在 600 米范围内，拥有最大有效射程和高首轮命中率的 H&K G28 还可以在 800 米范围内对人体尺寸的目标进行精准火力压制。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力： 小\n短管 SAP6 弹匣供弹式重装霰弹枪。它的新设计特色包含一个重装单体式四轨系统和一个经过重新设计的铝质泵握把，配合内置垂直前握把使用。原版 SAP6 霰弹枪的开发者一直都在想办法克服常见的老款霰弹枪设计所存在的不足之处。可拆卸式弹匣的使用确保能在不牺牲弹匣容量的前提下，让枪管更短。

original.value: Yakuza version of Balisong Knife.\nA balisong knife is a folding pocket knife. Its distinction is two handles counter-rotating around the tang such that, when closed, the blade is concealed within grooves in the handles.

original.value: Yakuza HCAR

translation.value: 极道 HCAR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Yakuza version of the HCAR. This weapon deals double damage to the body and extremities.<> This weapon deals increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. HCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR have seen action in both World Wars, and HCAR is a worthy successor for such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 极道版 HCAR。 该武器可对身体和四肢造成双重伤害。 HCAR 是由俄亥俄州军械厂制作的具有传奇色彩的 BAR 步枪的现代化款式。原版 BAR 参加了两次世界大战，HCAR 就是这一传奇枪型前辈的出色承继者。这款半自动步枪使用威力强大的口径 .30-06 弹药，可产生强大的冲击力。与其前辈相比，它还大大减轻了重量，并改善了人体工程学性能。

original.value: Yakuza Remington MSR

translation.value: 极道雷明顿 MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Yakuza version of Remington MSR Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等 极道版雷明顿 MSR。 有独特附件博士能 4x 瞄准镜和雷明顿 MSR 抑制器。 雷明顿 MSR 是一款轻铝质手动栓式狙击步枪，在 21 世纪晚期由雷明顿武器公司开发。MSR 表示模块化狙击步枪，因为该武器可通过切换枪管和枪栓实现 .338、.300 和 7.62 口径快速切换。这是一款现代化的精准步枪，就是价格有点昂贵。美军以及其它几个国家已将 MSR 投入使用。

original.value: Yakuza M1911A1

translation.value: 极道 M1911A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Yakuza" version of M1911A1.\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中等\n特别“极道”版 M1911A1。\nM1911 是一款单动式弹匣供弹枪管后坐半自动手枪，采用 .45 ACP 口径子弹，在 1911 年至 1985 年间，一直是美军的标配随身武器。首次出现是在美菲战争的后期，后又参加了两次世界大战、朝鲜战争和越南战争。之后，美国军方采用改良设计，研制出 M1911A1 手枪，出色服役直至 20 世纪 80 年代中期。

original.value: Hera Arms CQR

translation.value: Hera Arms CQR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThis weapon is basically an AR-15, clad in modern set of accessories produced by Germany-based Hera Arms. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n这款武器是在 AR-15 基础上加装了一组现代化的配件打造而成的，由总部位于德国的 Hera Arms 研制。这是一个高度符合人体工程学的系统，既强大又轻便。搭配由麦格普公司生产的弹鼓，这款使用起来非常舒适的突击步枪将提供更长时间的持续可控火力。

original.value: Gold Hera Arms CQR

translation.value: 黄金版 Hera Arms CQR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Gold version of the Hera Arms CQR. This weapon deals increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. This weapon is basically an AR-15, clad in modern set of accessories produced by Germany-based Hera Arms. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 黄金版 Hera Arms CQR。 这件武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 这款武器是在 AR-15 基础上加装了一组现代化的配件打造而成的，由总部位于德国的 Hera Arms 研制。这是一个在人体工程学方面表现非常出色的系统，既强大又轻便。搭配由麦格普公司生产的弹鼓，这款使用起来非常舒适的突击步枪将提供更长时间的持续可控火力。

original.value: Cyber Pro SAI GRY AR-15

translation.value: Impulse SAI GRY AR-15

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nCyber Pro version of SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 is the great assault rifle for tactical operations and competitions. It`s a premium weapon that you can trust with original jailbrake muzzle and extended mag.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 高\nImpulse 版 SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 是一款非常适合用于战术行动和竞赛的突击步枪。配备原版越狱枪口与扩充弹匣，这是一把值得信赖的高级武器。

original.value: Cyber Pro XM8 Compact

translation.value: Impulse XM8 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nCyber Pro version of XM8 Compact .\n The XM8 Compact is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\nImpulse 版 XM8 Compact。\n于 1990 年代至 2000 年代初由美国陆军开发的 XM8 Compact 步枪是一款轻量型突击武器，极其轻便，对恶劣环境有很强耐受性。

original.value: Cyber Pro DSA sa58 spr

translation.value: Impulse DSA SA58 SPR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil:High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Cyber Pro version of DSA sa58 spr . DSA’s entry for the Army’s SASS trials was their SPR or Special Purpose Rifle DS Arms (DSA) has been producing high quality rifles based on the FN FAL design. The SPR is a gas-operated, semi-automatic rifle based around the SA58 design.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 Impulse 版 DSA SA58 SPR。 DSA 凭借它们的特种步枪（SPR）加入了军队的半自动狙击系统实验 自那以后，DS Arms（DSA）一直致力于根据 FN FAL 设计制造高品质步枪。SPR 是一款基于 SA58 设计的导气式半自动步枪。

original.value: Cyber Pro Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: Impulse Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Cyber Pro version of Uzkon UNG-12. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. Have unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 Impulse 版 Uzkon UNG-12。 这件武器会对改造人造成更大伤害。 具有独特附件：特殊霰弹枪抑制器。 Uzkon UNG-12 霰弹枪由 Uzkon 制造，源自土耳其。Uzkon UNG-12 是一款极具吸引力的无托型自动弹匣供弹霰弹枪。它的设计亮点在于其超现实的风格，下段采用增强聚合物，上段则采用加工铝。这款枪枪身巨大，可不是一般的标准小规格无托型霰弹枪。它还采用非常直观的操控配置，扳机护圈上方有一个十字按钮，拉机柄位于上方机匣左侧。

original.value: Cyber Pro FN FAL DSA 58

translation.value: Impulse FN FAL DSA 58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nCyber Pro version of FN FAL DSA 58.\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中\nImpulse 版 FN FAL DSA 58。\n美国公司 DSA（David Selveggio Arms）制造了一种名为 DSA-58 的 FAL 复制版，它与 StG-58 使用同样的斯太尔-戴姆勒-普赫生产线设备。民用型号为半自动型，但是军事和执法单位的客户可以选择 620 发/分钟全自动循环速率的选射型号。该型号采用独特的人体工程学战术握把、具有特殊的功能、并配有能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。

original.value: Streamer FN FAL DSA-58

translation.value: 神像版 FN FAL DSA-58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Streamer" version of FN FAL DSA 58.\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n特别“神像”版 FN FAL DSA 58。\n美国公司 DSA（David Selveggio Arms）制造了一种名为 DSA-58 的 FAL 复制版，它与 StG-58 使用同样的斯太尔-戴姆勒-普赫生产线设备。民用型号为半自动型，但是军事和执法单位的客户可以选择 620 发/分钟全自动循环速率的选射型号。该型号拥有别具特色的舒适战术握把以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。

original.value: Streamer Winchester 1887

translation.value: 神像版 Winchester 1887

original.value: Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Streamer" version of Winchester 1887.\nThe lever-action gun was designed by John Browning for the Winchester Repeating Arms Company in 1887. This model was considered the first of many successful repeating shotguns, a favorite of collectors and cowboy action shooters.

translation.value: 后坐力：中\n特别“神像”版 Winchester 1887。\n这款拉杆式枪是约翰·勃朗宁于 1887 年为温彻斯特公司设计的。该型号被认为是许多成功的复制霰弹枪的先驱，颇受收藏家和牛仔动作射击游戏的青睐。

original.value: Streamer Desert Tech MDR-C

translation.value: 神像版 Desert Tech MDR-C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Streamer" version of Desert Tech MDR-C.\nThe Desert Tech Micro Dynamic Rifle Compact (MDR-C) is a bullpup SMG produced by US-based Desert Tech Inc. Features include: comfort recoil, fast reloading and great damage which provides great penetrability against helmets, even with a silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n特别“神像”版 Desert Tech MDR-C。\nDesert Tech 紧凑型微动步枪（MDR-C）是一款无托型 SMG，由美国 Desert Tech Inc. 公司设计。它的特点有：后坐力适度、装弹速度快、伤害值高以及穿透力出色，即使使用了消音器也能穿透头盔。

original.value: Streamer AMP DSR-1

translation.value: 神像版 AMP DSR-1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Streamer" version of AMP DSR-1.\n The DSR-1 is a compact bolt-action rifle designed, manufactured and marketed by the German company DSR-Precision GmbH and was (until 2004) marketed also by the German company AMP Technical Services as a specialized sniper rifle for police sharpshooters. It has been adopted by the German GSG 9 counter-terrorist unit, as well as by other European special police units and agencies.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高\n特别“神像”版 AMP DSR-1。\nDSR-1 是一款由德国 DSR 精密公司设计、制造和推广（德国 AMP 技术服务公司也曾将此枪作为警方狙击手特制版狙击步枪进行推广，一直到 2004 年）的紧凑型栓动步枪。德国反恐单位 GSG-9 和其他一些欧洲特警单位和有关部门都选配了这款枪。一击即可穿透防护背心。

original.value: Streamer S&W M&P R8

translation.value: 神像版 S&W M&P R8

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Streamer skin of S&W M&P R8.\nIt`s the eight-shot .357 modern tactical revolver, named the Military & Police (M&P) R8, staffed with a Leupold X1.3 DeltaPoint reflex sight. S&W M&P R8 features modern design, high damage and high accuracy.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n特别“神像”版 S&W M&P R8。\n这是一款八发 .357 现代战术左轮手枪，被命名为 M&P（军警两用）R8，配备Leupold 1.3 倍 DeltaPoint 反射式瞄具。S&W M&P R8 采用现代设计，具有高伤害值和高精准度的特点。

original.value: Streamer M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: 神像版 M48 鲍威刀

original.value: Streamer version of M48 Bowie knife\nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: M48 鲍威刀的神像版 \nM48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重现版，它具备坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。此武器可充分满足你所有的炫酷需求。

original.value: Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer .\n The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口. 后坐力：中\n配备独特附件Vortex Viper 准直式瞄准镜，Osprey 9 消音器。\nMarlin 1894 一款经典的杠杆式步枪，操控简单，能够快速射出威力强大的子弹。最初由赫本于 1893 年 8 月 1 日获得专利，1894 式的特点是具有重复发射能力的革命性杠杆系统。Marlin 1894 配备一个新的锁紧螺栓和一个两片式撞针，以及一个改进的一体式扳机和一个短接收器，使弹药筒与 1888 和 1889 型号兼容。

original.value: Gold Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: 黄金版 Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of Marlin 1894 Custom. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. Has unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer . The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 Marlin 1894 Custom 的黄金版。 这件武器会对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件Vortex Viper 准直式瞄准镜，Osprey 9 消音器。 Marlin 1894 一款经典的杠杆式步枪，操控简单，能够快速射出威力强大的子弹。最初由赫本于 1893 年 8 月 1 日获得专利，1894 式的特点是具有重复发射能力的革命性杠杆系统。Marlin 1894 配备一个新的锁紧螺栓和一个两片式撞针，以及一个改进的一体式扳机和一个短接收器，使弹药筒与 1888 和 1889 型号兼容。

original.value: Gold McMillan CS5

translation.value: 黄金版 McMillan CS5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Golden version of McMillan CS5. This version deals increased damage to the limbs. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 250%. Have unique attachment McMillan CS5 Silencer. The McMillan CS5 is designed for stealth and concealment in urban settings. The bolt action CS5 is specifically designed as a compact and concealable precision tactical rifle. It is available in suppressed configuration for military and law enforcement applications, as well as standard configuration.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口. 后坐力：高 McMillan CS5 的黄金版。 这个版本会对四肢造成额外伤害。 这件武器会对改造人造成 250% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件McMillan CS5 消音器. McMillan CS5 专为城市环境下的隐蔽行动而生，其设计为方便隐藏的紧凑型高精度战术步枪。可作为军队和执法队的消声武器，也可以作为标配。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Joker version of XM8\nThe XM8 was the U.S. military designation for a lightweight assault rifle system under development by the United States Army from the late 1990s to early 2000s.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\nXM8 小丑特别版\nXM8 是由美国陆军于 1990 年代至 2000 年代初研制的一款轻量型突击步枪。

original.value: Joker Calico M900

translation.value: Calico M950 小丑版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Joker version of Calico M900\nThe Calico M900 is manufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems in the United States.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\nCalico M950 小丑特别版\nCalico M900 由美国霍华德轻武器系统公司生产。

original.value: Joker Berretta MX4 Storm

translation.value: Beretta MX4 Storm 小丑版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Joker version of Berreta MX4 Storm.\nBeretta MX4 submachine gun is the newest product of the world`s oldest gun making company, Beretta of Italy. It uses original blowback operated action with polymer body of the gun and fixed shoulder stock, as well as same ambidextrous control. Beretta MX4 submachine gun is normally equipped with iron sights, and an integral Picatinny rail is provided at the top of the receiver for installation of additional sights.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\nBeretta MX4 Storm 小丑特别版。\nBeretta MX4 冲锋枪是全球资历最老的军火公司意大利 Beretta 的最新产品。它采用了原始的枪机后坐式原理，主打聚合物枪体、固定肩部枪托以及良好的操控性。Beretta MX4 冲锋枪通常配备机械瞄具，并在机匣上方配有完整的皮卡汀尼导轨，用于安装额外的瞄准镜。

original.value: Joker Saiga-12 Spike

translation.value: Saiga-12 Spike 小丑版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Joker version of Saiga-12 Spike.\nSaiga-12 Spike is a bull-pup modification of Saiga-12, manufactured by Center Balanced Systems. It allows for higher level of maneuverability and balance, all the while maintaining the traditional Saiga qualities. This specific modification also uses slug rounds, giving it an outstanding punch, at the cost of higher chance of missing your shot.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\nSaiga-12 Spike 小丑特别版。\nSaiga-12 Spike 是由 Center Balanced Systems 制造的 Saiga-12 的无托型改装枪型。它可以提供更高水准的机动性与平衡性，同时保持传统的 Saiga 系列品质。这个特殊改装枪型还使用独头弹，可实现无以伦比的击杀性能，不过所付出的代价就是增加错过目标的机率。

original.value: Joker Tavor STAR-21 Navy Blue

translation.value: 海军蓝小丑版 Tavor STAR-21

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special Joker version of Tavor STAR-21 Navy Blue. The Tavor STAR-21 Navy Blue is special version of STAR-21. Highly effective in the combat at long distances and modificated to single shot firemode.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 Tavor STAR-21 的海军蓝小丑特别版。 Tavor STAR-21 海军蓝是 STAR-21 的特别版。改装成单发射击模式，远距离战斗效果很好。

original.value: Magic Wand

translation.value: 法杖

original.value: Magic Wand \n Special Forces weapon of the First April`s Division of Sorcerers. It`s all about magic!

translation.value: 法杖 \n女王特勤局最佳特工配备的审判之杖，看起来不那么油滑。你是法师！

original.value: Pathfinder SAI GRY AR-15

translation.value: 银河 SAI GRY AR-15

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nPathfinder version of SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 is the great assault rifle for tactical operations and competitions. It`s a premium weapon that you can trust with original jailbrake muzzle and extended mag.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高\nSAI GRY AR-15 的银河版。\nSAI GRY AR-15 是一款适用于战术行动和竞赛的绝佳突击步枪。配备原版越狱枪口与扩充弹匣，这是一把值得信赖的高级武器。

original.value: Pathfinder Hera Arms CQR

translation.value: 银河 Hera Arms CQR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Pathfinder" version of Hera Arms CQR.\nThis weapon is basically an AR-15, clad in modern set of accessories produced by Germany-based Hera Arms. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\nHera Arms CQR 的银河版。\n这款武器是在 AR-15 基础上加装了一组现代化的配件打造而成的，由总部位于德国的 Hera Arms 研制。这是一个高度符合人体工程学的系统，既强大又轻便。搭配由麦格普公司生产的弹鼓，这款使用起来非常舒适的突击步枪将提供更长时间的持续可控火力。

original.value: Pathfinder H&K MP5A5 Custom

translation.value: 银河 H&K MP5A5 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Have the unique attachment RAMBO SP-6 1.8x Fast Scope. Pathfinder version of H&K MP5A5 Custom The H&K MP5 is the classic configuration of the MP5 submachine gun developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K). It features comfort recoil, great zoom in speed and high damage that guarantee headshot a close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低 配备独特附件RAMBO SP-6 1.8x 快速瞄准镜。 H&K MP5A5 Custom 的银河版。 H&K MP5是经典配置版 MP5 冲锋枪，出自 1960 年代德国小型军火制造商黑克勒&科赫（H&K）公司之手。这件武器具有适度的后坐力、极佳的瞄准速度及高杀伤力，可保证近距离爆头。

original.value: Pathfinder Micro-Roni CAA

translation.value: 银河 Micro-Roni CAA

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low Has unique attachment Micro-Roni CAA Laser Sight Grip, Micro-Roni CAA Special Grip and Hartman MH1 Scope with fast zoom. Pathfinder version of Micro-Roni CAA The Micro RONI is the latest pistol carbine conversion of CAA. Is the newest compact addition for a pistol carbine conversion kit. The light and sturdy platform for your various glocks and pistols is made of aluminum with a polymer body. The Micro RONI features a folding mechanism for a sturdier position and equipped with an adjustable nylon brace.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：低 配备独特附件Micro-Roni CAA 激光瞄准器握把、Micro-Roni CAA 特殊握把和快速变焦哈特曼 MH1。 Micro-Roni CAA 的银河版 Micro RONI 是由 CAA 开发的最新型号的手枪-驳壳枪转换器，也是手枪-卡宾枪转换套件的最新紧凑型产品，即由铝和高分子聚合物打造的轻盈、坚固的格洛克手枪和普通手枪平台。Micro RONI 配有折叠功能和可调整尼龙支架，可以提供更稳定的固定。

original.value: Pathfinder Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: 银河 Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor Special "Pathfinder" version of Uzkon UNG-12. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低 配备独特附件特殊霰弹枪抑制器 Uzkon UNG-12 的银河版。 Uzkon UNG-12 霰弹枪由 Uzkon 制造，源自土耳其。Uzkon UNG-12 是一款极具吸引力的无托型自动弹匣供弹霰弹枪。它的设计亮点在于其超现实的风格，下段采用增强聚合物，上段则采用加工铝。Uzkon 枪身巨大，跟一般的标准小规格无托型霰弹枪不同。而且，它还采用非常直观的操控配置，扳机护圈上方有一个十字按钮，拉机柄位于上方机匣左侧。

original.value: Pathfinder SAP-6

translation.value: 银河 SAP-6

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Pathfinder" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：低\nSAP-6 的银河版。\nSAP6 是一款弹匣供弹式重装霰弹枪。它的新设计特色包含一个重装单体式四轨系统和一个经过重新设计的铝质泵握把，配合内置垂直前握把使用。原版 SAP-6 霰弹枪的开发者一直都在想办法克服常见的老款霰弹枪设计所存在的不足之处。可拆卸式弹匣的使用确保能在不牺牲弹匣容量的前提下，让枪管更短。

original.value: Pathfinder HK G28

translation.value: 银河 H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight Special "Pathfinder" version of HK G28. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件H&K G28 消音器、H&K G28 抑制器、HK 型垂直握把、Schmidt Bender 3 4.5倍 瞄准镜、Vector Optics Maverick 红点瞄具 H&K G28 的银河版。 G28 是民用半自动比赛步枪 MR308 的军用版本。指定射手步枪 DMR 采用成型的 7.62 x 51 口径，可确保 1.5 角分的精准度，同时完全具备夜间作战能力。在 600 米范围内，拥有最大有效射程和高首轮命中率的 H&K G28 还可以在 800 米范围内对人体尺寸的目标进行精准火力压制。

original.value: SIG MPX SBR Custom

translation.value: SIG MPX SBR Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSIG MPX SBR Custom is a 4-burst round sub-machine gun. Unconventional design. Unmatched performance. The SIG MPX redefines the submachine gun category with a new level of operator safety, in-field adaptability and proven reliability in the harshest enviroments. There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\n这个版本会对四肢造成额外伤害。\nSIG MPX SBR Custom 是一款 4 发点射冲锋枪，采用非常规设计，实现无与伦比的性能。SIG MPX 将使用者的安全性提升到了一个新的水平，并具有很高的战场适应性以及在最残酷的环境下久经考验的可靠性，开创了一个全新的冲锋枪类别。SIG 独创，绝无仅有。

original.value: Tommy Gun M1928

translation.value: Thompson M1928

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nThe Thompson M1928 is a select-fire submachine gun designed and developed in the United States. It was manufactured by Auto-Ordnance and chambered in the popular .45 ACP ammunition. The Thompson submachine gun was famously used during the Prohibition era used by law enforcement individuals, marines and mafia criminals.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：低\nThompson M1928 是一款由美国设计和研制的选射型冲锋枪。制造商是美国自动军械公司，采用热门的.45 ACP 弹药。Thompson 冲锋枪曾在禁酒期受到执法部门、海军和黑手党罪犯的热捧。

The Thompson submachine gun was famously used during the Prohibition era used by law enforcement individuals, marines and mafia criminals.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：低 黄金版 Thompson M1928。 这件武器会对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 Thompson M1928 是一款由美国设计和研制的选射型冲锋枪。制造商是美国自动军械公司，采用热门的.45 ACP 弹药。Thompson 冲锋枪曾在禁酒期受到执法部门、海军和黑手党罪犯的热捧。

original.value: Deimos VHS-2

translation.value: 得摩斯 VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“得摩斯”特别版 VHS-2。\n克罗地亚 VHS-2 是 VHS 步枪的改进版，保留了它的无托设计、口径、枪管长度及内部机制，同时，引进了更常规的新式快慢机，且拥有重新设计的提把、可调整长度的枪托和可在不到一分钟的时间内完成左右弹射配置的弹壳弹射系统。

original.value: Deimos Hera Arms CQR

translation.value: 得摩斯 Hera Arms CQR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Hera Arms CQR.\nThis weapon is basically an AR-15, clad in modern set of accessories produced by Germany-based Hera Arms. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“得摩斯”特别版 Hera Arms CQR。\n这款武器是在 AR-15 基础上加装了一组现代化的配件打造而成的，由总部位于德国的 Hera Arms 研制。这是一个高度符合人体工程学的系统，既强大又轻便。搭配由麦格普公司生产的弹鼓，这款使用起来非常舒适的突击步枪将提供更长时间的持续可控火力。

original.value: Deimos M249 Para

translation.value: 得摩斯 M249 Para

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of M249 Para.\nIt's gas operated and air cooled. It has a quick-change barrel, allowing the gunner to rapidly replace an overheated or jammed barrel. A folding bipod is attached near the front of the gun, though an M192 LGM tripod is also available.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“得摩斯”特别版 M249 Para。\n是一款采用了风冷和导气式自动原理的机枪。它的快拆枪管允许射手在枪管过热或卡弹时快速更换枪管。枪的前部附近附带折叠式两脚架，不过也可以改装 M192 LGM 三脚架。

original.value: Deimos Honey Badger

translation.value: 得摩斯蜜獾

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Honey Badger.\nThe AAC Honey Badger PDW is an special PDW weapon based on the AR-15.Have integrated customized sub-sonic silencer. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n“得摩斯”特别版蜜獾\nAAC 蜜獾 PDW 是在 AR-15 基础上研制的一款特殊的 PDW 武器，具有整体定制的亚音速消音器，专为使用特殊的 AAC 300 灯火管制弹药口径制造，出自先进武器装备公司之手，用于取代 HK MP5 和相似的 CQB 武器系统，内置定制消音器。

original.value: Deimos Uzi Pro

translation.value: 得摩斯 Uzi Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Uzi Pro.\nUZI PRO SMG is the newest member of the legendary UZI family one of the most popular weapon families in the world, with millions of units sold around the globe. The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“得摩斯”特别版 Uzi Pro。\nUZI PRO SMG 是传奇的 UZI 系列的最新成员，UZI 是全世界最受欢迎的武器系列，在全球已售出几百万套。UZI PRO 是执法机关、要员保镖以及特种部队隐蔽携带或公开使用的理想枪支。

original.value: Deimos LWRC SMG-45

translation.value: 得摩斯 LWRC SMG-45

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Has unique attachment LWRC SMG-45 RDS and LWRC SMG-45 Angled Fore Grip Special "Deimos" version of LWRC SMG-45. LWRC SMG-45 is a modern sub-machine gun from US-based manufacturer LWRC International, first unveiled in 2016. This powerful SMG takes HK UMP magazines with .45 ACP ammo. Compared to most other SMGs, .45 ACP offers a superb punch and stopping power. Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高 配备独特附件 LWRC SMG-45 RDS 和 LWRC SMG-45 直角前握把 “得摩斯”特别版 LWRC SMG-45。 LWRC SMG-45 是一款由美国制造商 LWRC 国际公司研制的现代冲锋枪，于 2016 年面世。这款强大的 SMG 配备了 HK UMP 弹匣，采用 .45 ACP 弹药。与其他大多数 SMG 相比，.45 ACP 具有出色的冲击力和阻滞力。在结构紧凑的基础上，SMG-45 还采用了一种可折叠握把，并且双手可以随意切换，操作起来非常舒服。

original.value: Deimos Saiga Bullpup

translation.value: 得摩斯 Saiga 无托型

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Saiga Bullpup.\nThe Saiga 12S is the longer barreled version of saiga. In general Saiga are reliable and effective close hunting or close combat weapon, being much cheaper than its famous western counterparts.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“得摩斯”特别版 Saiga 无托型。\nSaiga 12S 是 Saiga 的枪管加长版，用于近距离狩猎或者作为近距离战斗武器使用。它的造价远远低于那些更为知名的西方产竞争对手。

original.value: Deimos Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: 得摩斯 Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor Special "Deimos" version of Uzkon UNG-12. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 配备独特附件特殊霰弹枪抑制器 “得摩斯”特别版 Uzkon UNG-12。 Uzkon UNG-12 霰弹枪由 Uzkon 制造，源自土耳其。Uzkon UNG-12 是一款极具吸引力的无托型自动弹匣供弹霰弹枪。它的设计亮点在于其超现实的风格，下段采用增强聚合物，上段则采用加工铝。Uzkon 枪身巨大，跟一般的标准小规格无托型霰弹枪不同。而且，它还采用非常直观的操控配置，扳机护圈上方有一个十字按钮，拉机柄位于上方机匣左侧。

original.value: Deimos SAP-6

translation.value: 得摩斯 SAP-6

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Deimos" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：低\n“得摩斯”特别版 SAP-6。\n短管 SAP6 是一款弹匣供弹式重装霰弹枪。它的新设计特色包含一个重装单体式四轨系统和一个经过重新设计的铝质泵握把，配合内置垂直前握把使用。原版 SAP6 霰弹枪的开发者一直都在想办法克服常见的老款霰弹枪设计所存在的不足之处。可拆卸式弹匣的使用能在不牺牲弹匣容量的前提下，让枪管更短。

original.value: Deimos AWM

translation.value: 得摩斯 AWM

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of AWM.\nThe AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International. The AWM features a detachable box magazine which holds five rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“得摩斯”特别版 AWM。\nAWM（Arctic Warfare Magnum）是由 Accuracy International 制造的一款狙击步枪，使用可拆卸 5 发弹匣。

original.value: Deimos DSA sa58 spr

translation.value: 得摩斯 DSA SA58 SPR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special "Deimos" version of DSA sa58 spr. DSA’s entry for the Army’s SASS trials was their SPR or Special Purpose Rifle DS Arms (DSA) has been producing high quality rifles based on the FN FAL design. The SPR is a gas-operated, semi-automatic rifle based around the SA58 design.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 “得摩斯”特别版 DSA SA58 SPR。 DSA 凭借它们的特种步枪（SPR）或特种用途步枪加入了军队的半自动狙击系统实验 自那以后，DS Arms（DSA）一直致力于根据 FN FAL 设计制造高品质步枪。SPR 是一款基于 SA58 设计的导气式半自动步枪。

original.value: Deimos AT308

translation.value: 得摩斯 AT308

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Have unique attachment Razor HD Gen II 4.7x Fast Riflescope Special "Deimos" version of AT308. The AT (Accuracy Tactical) continues the legacy of the combat proven AW308 and takes the AW to new levels. AT308 has a fixed stock with 24 inch, quick change, plain barrel. The AT is ideal for Law Enforcement and civilian users.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低 配备独特附件 Razor HD 第 II 代 4x 快速步枪瞄准镜 “得摩斯”特别版 AT308。 AT（Accuracy Tactical）继承了经过战斗洗礼的 AW308，并将其带上了一个新高度。AT308 有一个固定枪托和 24 英尺长的快装平整枪管，是执法单位和民用的不二之选。

original.value: Deimos HK G28

translation.value: 得摩斯 H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight Special "Deimos" version of HK G28. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件H&K G28 消音器、H&K G28 抑制器、H&K 型垂直握把、Schmidt Bender 3 4.5x 瞄准镜、Vector Optics Maverick 红点瞄具 “得摩斯”特别版 H&K G28。 G28 是民用半自动比赛步枪 MR308 的军用版本。指定射手步枪 DMR 采用成型的 7.62 x 51 口径，可确保 1.5 角分的精准度，同时完全具备夜间作战能力。在 600 米范围内，拥有最大有效射程和高首轮命中率的 H&K G28 还可以在 800 米范围内对人体尺寸的目标进行精准火力压制。

original.value: Deimos Glock 18C

translation.value: 得摩斯 Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Glock 18C.\nThe Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力：高\n“得摩斯”特别版 Glock 18C。\nGlock 18 是 Glock 17 使用快慢机的版本，应奥地利反恐部队 EKO Cobra 的要求开发。这款全自动手枪装有一个拉杆式快慢机。借助位于枪身底部的拉杆，这把手枪可以进行全自动射击。该武器通常使用 33 发容量的扩充弹匣。

original.value: Deimos MPA 930DMG

translation.value: 得摩斯 MPA 930DMG

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Have the unique attachment Silencer Special "Deimos" version of MPA 930DMG. The MPA 930DMG is a highly ergonomic modern 9-mm machine pistol that is capable of using standard Glock magazines.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低 配备独特附件：消音器 “得摩斯”特别版 MPA 930DMG。 MPA 930DMG 是一款高度符合人体工程学的 9 毫米全自动手枪，可使用标准 Glock 弹匣。

original.value: Deimos CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: 得摩斯 CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight Special "Deimos" version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力低 配备独特附件 C-More 红点瞄准镜 “得摩斯”特别版 CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot。 Czech Mate 系列（针对 IPSC Open 级）采用 9x19mm子弹，可以用 9 毫米鲁格弹或 9 毫米主重火力子弹，带有四孔补偿器。Czechmate 系列的单侧 CZ 支座上安装有 C-More 红点瞄准镜，颜色有全黑色和缤纷彩色“Parrot”。彩色“Parrot”包含三块红色硬铝底座、短而细的桔黄色手柄、紫色扳机杆、红色扳机、蓝色瞄准镜支座以及绿色弹匣室。

Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Phobos version of Type 97.\nThe Chinese have constructed an export version, the Type 97, which is similar to the Type 95 in all respects except that it is chambered for 5.56 mm NATO instead of the original Chinese 5.8 mm cartridge and has a deep magazine well, designed to accept STANAG magazines.

original.value: Phobos Ak-Alpha

translation.value: 福波斯 AK 阿尔法

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Phobos version of Ak-Alpha\nThe Ak-Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n福波斯特别版 AK 阿尔法\nAK 阿尔法是一种革命性的武器升级方法。一支由以色列国防军特种部队中精心挑选出来的专业神枪手和工程师组成的团队设计了这款阿尔法步枪。这样，射手就能够使用世界上最可靠的武器最大限度地发挥他的射击能力了。一个标志性的武器平台现在重生了，就像新版以色列的卡拉什尼科夫一样，成为尖端技术。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。AK 阿尔法配备了战术消音器、AK 阿尔法抑制器、战术握把、Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS 和哈特曼 MH1 RDS。

original.value: Phobos M240B

translation.value: 福波斯 M240B

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 低\n福波斯特别版 M240B\nM240B 是美国陆军的步兵标配中型机枪，也是美国海军陆战队的现役标准装备。

original.value: Phobos M60E4

Key improvements are: the introduction of three styles of barrels and animproved belt feed with greater pull force for improved belt lift capability.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中\n福波斯特别版 M60E4\n于 1990 年代前期开发的 M60E4 是对萨科防务公司的 M60E3 的进一步改良。该枪可换用三种不同样式的枪管，使用改进后的弹链，更大的拉力使装弹量得以提升。

Recoil: Low\nSpecial Phobos version of ACR CQB.\nThe ACR CQB is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\n福波斯特别版 ACR CQB。\nACR CQB 是自适应战斗步枪（简称 ACR）的改型，而 ACR 则是美国陆军一项耗资约 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。由雷明顿武器公司负责制造。

Has unique attachment KRISS Super V Tactical Grip, KRISS Super V Silencer and Redring MK2 Scope with fast zoom. The Kriss Super V submachine gun was developed by Transformational Defense Industries (TDI). Its name comes from Indonesian sword or large knife. Production of this weapon commenced in 2009. At some point the company became known as Kriss USA and the weapon was rebranded as Vector. TDI Vector or Kriss Super V has excellent accuracy even in continuous fire, making it reliable in various situation. It also comes with an attachable Silencer

original.value: Phobos Winchester 1887

This model was considered the first of many successful repeating shotguns, a favorite of collectors and cowboy action shooters.

translation.value: 后坐力：中\n“福波斯”特别版 Winchester 1887。\n这款拉杆式枪是约翰·勃朗宁于 1887 年为温彻斯特公司设计的。该型号被认为是许多成功的复制霰弹枪的先驱，颇受收藏家和牛仔动作射击游戏的青睐。

Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Phobos" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：低\n“福波斯”特别版 SAP-6。\n短管 SAP6 是一款弹匣供弹式重装霰弹枪。它的新设计特色包含一个重装单体式四轨系统和一个经过重新设计的铝质泵握把，配合内置垂直前握把使用。原版 SAP6 霰弹枪的开发者一直都在想办法克服常见的老款霰弹枪设计所存在的不足之处。可拆卸式弹匣的使用能在不牺牲弹匣容量的前提下，让枪管更短。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special Phobos version of McMillan CS5. The McMillan CS5 is designed for stealth and concealment in urban settings. The bolt action CS5 is specifically designed as a compact and concealable precision tactical rifle. It is available in suppressed configuration for military and law enforcement applications, as well as standard configuration.

original.value: Phobos Orsis T-5000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Phobos version of Orsis T-5000. \nThe Orsis T-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS, and is produced in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at the international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil. The Sniper Rifle has high accuracy and high chance to make one shot kill. Now even protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies at close quarters and middle distances.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力低\n福波斯特别版 Orsis T-5000。\nOrsis T-5000 是一款俄罗斯栓动狙击步枪。作为 ORSIS 研发的第一款产品，由该公司的莫斯科工厂生产。这款步枪在 2011 俄罗斯下塔吉尔国际武器装备展上首次亮相，具有高精准度，且有很大几率一发毙命，现在，即使是防护手套和防护靴也无法在近距离和中距离战斗中拯救你的敌人。

original.value: Phobos Kraken CDX MC

translation.value: 福波斯 Kraken CDX MC

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Phobos" version of Kraken CDX MC. Have unique attachment Defence Falcon Bipod, Cadex Defence Precision Silencer, Kraken Special Suppressor, ATACR 4.5x scope. The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “福波斯”特别版 Kraken CDX MC。 配备独特附件反隼两脚架、Cadex Defense 精密消音器、特殊北海巨妖抑制器、ATACR 4.5x 瞄准镜。 CDX-MC 北海巨妖是一款多口径步枪，采用创新（专利未决）的枪管更换系统。与市场上的其他型号相比，这种多口径系统在相同枪管的拆卸和重装时，具有最低的冲击点转换。单个螺钉固定可拆卸底座，可实现短枪机口径和长枪机口径之间的快速切换。

original.value: Phobos Stechkin APS

translation.value: 福波斯 Stechkin APS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Phobos version of Stechkin APS. \nThe Stechkin APS (Avtomaticheskiy Pistolet Stetchkina) is a Russian selective fire machine pistol. It bears the name of its developer, Igor Stechkin. Pistol was intended as a sidearm for artillery soldiers, tank crews and aircraft personnel.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力：高\n福波斯特别版 Stechkin APS。\n俄制 Stechkin APS（Avtomaticheskiy Pistolet Stetchkina）是一款配备快慢机的全自动手枪，是作为炮兵、坦克乘员和飞行员的副武器研制的。

original.value: Phobos Micro Desert Eagle

translation.value: 福波斯微型沙漠之鹰

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Phobos version of Micro Desert Eagle. \nSharing all the family traits of the world-famous Desert Eagle pistol, Magnum's Micro Desert Eagle pistol, chambered in .380 ACP, is the ultimate in compact personal protection. Small enough to nest comfortably at home, in a pocket or in a purse, the double action only Micro Desert Eagle is proudly made in the U.S. and weighs less than 14 oz. But don't let its size fool you. The Micro Desert Eagle provides big-time protection with a gas-assisted blowback system for ultimate reliability and amazing accuracy. Which only goes to prove that good things do indeed come in small packages.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力：中\n福波斯特别版微型沙漠之鹰。\n和世界著名的沙漠之鹰手枪同宗同源的微型沙漠之鹰手枪采用了 .380 ACP 弹药，是贴身个人防护的终极选择。小到足以隐蔽地放进口袋或者手包里，双动击发的微型沙漠之鹰是美国的骄傲，重量低于 14 盎司。但是千万别让尺寸蒙蔽了你。微型沙漠之鹰提供了一流的保护，它的气体辅助枪机后坐式系统提供了可靠度和极佳的精准度——好东西不在于大尺寸。

original.value: Phobos Maxim 9

translation.value: 福波斯 Maxim 9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle, Scope Recoil: Medium Special Phobos version of Maxim 9. The Maxim 9 is the world`s first integrally suppressed 9mm handgun that is holster-able and hearing safe with all types of 9mm ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口、瞄准镜 后坐力：中 福波斯特别版 Maxim 9。 Maxim 9 是世界上首款内置抑制器的 9 毫米手枪，可腰射，并在使用任何 9 毫米口径弹药时均可保护听力。

original.value: Phobos ICE-AXE

original.value: Special Phobos version of ICE-AXE\nAn ice-axe is a multi-purpose ice and snow tool used by mountaineers both in the ascent and descent of routes which involve frozen conditions. It can be held and employed in a number of different interesting ways...

translation.value: 福波斯特别版冰斧\n冰斧是一款登山家在上下山过程中遇到结冰状况时，用来破开冰面和雪地的多用途工具，有多种不同而有趣的持有和使用方式……

original.value: Phobos Balisong Knife

translation.value: 福波斯蝴蝶刀

original.value: M16A3 Custom Tourney

translation.value: M16A3 嘉年华定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Tourney camouflage version of the M16A3. \n The M16A3 Custom, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高\n足球嘉年华特别版 M16A3。\nM16A3 现在是美国海军陆战队和某些陆军单位的前线人员的标配。它取消了固定式提把和机械瞄具的组合，将其换成了导轨，使这把枪可以同时安装提把和大多数军用或民用瞄准镜或观察设备。

original.value: Honey Badger Tourney

translation.value: 嘉年华版蜜獾

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: High\nSpecial Tourney camouflage version of the Honey Badger. \n The AAC Honey Badger PDW is an special PDW weapon based on the AR-15.Have integrated customized sub-sonic silencer. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、导轨。后坐力：高\n足球嘉年华特别版蜜獾\n蜜獾是一款特殊的 PDW 武器，配有整体定制的消音器。这种枪专为使用特殊的 ACR 口径亚音速弹药制造，用于取代 H&K MP5 和相似的 CQB 武器系统。

original.value: Fabarm STF 12 Compact Tourney

translation.value: 嘉年华版 Fabarm STF 12 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Tourney camouflage version of the Fabarm STF 12 Compact. \n Fabarm STF12 Compact is collection of innovative technologies for close combat fire arms. It use latest developments and materials and improve expirience of high dynamic combat for operator in fire, pump-action, reload, movement and other important areas of use of a weapon in the battle.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口\n足球嘉年华特别版 Fabarm STF 12 Compact。\nFabarm STF 12 Compact 将近距离战斗枪械的创新性技术以及最新材料开发的优秀材料融为一体。在所有重要作战场合都能提供高度动态的战斗体验。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special Tourney camouflage version of the Remington R11 RSASS. Manufactured by: Remington Arms. This weapon succeeds where others fail, meeting any and all mission requirements with ease.The Remington Semi Automatic Sniper System is the culmination of a joint effort between Remington Arms and JP Enterprises to develop a highly accurate and superbly built rapid firing sniper rifle.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 足球嘉年华特别版 Remington R11 RSASS。 制造商：雷明顿武器公司。 这件武器弥补了其他武器的不足，轻松满足了所有任务的需求。雷明顿半自动狙击系统将这件武器变为了高精准度、高规格的速射狙击步枪。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight.\n The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n独特附件：AK-12 特别版抑制器、AK-12 特别版消音器、AK-12 特殊握把、Romeo 4 瞄具。\nAK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良：后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

original.value: Gold AK-12

translation.value: 黄金版 AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of AK-12. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 AK-12 的黄金版。 该武器可对改造人造成50%的额外伤害。 独特附件：AK-12 特别版抑制器、AK-12 特别版消音器、AK-12 特殊握把、Romeo 4 瞄具。 AK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良：后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

original.value: Vkontakte VHS-2

translation.value: 社会正义 VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vkontakte" version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中等\n社会正义版 VHS-2。\n克罗地亚 VHS-2 是 VHS 步枪的改良版本，它保留了原版的无托结构设计、口径、枪管长度以及内部机制，但引入了更加传统的全新单连发选择掣。经过重新设计的手提把手、长度可调节的枪托以及双手皆可操作的弹壳弹射系统，不到一分钟即可完成左右切换使用的配置。

original.value: Vkontakte M1911A1

translation.value: 社会正义 M1911A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vkontakte" version of M1911A1\n The M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力：中等\n社会正义版 M1911A1\nM1911 是一款单动式弹匣供弹枪管后坐半自动手枪，采用 .45 ACP 口径子弹，在 1911 年至 1985 年间，一直是美军的标配随身武器。首次出现是在美菲战争的后期，后又参加了两次世界大战、朝鲜战争和越南战争。之后，美国军方采用改良设计，研制出 M1911A1 手枪，出色服役直至 20 世纪 80 年代中期。

original.value: Vkontakte SAP-6

translation.value: 社会正义 SAP6

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Vkontakte" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：小\n社会正义版 SAP-6。\n短管 SAP6 是一款弹匣供弹式重装霰弹枪。它的新设计特色包含一个重装单体式四轨系统和一个经过重新设计的铝质泵握把，配合内置垂直前握把使用。原版 SAP6 霰弹枪的开发者一直都在想办法克服常见的老款霰弹枪设计所存在的不足之处。可拆卸式弹匣的使用能在不牺牲弹匣容量的前提下，让枪管更短。

original.value: Vkontakte H&K MP5A5 Custom

translation.value: 社会正义版 H&K MP5A5 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Have the unique attachment RAMBO SP-6 1.8x Fast Scope. Special "Vkontakte" version of H&K MP5A5 Custom The H&K MP5 is the classic configuration of the MP5 submachine gun developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K). It features comfort recoil, great zoom in speed and high damage that guarantee headshot a close quarters.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 社会正义版 H&K MP5A5 Custom 配备独特附件：RAMBO SP-6 1.8x 快速瞄准镜。 H&K MP5是经典配置版 MP5 冲锋枪，出自 1960 年代德国小型军火制造商黑克勒&科赫（H&K）公司之手。这件武器具有适度的后坐力、极佳的瞄准速度及高杀伤力，这些都保证了该枪能够进行近距离爆头。

original.value: Vkontakte AT308

translation.value: 社会正义 AT308

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special "Vkontakte" version of AT308 Have unique attachment Razor HD Gen II 4.7x Fast Riflescope. The AT (Accuracy Tactical) continues the legacy of the combat proven AW308 and takes the AW to new levels. AT308 has a fixed stock with 24 inch, quick change, plain barrel. The AT is ideal for Law Enforcement and civilian users.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低 社会正义版 AT308 配备独特附件： Razor HD 第 II 代 4.7x 快速步枪瞄准镜。 AT（Accuracy Tactical）继承了经过战斗洗礼的 AW308，并将其带上了一个新高度。AT308 有一个固定枪托和 24 英尺长的快装平整枪管，是执法单位和民用的不二之选。

original.value: Vkontakte M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: 社会正义 M48 鲍威刀

original.value: M48 Bowie Knife \nSpecial Vkontakte version of M48 Bowie Knife. \nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: 社会正义版 M48 鲍威刀。\n它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身着防近战背心的敌人。\nM48 是久经考验的鲍威刀的现代重现版，它具备坚固的不锈钢刀刃、锯齿状的刀背和钛金属外壳。此武器可充分满足你所有的战术需求。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe TEC-9 gun is a Swedish-American made 9mm semi-automatic to fully-automatic handgun. It is known for having poor accuracy, but what it lacks in accuracy and reliability it more than makes up for with firepower and the ability to easily modify it to full auto.

The TEC-9 gun is a Swedish-American made 9mm semi-automatic to fully-automatic handgun. It is known for having poor accuracy, but what it lacks in accuracy and reliability it more than makes up for with firepower and the ability to easily modify it to full auto.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：中 TEC-9 的黄金版。 这种武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 TEC-9 是一款美瑞联合制造的 9 毫米半自动至全自动手枪，以精准度低闻名。不过尽管精准度和可靠性欠缺，但火力却非常强大，而且可以轻松改为全自动模式。

original.value: Open Cup 2019 Ak-Alpha

translation.value: 2019 公开赛杯 AK 阿尔法

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Open Cup 2019 version of Ak-Alpha\nThe Ak-Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n2019 公开赛杯特别版 AK 阿尔法\nAK 阿尔法是一种革命性的武器升级方法。一支由以色列国防军特种部队中精心挑选出来的专业神枪手和工程师组成的团队设计了这款武器。这样，射手就能够使用世界上最可靠的武器最大限度地发挥他的潜力了。一个标志性的武器平台因而得以重生，就像新版以色列的卡拉什尼科夫一样，成为尖端技术。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。AK 阿尔法配备了战术消音器、AK 阿尔法抑制器、战术握把、Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS 和哈特曼 MH1 RDS。

The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger AS VAL

translation.value: 虎纹 AS VAL

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of AS VAL.\nThe AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：高\n特别虎纹版 AS VAL。\nAS Val （特种自动 Val、特种自动步枪，代号“铁杆”）是一款苏联设计的突击步枪，配有整体抑制器。由精密机械工程中央科学研究院（TSNIITOCHMASH）于 20 世纪 80 年代后期开发，被俄罗斯雪域特战队、MVD、FSB 和俄军的一些精干部队所使用。1987 年它成为了苏军和克格勃所使用的武器。由于使用 9x39 毫米重型亚音速弹 SP-6（高性能穿甲弹）和 VSS Vintorez 所用的 SP-5 实心弹，它的有效射程能达到大约 300 米。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight Special "Vietnam Tiger" version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：低 独特附件：C-More 红点瞄准镜 虎纹特别版 CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot。 Czech Mate 枪型（针对 IPSC Open 级）采用 9x19（9 毫米鲁格弹或 9 毫米主重火力子弹）弹药，带有四孔补偿器。Czech Mate 系列的单侧 CZ 支座上安装有 C-More 红点瞄准镜，颜色有全黑色和缤纷彩色“Parrot”。彩色“Parrot”包含三块红色硬铝底座、短而细的桔黄色手柄、一个紫色扳机杆、一个红色扳机、一个蓝色瞄准镜支座以及一个绿色弹匣室。
