original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Rune version of M16A4.\nThe M16A4, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高\n狂暴战士特别版 M16A4。\nM16A4 现在是美国海军陆战队和某些陆军部队的前线人员的标准配置。它取消了“固定式提把和机械后瞄具的组合”，将其换成了 MIL-STD-1913 皮卡汀尼导轨，使这款步枪可以同时安装提把和大多数军用或民用瞄准镜或观察设备。

original.value: Rune ACR

translation.value: 狂暴战士 ACR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Rune version of ACR. \n The ACR is abbreviation of Advanced Combat Rifle. It was developed by United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\n狂暴战士特别版 ACR。 \n ACR 代表“高级战斗步枪” ，是美国陆军一项旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。该计划总耗资近 3 亿美元。

original.value: Rune AK-12

translation.value: 狂暴战士 AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Rune version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 狂暴战士特别版 AK-12 独特附件：AK-12 特别版抑制器、AK-12 特别版消音器、AK-12 特殊握把、Romeo 4 瞄具。 AK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良，包括后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

original.value: Rune S&W Survival Tanto Blade

translation.value: 狂暴战士 S&W Survival Tanto Blade

original.value: S&W Survival Tanto Blade\nSpecial Rune version of S&W Survival Tanto Blade. \n It is made by Smith and Wesson. The blade is a tanto configuration, based on the short knife Samurai warriors, in feudal Japan carried. To make it more modern Morgan Taylor, the designer, added the serrated edge on the top. It's a deadly beast.

translation.value: S&W Survival Tanto Blade\n狂暴战士特别版 S&W Survival Tanto Blade。 \n 由史密斯威森制造。刀刃采用了短刀头样式，其设计参照了日本封建时代的武士携带的短刀。为了让它更具现代化特色，设计师摩根·泰勒为其设计了锯齿状刀锋。在战场上，这款刀就是一头致命的“野兽”。

original.value: Rune Gerber Tomahawk

translation.value: 狂暴战士戈博战斧

original.value: GERBER TOMAHAWK Special Rune version of Gerber Tomahawk. This Axe can hit enemies on increased distance. Gerber Tomahawk increased damage. Secondary melee attack could kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests!

translation.value: 戈博战斧 狂暴战士特别版戈博战斧 这种斧子可以击中更大范围内的敌人。 戈博战斧伤害值更大。 它的二次近战攻击可以干掉身穿防刺背心的敌人！

original.value: Rune Taurus Judge

translation.value: 狂暴战士 Taurus Judge

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Rune version of Taurus Judge.\nTaurus Judge is an extremely powerful revolver that uses .410 shotgun shells for ammo. Due to the short barrel, the pellet spread is enormous and makes the gun less effective at distance. Point-black, however, the Judge kicks like a horse. Ammunition size and weight limit the cylinder to only 5 rounds.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n狂暴战士特别版 Taurus Judge。\nTaurus Judge 是一款使用 .410 霰弹枪弹药的超强大左轮手枪。因为枪筒较短的缘故，弹丸散布很广，不适合远程射击。不过 Judge 在近战中就像一匹野马一样威力无比。同时，由于弹药大小和重量的限制，弹筒只能容纳 5 发子弹。

original.value: Rune TEC-9

translation.value: 狂暴战士 TEC-9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial version of Rune TEC-9.\nThe TEC-9 gun is a Swedish-American made 9mm semi-automatic to fully-automatic handgun. It is known for having poor accuracy, but what it lacks in accuracy and reliability it more than makes up for with firepower and the ability to easily modify it to full auto.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n狂暴战士特别版 Rune TEC-9。\nTEC-9 是一款美瑞联合制造的 9 毫米半自动至全自动手枪，以精准度低闻名。不过尽管精准度和可靠性欠缺，但火力却非常强大，而且可以轻松改为全自动模式。

original.value: Rune Crye Precision SIX12

translation.value: 狂暴战士 Crye Precision SIX12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Rune version of Crye Precision SIX12.\nSIX12 is an experimental firearm released for law enforcement in 2014. The shotgun has a revolving cylinder that is rotated by the double action trigger. A unique feature is that the cylinder completely detaches from the gun to allow quick reloading

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n狂暴战士特别版 Crye Precision SIX12。\nSIX12 是一款实验性枪械，于 2014 年配发给执法单位。这款霰弹枪具有一个旋转弹巢，由双动式扳机控制旋转。此枪的独到之处在于弹巢可完全拆卸，这一特点使其能够快速装弹

original.value: Rune Tavor TS12В Custom

translation.value: 狂暴战士 Tavor TS12B Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Middle\nSpecial Rune version of Tavor TS12В Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the capability of being configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n狂暴战士特别版 Tavor TS12В Custom。\nTavor TS12 是一款 12 号口径无托型霰弹枪，可经过配置用于左右手弹射和操作。这款导气式枪械配有一个两档导气调节装置和一个短程导气活塞，另外还采用十字栓保险。Tavor TS12 枪体紧凑、易于使用和维护、弹匣容量大，是防御和战术用途的理想选择。

original.value: Rune XM8 Compact

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial version of XM8 Compact.\nThe XM8 Compact is special configuration with shortened barrel. This version of XM8 is very effective for close quarters battle (CQB).

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Rune version of Desert Tech MDR-C.\nThe Desert Tech Micro Dynamic Rifle Compact (MDR-C) is a bullpup SMG produced by US-based Desert Tech Inc. Features include: comfort recoil, fast reloading and great damage which provides great penetrability against helmets, even with a silencer.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n狂暴战士特别版 Desert Tech MDR-C。\nDesert Tech 紧凑型微动步枪（MDR-C）是一款无托型 SMG，由美国 Desert Tech Inc. 公司设计。它的特点包括后坐力适度、装弹速度快、伤害值高以及穿透力出色，即使使用了消音器也能穿透头盔。

original.value: Rune Tommy Gun M1928

translation.value: 狂暴战士 Thompson M1928

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope Recoil: Low\nSpecial version of Rune Tommy Gun M1928\nThe Thompson M1928 is a select-fire submachine gun designed and developed in the United States. It was manufactured by Auto-Ordnance and chambered in the popular .45 ACP ammunition. The Thompson submachine gun was famously used during the Prohibition era used by law enforcement individuals, marines and mafia criminals.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜后坐力：低\n狂暴战士特别版 Thompson M1928\nThompson M1928 是一款由美国设计和研制的选射型冲锋枪。制造商是美国自动军械公司，采用热门的 .45 ACP 弹药。Thompson 冲锋枪曾在禁酒期受到执法部门、海军和有组织罪犯的热捧。

original.value: Rune Orsis T-5000

translation.value: 狂暴战士 Orsis T-5000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Rune version of Orsis T-5000.\nThe Orsis T-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS, and is produced in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at the international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil. The Sniper Rifle has high accuracy and high chance to make one shot kill. Now even protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies at close quarters and middle distances.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\n狂暴战士特别版 Orsis T-5000。\nOrsis T-5000 是一款俄制栓动狙击步枪。作为 ORSIS 研发的第一款产品，由该公司的莫斯科工厂生产。这款步枪在 2011 下塔吉尔俄罗斯武器装备国际展上首次亮相，精准度高，且有很大几率一发毙命，现在，即使是防护手套和防护靴也无法在近距离和中距离战斗中拯救你的敌人。

original.value: Rune Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special version of Rune Truvelo CMS 20x42mm. Have unique attachment Truvelo CMS Special Suppressor, Truvelo CMS Tactical Suppressor. Truvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 >狂暴战士特别版 Truvelo CMS 20x42mm。 独特附件：Truvelo CMS 特别版抑制器、Truvelo CMS 战术抑制器。 Truvelo CMS 是南非反器材步枪系列，其中的 20x42 毫米改型是该系列中最小且最强大的步枪。该武器针对在敌占区进行空中部署而研制，在同类中属于相当紧凑和轻量级的武器，但是由于携带 20x42 毫米口径的巨型弹药，因而杀伤力极大。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Halloween" version of SIG MPX SBR Custom.\nSIG MPX SBR Custom is a 4-burst round sub-machine gun. Unconventional design. Unmatched performance. The SIG MPX redefines the submachine gun category with a new level of operator safety, in-field adaptability and proven reliability in the harshest enviroments. There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Halloween" version of Stoner LMG A1.\nThe Stoner LMG, is a light machine gunmanufactured by the Knight's Armament Company.The Stoner LMG was designed by renowned American gun designer Eugene Stoner (famed as the designer of the AR-15) and was one of the last projects he worked.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“促狭鬼”特别版斯通纳 LMG A1。\n斯通纳 LMG 是一款由奈特军械公司生产的轻机枪，也是美国著名枪械设计师尤金·斯通纳（因设计 AR-15 而闻名）最后参与的设计项目之一。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special "Halloween" version of The Bushmaster BA50. The Bushmaster BA50 is a bolt action, magazine fed rifle designed to shoot the .50 BMG cartridge! The Sniper Rifle has extremely high chance to make one shot kill. Protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies even at long range!

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜。后坐力：低 “促狭鬼”特别版 Bushmaster BA50。 Bushmaster BA50 是一把栓动式弹匣供弹步枪，使用 .50 BMG 弹药！ 这种狙击步枪几乎可以做到枪枪必杀。即使相隔很远，武装到牙齿的敌人也无法在这种武器的枪口下幸免！

original.value: Halloween Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: “促狭鬼”Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special "Halloween" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 配备独特附件Viper MOA，Osprey 9 消音器 “促狭鬼”特别版 Marlin 1894 Custom。 Marlin 1894 是一款经典的杠杆式步枪，操控简单，能够快速射出威力强大的子弹。最初由赫本于 1893 年 8 月 1 日获得专利，1894 式的特点是具有重复发射能力的革命性杠杆系统。1894 式配备一个新的锁紧螺栓和一个两片式撞针，以及一个改进的一体式扳机和一个短接收器，使弹药筒与 1888 和 1889 型号兼容。

original.value: Special Halloween version of Balisong Knife.\nA balisong knife is a folding pocket knife. Its distinction is two handles counter-rotating around the tang such that, when closed, the blade is concealed within grooves in the handles.

translation.value: 南瓜克莱莫 这种恐怖的南瓜是一种地雷，可丢到对手的脚边。它具有一些独特机制： 15秒未爆炸则会消失 可使用火枪摧毁 可以从墙上反弹回来，并在地图上滚动

Recoil: Low\nHas unique attachments Cobalt Kinetics Special Silencer, HALO MiniVert Grip V1, MOD Billet Foregrip V1 and Holosun MK2 with fast zoom.\nWhen the AR market goes soft good companies like Cobalt Kinetics concentrate their efforts in offering more value and innovation to their customers. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

original.value: Gold AS-"VAL"

translation.value: 黄金版 AS“VAL”

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope . Recoil: High Golden version of AS-"VAL". This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力： 高 黄金版 AS“VAL”。 这件武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 AS “Val” （特种自动 Val、特种自动步枪，代号：“铁杆”）是一款苏联设计的突击步枪，配有整体抑制器。由精密机械工程中央科学研究院（TSNIITOCHMASH）于二十世纪 80 年代后期开发，被俄罗斯雪域特战队、MVD、FSB 和俄军的一些精干部队所使用。从 1987 年开始它就成为了苏军和克格勃所使用的武器。由于使用 9x39 毫米重型亚音速弹 SP-6（高性能穿甲弹）和 VSS Vintorez 所用的 SP-5 实心弹，它的有效射程能达到大约 300 米。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of Kraken CDX MC. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 250%. Have unique attachment Defence Falcon Bipod, Cadex Defence Precision Silencer, Kraken Special Suppressor, ATACR 4.5x scope. The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 黄金版 CDX-MC 北海巨妖。 这件武器可对改造人造成 250% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件反隼两脚架、Cadex Defence 精密消音器、特殊北海巨妖抑制器、ATACR 4.5x 瞄准镜。 CDX-MC 北海巨妖是一款多口径步枪，采用创新（专利未决）的枪管更换系统。与市场上的其他型号相比，这种多口径系统在相同枪管的拆卸和重装时，具有最低的冲击点转换。单个螺钉固定可拆卸底座，可实现短枪机口径和长枪机口径之间的快速切换。

original.value: Corporation Ak-Alpha

translation.value: “Onyx” AK 阿尔法

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Corporation version of AK-Alfa\nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“缟玛瑙”特别版 AK 阿尔法\nAK 阿尔法是一种革命性的武器升级方法。一支由以色列国防军特种部队中精心挑选出来的专业神枪手和工程师组成的团队设计了这款阿尔法步枪。这样，射手就能够使用世界上最可靠的武器最大限度地发挥他的射击能力了。一个标志性的武器平台现在重生了，就像新版以色列的卡拉什尼科夫一样，成为尖端技术。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。AK 阿尔法配备了战术消音器、AK 阿尔法抑制器、战术握把、Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS 和哈特曼 MH1 RDS。

Recoil: Medium Special Corporation version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 SpecialSuppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “缟玛瑙”特别版 AK-12 配备独特附件AK-12 特别版抑制器、AK-12 特别版消音器、AK-12 特别版握把、Romeo 4 瞄具。 AK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良，包括后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

Have unique attachment Truvelo CMS Special Suppressor, Truvelo CMS Tactical Suppressor. Truvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “黑水晶”特别版 Truvelo CMS 20x42 毫米。 配备独特附件Truvelo CMS 特别版抑制器、Truvelo CMS 战术抑制器。 Truvelo CMS 是南非反器材步枪系列，其中的 20x42 毫米改型是该系列中最小且最强大的步枪。该武器针对在敌占区进行空中部署而研制，在同类中属于相当紧凑和轻量级的武器，但是由于携带 20x42 毫米口径的巨型弹药，因而杀伤力极大。

original.value: Premium Blackwood SV-98

translation.value: “Morion” SV-98

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. Special version Premium Blackwood of SV-98. Has unique attachment SV-98 Suppressor, HSV-98 DTK Special Suppressor, ATACR V2 4.5x scope. The SV-98 is a Russian bolt action sniper rifle designed by Vladimir Stronskiy in 1998 and in production at IZHMASH JSC. It fires 7.62x54mm rounds with an effective range of around 1 kilometer. The rifle has been used in combat during operations in Chechnya.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “黑水晶”特别版 SV-98。 配备独特附件SV-98 抑制器、HSV-98 DTK 特别版抑制器、ATACR V2 4.5 倍瞄准镜。 SV-98 是一款俄制栓动狙击步枪，于 1998 年由弗拉迪米尔·史托恩斯基设计并由 IZHMASH 股份公司制造。该枪使用 7.62x54 毫米弹药，有效射程约 1 千米。在车臣的军事行动中，这款步枪曾经在战斗中被使用。

Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Blackwood" version of Hera Arms CQR.\nThis weapon is basically an AR-15, clad in modern set of accessories produced by Germany-based Hera Arms. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“黑曜石”特别版 HArms CQR。\n这款武器是在 AR-15 基础上加装了一组现代化的配件打造而成的，由总部位于德国的 Hera Arms 研制。这是一个高度符合人体工程学的系统，既强大又轻便。搭配由麦格普公司生产的弹鼓，这款使用起来非常舒适的突击步枪将提供更长时间的持续可控火力。

original.value: Blackwood Stoner LMG A1

translation.value: “Obsidian”斯通纳 LMG A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Blackwood" version of Stoner LMG A1.\nThe Stoner LMG, is a light machine gunmanufactured by the Knight's Armament Company.The Stoner LMG was designed by renowned American gun designer Eugene Stoner (famed as the designer of the AR-15) and was one of the last projects he worked.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“黑曜石”特别版斯通纳 LMG A1。\n斯通纳 LMG 是一款由奈特军械公司生产的轻机枪，也是美国著名枪械设计师尤金·斯通纳（因设计 AR-15 而闻名）最后参与的设计项目之一。

original.value: Blackwood LWRC SMG-45

translation.value: “Obsidian” LWRC SMG-45

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Has unique attachment LWRC SMG-45 RDS and LWRC SMG-45 Angled Fore Grip Special "Blackwood" version of LWRC SMG-45. LWRC SMG-45 is a modern sub-machine gun from US-based manufacturer LWRC International, first unveiled in 2016. This powerful SMG takes HK UMP magazines with .45 ACP ammo. Compared to most other SMGs, .45 ACP offers a superb punch and stopping power. Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：高 配备独特附件LWRC SMG-45 RDS和LWRC SMG-45 直角前握把 “黑曜石”特别版 LWRC SMG-45。 LWRC SMG-45 是一款由美国制造商 LWRC 国际公司研制的现代冲锋枪，于 2016 年面世。这款强大的 SMG 配备了 HK UMP 弹匣，采用 .45 ACP 弹药。与其他大多数 SMG 相比，.45 ACP 具有出色的冲击力和阻滞力。在结构紧凑的基础上，SMG-45 还采用了一种可折叠握把，并且双手可以随意切换，操作起来非常舒服。

original.value: Blackwood Kraken CDX MC

translation.value: “Obsidian”北海巨妖 CDX MC

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Blackwood" version of Kraken CDX MC. Have unique attachment Defence Falcon Bipod, Cadex Defence Precision Silencer, Kraken Special Suppressor, ATACR 4.5x scope. The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “黑曜石”特别版北海巨妖 CDX MC。 配备独特附件反隼两脚架、Cadex Defence 精密消音器、特殊北海巨妖抑制器、ATACR 4.5x 瞄准镜。 CDX-MC 北海巨妖是一款多口径步枪，采用创新（专利未决）的枪管更换系统。与市场上的其他型号相比，这种多口径系统在相同枪管的拆卸和重装时，具有最低的冲击点转换。单个螺钉固定可拆卸底座，可实现短枪机口径和长枪机口径之间的快速切换。

original.value: Blackwood Winchester 1887

translation.value: “Obsidian” Winchester 1887

original.value: Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Blackwood" version of Winchester 1887.\nThe lever-action gun was designed by John Browning for the Winchester Repeating Arms Company in 1887. This model was considered the first of many successful repeating shotguns, a favorite of collectors and cowboy action shooters.

translation.value: 后坐力：中\n“黑曜石”特别版 Winchester 1887。\n这款拉杆式枪是约翰·勃朗宁于 1887 年为温彻斯特公司设计的。该型号被认为是许多成功的复制霰弹枪的先驱，颇受收藏家和牛仔动作射击游戏的青睐。

original.value: Blackwood Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: “Obsidian” Marlin 1894 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special "Blackwood" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 配备独特附件Viper MOA、Osprey 9 消音器 “黑曜石”特别版 Marlin 1894 定制版。 Marlin 1894 是一款经典的杠杆式步枪，操控简单，能够快速射出威力强大的子弹。最初由赫本于 1893 年 8 月 1 日获得专利，1894 式的特点是具有重复发射能力的革命性杠杆系统。1894 式配备一个新的锁紧螺栓和一个两片式撞针，以及一个改进的一体式扳机和一个短接收器，使弹药筒与 1888 和 1889 型号兼容。

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口、瞄准镜 后坐力：中 “黑曜石”特别版 Maxim 9。 Maxim 9 是世界上首款内置抑制器的 9 毫米手枪，可腰射，并在使用任何 9 毫米口径弹药时均可保护听力。

original.value: Blackwood Jagdkommando

translation.value: “Obsidian”狩猎之令

original.value: Special "Blackwood" version of Jagdkommando.\nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: 狩猎之令“黑曜石”特别版。\n狩猎之令是一款独特的刀，采用坚固的不锈钢磨制而成。以澳大利亚特种部队的名字命名，它也没有辜负这样的英名。这把刀的三面利刃扭转至刀尖，凹槽面上带有钻孔，流畅地排列在一起。

original.value: Rocket Launcher RLGS

translation.value: 火箭发射器 RLGS

original.value: Sharp-sighted rocket Launcher . Highly effective against armored units and large clusters of non-armored enemies.

original.value: Rocket Launcher RLGS-100

translation.value: 火箭发射器 RLGS-100

translation.value: 带跟踪导弹的火箭发射器 RLGS-100，是一款精准的火箭发射器，能够高效打击装甲单位和大群非装甲敌人。

original.value: Rocket Launcher RLGS-200

translation.value: 火箭发射器 RLGS-200

translation.value: 拥有双火箭发射模式的火箭发射器 RLGS-200，是一款精准的火箭发射器，能够高效打击装甲单位和大群非装甲敌人。

original.value: Black Friday Hera Arms CQR

translation.value: “Great Gatsby” HArms CQR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Black Friday" version of Hera Arms CQR.\nThis weapon is basically an AR-15, clad in modern set of accessories produced by Germany-based Hera Arms. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“了不起的盖茨比”特别版 Hera Arms CQR。\n这款武器是在 AR-15 基础上加装了一组现代化的配件打造而成的，由总部位于德国的 Hera Arms 研制。这是一个高度符合人体工程学的系统，既强大又轻便。搭配由麦格普公司生产的弹鼓，这款使用起来非常舒适的突击步枪将提供更长时间的持续可控火力。

original.value: Black Friday Stoner LMG A1

translation.value: “Great Gatsby”斯通纳 LMG A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Black Friday" version of Stoner LMG A1.\nThe Stoner LMG, is a light machine gunmanufactured by the Knight's Armament Company.The Stoner LMG was designed by renowned American gun designer Eugene Stoner (famed as the designer of the AR-15) and was one of the last projects he worked.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“了不起的盖茨比”特别版斯通纳 LMG A1。\n斯通纳 LMG 是一款由奈特军械公司生产的轻机枪，也是美国著名枪械设计师尤金·斯通纳（因设计 AR-15 而闻名）最后参与的设计项目之一。

original.value: Black Friday Winchester 1887

translation.value: “Great Gatsby” Winchester 1887

original.value: Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Black Friday" version of Winchester 1887.\nThe lever-action gun was designed by John Browning for the Winchester Repeating Arms Company in 1887. This model was considered the first of many successful repeating shotguns, a favorite of collectors and cowboy action shooters.

translation.value: 后坐力：中\n“了不起的盖茨比”特别版 Winchester 1887。\n这款拉杆式枪是约翰·勃朗宁于 1887 年为温彻斯特公司设计的。该型号被认为是许多成功的复制霰弹枪的先驱，颇受收藏家和牛仔动作射击游戏的青睐。

original.value: Black Friday Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: “Great Gatsby” Marlin 1894 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special "Black Friday" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 配备独特附件Viper MOA、Osprey 9 消音器 “了不起的盖茨比”特别版 Marlin 1894 定制版。 Marlin 1894 是一款经典的杠杆式步枪，操控简单，能够快速射出威力强大的子弹。最初由赫本于 1893 年 8 月 1 日获得专利，1894 式的特点是具有重复发射能力的革命性杠杆系统。1894 式配备一个新的锁紧螺栓和一个两片式撞针，以及一个改进的一体式扳机和一个短接收器，使弹药筒与 1888 和 1889 型号兼容。

original.value: Black Friday SIG MPX SBR Custom

translation.value: “Great Gatsby” SIG MPX SBR 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Black Friday" version of SIG MPX SBR Custom.\nSIG MPX SBR Custom is a 4-burst round sub-machine gun. Unconventional design. Unmatched performance. The SIG MPX redefines the submachine gun category with a new level of operator safety, in-field adaptability and proven reliability in the harshest enviroments. There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\n“了不起的盖茨比”特别版 SIG MPX SBR 定制版。\nSIG MPX SBR Custom 是一款 4 发点射冲锋枪，采用非常规设计，实现无与伦比的性能。SIG MPX 将使用者的安全性提升到了一个新的水平，并具有很高的战场适应性以及在最残酷的环境下久经考验的可靠性，开创了一个全新的冲锋枪类别。SIG 独创，绝无仅有。

original.value: Black Friday Tommy Gun M1928

translation.value: “Great Gatsby” Thompson M1928

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Black Friday" version of Rune Tommy Gun M1928\nThe Thompson M1928 is a select-fire submachine gun designed and developed in the United States. It was manufactured by Auto-Ordnance and chambered in the popular .45 ACP ammunition. The Thompson submachine gun was famously used during the Prohibition era used by law enforcement individuals, marines and mafia criminals.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜后坐力：低\n“了不起的盖茨比”特别版 Thompson M1928\nThompson M1928 是一款由美国设计和研制的选射型冲锋枪。制造商是美国自动军械公司，采用热门的.45 ACP 弹药。Thompson 冲锋枪曾在禁酒期受到执法部门、海军和黑手党罪犯的热捧。

original.value: Black Friday Remington MSR

translation.value: “Great Gatsby”雷明顿 MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Black Friday" version of Remington MSR Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “了不起的盖茨比”特别版雷明顿 MSR 有独特附件博士能 4x 瞄准镜和雷明顿 MSR 抑制器。 雷明顿 MSR 是一款轻铝质手动栓式狙击步枪，在 21 世纪晚期由雷明顿武器公司开发。MSR 表示模块化狙击步枪，因为该武器可通过切换枪管和枪栓实现 .338、.300 和 7.62 口径快速切换。这是一款现代化的精准步枪，就是价格有点昂贵。美军以及其它几个国家已将 MSR 投入使用。

original.value: Black Friday HK G28

translation.value: Great Gatsby H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight Special "Black Friday" version of HK G28. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件HK G28 消音器、HK G28 抑制器、HK 型垂直握把、Schmidt Bender 3 4.5x 瞄准镜、Vector Optics Maverick 红点瞄具 “了不起的盖茨比”特别版 HK G28。 G28 是民用半自动比赛步枪 MR308 的军用版本。指定射手步枪 DMR 采用成型的 7.62 x 51 口径，可确保 1.5 角分的精准度，同时完全具备夜间作战能力。在 600 米范围内，拥有最大有效射程和高首轮命中率的 H&K G28 还可以在 800 米范围内对人体尺寸的目标进行精准火力压制。

original.value: Black Friday Maxim 9

translation.value: “Great Gatsby” Maxim 9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle, Scope Recoil: Medium Special "Black Friday" version of Maxim 9. The Maxim 9 is the world`s first integrally suppressed 9mm handgun that is holster-able and hearing safe with all types of 9mm ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口、瞄准镜 后坐力：中 “了不起的盖茨比”特别版 Maxim 9。 Maxim 9 是世界上首款内置抑制器的 9 毫米手枪，可腰射，并在使用任何 9 毫米口径弹药时均可保护听力。

original.value: Black Friday S&W M&P R8

translation.value: “Great Gatsby” S&W M&P R8

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Black Friday" version of S&W M&P R8.\nIt`s the eight-shot .357 modern tactical revolver, named the Military & Police (M&P) R8, staffed with a Leupold X1.3 DeltaPoint reflex sight. S&W M&P R8 features modern design, high damage and high accuracy.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力： 中\n“了不起的盖茨比”特别版 S&W M&P R8。\n这是一款八发 .357 现代战术左轮手枪，被命名为 M&P（军警两用）R8，配备Leupold 1.3 倍 DeltaPoint 反射式瞄具。S&W M&P R8 采用现代设计，具有高伤害值和高精准度的特点。

original.value: Black Friday Katana

translation.value: “Great Gatsby”武士刀

original.value: Katana This sword can hit enemies on increased distance. Katana has increased damage. Secondary melee attack is so strong that even will kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! Special "Black Friday" version of Katana. The katana is characterized by its distinctive appearance: a curved, slender, single-edged blade with a circular or squared guard and long grip to accommodate two hands. It has historically been associated with the samurai of feudal Japan and has become renowned for its sharpness and strength.

translation.value: 武士刀 这把刀可击中更远的敌人。 武士刀有着更大的伤害值。 它的二次近战攻击力非常强大，甚至能干掉身着防刺背心的敌人！ “了不起的盖茨比”特别版武士刀。 独特的外观是武士刀的一大特点：一把纤细、弯曲的单刃刀，带一个圆形或方形的护手，刀柄可容两只手抓握。在历史上，它经常被与日本封建武士联系在一起，以其锋利和力量而知名。

The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\nUzi Pro 的白霜特别版。\nUZI PRO SMG 是传奇的 UZI 系列的最新成员，UZI 是全世界最受欢迎的武器系列，在全球已售出几百万套。UZI PRO 是执法机关、要员保镖以及特种部队隐蔽携带或公开使用的理想枪支。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nXmas 2019 version of SAI GRY AR-15\nSAI GRY AR-15 is the great assault rifle for tactical operations and competitions. It`s a premium weapon that you can trust with original jailbrake muzzle and extended mag.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大\nSAI GRY AR-15 的白霜特别版。\nSAI GRY AR-15 是一款适用于战术行动和竞赛的绝佳突击步枪。配备原版越狱枪口与扩充弹匣，这是一把值得信赖的高级武器。

original.value: Xmas 2019 Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: 白霜猎豹 GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Xmas 2019 version of Gepard GM6 Lynx. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x 瞄准镜。 猎豹 GM6 Lynx的白霜特别版。 猎豹 GM6 Lynx 是一款匈牙利半自动反器材步枪，开发于 80 年代后期。它采用无托结构和伸缩枪管，对于有着如此火力的武器来说，它的造型相当紧凑。这把枪的重量分布也使得人们可以采用无依托立姿操作它，这对于其它大口径步枪来说要困难的多。

original.value: Xmas 2019 SAP-6

translation.value: 白霜 SAP-6

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nXmas 2019 version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：小\nSAP-6 的白霜特别版。\n短管 SAP-6 是一款弹匣供弹式重装霰弹枪。它的新设计特色包含一个重装单体式四轨系统和一个经过重新设计的铝质泵握把，配合内置垂直前握把使用。原版 SAP-6 霰弹枪的开发者一直都在想办法克服常见的老款霰弹枪设计所存在的不足之处。可拆卸式弹匣的使用能在不牺牲弹匣容量的前提下，让枪管更短。

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Hydra version of AK-Alfa\nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\nAK 阿尔法的九头蛇特别版\nAK 阿尔法是一种革命性的武器升级方法。一支由以色列国防军特种部队中精心挑选出来的专业神枪手和工程师组成的团队设计了这款阿尔法步枪。这样，射手就能够使用世界上最可靠的武器最大限度地发挥他的射击能力了。一个标志性的武器平台现在重生了，就像新版以色列的卡拉什尼科夫一样，成为尖端技术。这款武器的特色包括适度的后坐力、高射速以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。AK 阿尔法配备了战术消音器、AK 阿尔法抑制器、战术握把、Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS 和哈特曼 MH1 RDS。

The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 CDX MC 北海巨妖的九头蛇特别版。 配备独特附件反隼两脚架、Cadex Defence 精密消音器、特殊北海巨妖抑制器、ATACR 4.5x 瞄准镜。 CDX-MC 北海巨妖是一款多口径步枪，采用创新（专利未决）的枪管更换系统。与市场上的其他型号相比，这种多口径系统在相同枪管的拆卸和重装时，具有最低的冲击点转换。单个螺钉固定可拆卸底座，可实现短枪机口径和长枪机口径之间的快速切换。

original.value: Circus AK-12

translation.value: 小丑 AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Circus version of AK-12\nThe AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n小丑特别版 AK-12\nAK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良，包括后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

original.value: Circus S&W M&P R8

translation.value: 小丑 S&W M&P R8

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Circus version of S&W M&P R8\nIt`s the eight-shot .357 modern tactical revolver, named the Military & Police (M&P) R8, staffed with a Leupold X1.3 DeltaPoint reflex sight. S&W M&P R8 features modern design, high damage and high accuracy.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 中\n小丑特别版 S&W M&P R8\n这是一款八发 .357 现代战术左轮手枪，被命名为 M&P（军警两用）R8，配备Leupold 1.3 倍 DeltaPoint 反射式瞄具。S&W M&P R8 采用现代设计，具有高伤害值和高精准度的特点。

original.value: Circus AM-17

translation.value: 小丑 AM-17

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Circus version of AM-17.\nThe AM-17 is a new weapon, developed by the “Kalashnikov” Concern. Based on the previous AM prototype, AM-17 is intended for military and law enforcement use as a CQB weapon or as a Personal Defense Weapon.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小\n小丑特别版AM-17。\nAM-17 是一款新武器，根据“卡拉什尼科夫操纵杆的概念设计而成。AM-17 是在 AM 原型基础上的改版，在军队和执法部门作为近战武器使用或者用作个人防卫武器。

original.value: Circus Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: 小丑 Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Circus version of Uzkon UNG-12. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 小丑特别版 Uzkon UNG-12。 Uzkon UNG-12 霰弹枪由 Uzkon 制造，源自土耳其。Uzkon UNG-12 是一款极具吸引力的无托型自动弹匣供弹霰弹枪。它的设计亮点在于其超现实的风格，下段采用增强聚合物，上段则采用加工铝。Uzkon 枪身巨大，跟一般的标准小规格无托型霰弹枪不同。而且，它还采用非常直观的操控配置，扳机护圈上方有一个十字按钮，拉机柄位于上方机匣左侧。

original.value: Circus Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

translation.value: 小丑 Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Circus version of Truvelo CMS 20x42mm.\nTruvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：大\n小丑特别版 Truvelo CMS 20x42mm。\nTruvelo CMS 是南非反器材步枪系列，其中的 20x42 毫米改型是该系列中最小且最强大的步枪。该武器针对在敌占区进行空中部署而研制，在同类中属于相当紧凑和轻量级的武器，但是由于携带 20x42 毫米口径的巨型弹药，因而杀伤力极大。

original.value: Killing spray

translation.value: “Mr. H”喷雾器

original.value: Recoil: Medium\nSpecial event weapon for 1st April \nClean this server up

original.value: Gorgona FN SCAR-H

translation.value: 微粒 FN SCAR-H

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of FN SCAR-H\n The Special Operations Forces (SOF) Combat Assault Rifle, or SCAR, is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM). The H fires the more powerful 7.62×51mm NATO from a newly designed 20-round magazine.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力： 大\n“微粒”特别版 FN SCAR-H\n特种部队（SOF）作战作战突击步枪 SCAR 是一款由 FN Herstal（FNH）公司为美军特战司令部（SOCOM）定制的模块化步枪。此 H 版使用全新设计的20 发弹匣，装填威力更强的7.62×51毫米北约弹。

original.value: Gorgona AK-47

translation.value: 微粒 AK-47

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of AK-47.\nThe AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62Рx39mm assault rifle, first developed in the USSR by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is also known as a Kalashnikov, an "AK", or in Russian slang, Kalash. Even after six decades the model and its variants remain the most widely used and popular assault rifles in the world because of their durability, low production cost, and ease of use.

translation.value: 附件槽：枪口。后坐力： 中\n“微粒”特别版 AK-47。\nAK-47 最早在苏联由米哈伊尔·卡拉什尼科夫开发，是一款配备快慢机的导气式 7.62Рx39 毫米突击步枪。这款枪也被称为卡拉什尼科夫、AK 或者在俄语里被称为卡拉什。这种枪具有低成本、耐久性好和易操作的特点，即使面世已有六十多年，这种型号及其各种改型依然是世界上使用最为广泛、最热门的突击步枪。

original.value: Gorgona AS VAL

translation.value: 微粒 AS VAL

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of AS VAL.\nThe AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜。后坐力：大\n“微粒”特别版 AS VAL。\nAS “Val” （特种自动 Val、特种自动步枪，代号：“铁杆”）是一款苏联设计的突击步枪，配有整体抑制器。由精密机械工程中央科学研究院（TSNIITOCHMASH）于二十世纪 80 年代后期开发，被俄罗斯雪域特战队、MVD、FSB 和俄军的一些精干部队所使用。从 1987 年开始它就成为了苏军和克格勃所使用的武器。由于使用 9x39 毫米重型亚音速弹 SP-6（高性能穿甲弹）和 VSS Vintorez 所用的 SP-5 实心弹，它的有效射程能达到大约 300 米。

original.value: Gorgona QSZ-92

translation.value: 微粒 QSZ-92

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of QSZ-92. \nThe QSZ-92 Services Pistol is a semi-automatic pistol designed by Norinco and it is in limited service in the People's Liberation Army since the late 1990s. .

translation.value: 附件槽： 枪口。后坐力：小\n“微粒”特别版 QSZ-92。\nQSZ-92 军用手枪是一款半自动手枪，由 中国北方工业公司设计，且自 20 世纪 90 年代末以来，在中国人民解放军中服役。

original.value: Gorgona CZ 75-Auto

translation.value: 微粒 CZ 75-Auto

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of CZ 75-Auto.\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: 附件槽： 枪口。后坐力：小\n“微粒”特别版 CZ 75-Auto。\n CZ 75 是一款由 CZUB 在捷克制造的手枪，有半自动和配备快慢机两种改型。这款手枪于 1975 年首次面世，是最初的“神奇九式”之一，拥有双排弹匣、全钢结构和冷锻枪管，在世界各地有着广泛的应用。

original.value: Gorgona Remington 870 R.A.S.

translation.value: 微粒 Remington 870 R.A.S.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of Gorgona Remington 870 R.A.S.\nSpecial military build of Remington 870 which is a U.S.-made pump-action shotgun manufactured by Remington Arms Company, Inc. In current state use Knights Armament R.A.S. rail which allows special scopes and buil-in pump-action grip for more accuracy firing

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“微粒”特别版 Remington 870 R.A.S.\n由雷明顿武器公司制造的特殊军用版本 Remington 870 是一款美制泵动式霰弹枪，当前使用可搭载特殊瞄准镜的 Knights Armament R.A.S. 导轨并镶装了泵动握把，可获得更高的射击精准度

original.value: Gorgona Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

translation.value: 微粒 Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro - modern shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. S.A.T. means Semi-Automatic Tactical 8. This weapon designed as for law agencies and also for civilian and sport market. Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro is high quality, ergonomic and balance gun. It's automatic is less sensitive to dirt and high reliability.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“微粒”特别版 Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro 是一款由 Fabarm 兵工厂制造的现代霰弹枪。S.A.T. 表示半自动战术。这款武器是为执法机构、普通民众和体育市场设计的。Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro 是一款高品质手枪，具有良好的人体工学性能和平衡性。它采用自动机制，对灰尘敏感度更低，可靠性很高。

original.value: Gorgona Saiga-12 Spike

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of Saiga-12 Spike.\nSaiga-12 Spike is a bull-pup modification of Saiga-12, manufactured by Center Balanced Systems. It allows for higher level of maneuverability and balance, all the while maintaining the traditional Saiga qualities. This specific modification also uses slug rounds, giving it an outstanding punch, at the cost of higher chance of missing your shot.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“微粒”特别版 Saiga-12 Spike。\nSaiga-12 Spike 是由 Center Balanced Systems 制造的 Saiga-12 的无托型改装枪型。它可以提供更高水准的机动性与平衡性，同时保持传统的 Saiga 系列品质。这个特殊改装枪型还使用独头弹，可实现无以伦比的击杀性能，不过所付出的代价就是增加错过目标的机率。

It uses original blowback operated action with polymer body of the gun and fixed shoulder stock, as well as same ambidextrous control. Beretta MX4 submachine gun is normally equipped with iron sights, and an integral Picatinny rail is provided at the top of the receiver for installation of additional sights.

It has detachable iron sigh with very fast zoom in and insanely high rate of fire. These features make this submachine gun incredibly dangerous at close quarters.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Premium Gorgona version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 蛇发女妖特别版 AK-12 配备独特附件AK-12 特别版抑制器、AK-12 特别版消音器、AK-12 特别版握把、Romeo 4 瞄具。 AK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良，包括后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

Recoil: Middle\nSpecial Premium Gorgona version of Tavor TS12 Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the capability of being configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

KS7 is a modern shotgun by American company Kel-Tec, released in 2019. It is a younger, smaller and cheaper brother of KSG, another bullpup shotgun. With only one ammo tube instead of two, it is much lighter and slimmer, and provides user with overall more ergonomic experience.

Unmatched performance. The SIG MPX redefines the submachine gun category with a new level of operator safety, in-field adaptability and proven reliability in the harshest enviroments. There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

Truvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 蛇发女妖特别版 Truvelo CMS 20x42mm。 该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件Truvelo CMS 特别版抑制器、Truvelo CMS 战术抑制器。 Truvelo CMS 是南非反器材步枪系列，其中的 20x42 毫米改型是该系列中最小且最强大的步枪。该武器针对在敌占区进行空中部署而研制，在同类中属于相当紧凑和轻量级的武器，但是由于携带 20x42 毫米口径的巨型弹药，因而杀伤力极大。

The SV-98 is a Russian bolt action sniper rifle designed by Vladimir Stronskiy in 1998 and in production at IZHMASH JSC. It fires 7.62x54mm rounds with an effective range of around 1 kilometer. The rifle has been used in combat during operations in Chechnya.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 蛇发女妖特别版 SV-98。 该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件SV-98 抑制器、HSV-98 DTK 特别版抑制器、ATACR V2 4.5 倍瞄准镜。 SV-98 是一款俄制栓动狙击步枪，于 1998 年由弗拉迪米尔·史托恩斯基设计并由 IZHMASH 股份公司制造。该枪使用 7.62x54 毫米弹药，有效射程约 1 千米。在车臣的军事行动中，这款步枪曾经在战斗中被使用。

It is known for having poor accuracy, but what it lacks in accuracy and reliability it more than makes up for with firepower and the ability to easily modify it to full auto.

original.value: Medusa AK-12

translation.value: 美杜莎 AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Medusa version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 美杜莎特别版 AK-12 配备独特附件AK-12 特别版抑制器、AK-12 特别版消音器、AK-12 特别版握把、Romeo 4 瞄具。 AK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良，包括后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

original.value: Medusa CZ 805 BREN A2

translation.value: 美杜莎 CZ 805 BREN A2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Medusa version of CZ 805 BREN A2. Have unique attachment CZ 805 BREN A2 Special Suppressor, CZ 805 BREN A2 laser sight, OCS-77 Special CZ 805 BREN A2 Tactical Grip Greatly. The CZ 805 BREN A2 is a modern assault rifle is used by the Czech military, Indonesian special forces and Mexican police.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 美杜莎特别版 CZ 805 BREN A2。 配备独特附件： 抑制器、特殊握把和激光瞄准器。 CZ 805 BREN A2 是捷克军队、印尼特种部队和墨西哥警方使用的一款现代版突击步枪。

original.value: Medusa Stoner LMG A1

translation.value: 美杜莎斯通纳 LMG A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Medusa version of Stoner LMG A1.\nThe Stoner LMG, is a light machine gunmanufactured by the Knight's Armament Company.The Stoner LMG was designed by renowned American gun designer Eugene Stoner (famed as the designer of the AR-15) and was one of the last projects he worked.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n美杜莎特别版斯通纳 LMG A1。\n斯通纳 LMG 是一款由奈特军械公司生产的轻机枪，也是美国著名枪械设计师尤金·斯通纳（因设计 AR-15 而闻名）最后参与的设计项目之一。

original.value: Medusa Tavor TS12 Custom

translation.value: 美杜莎 Tavor TS12 定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Middle\nSpecial Medusa version of Tavor TS12 Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the capability of being configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n美杜莎特别版 Tavor TS12 定制版。\nTavor TS12 是一款 12 号口径无托型霰弹枪，可经过配置用于左右手弹射和操作。这款导气式枪械配有一个两档导气调节装置和一个短程导气活塞，另外还采用十字栓保险。Tavor TS12 枪体紧凑、易于使用和维护、弹匣容量大，是防御和战术用途的理想选择。

original.value: Medusa Kel-Tec KS7

translation.value: 美杜莎 Kel-Tec KS7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Medusa version of Kel-Tec KS7. Has unique attachment KS7 Supressor . KS7 is a modern shotgun by American company Kel-Tec, released in 2019. It is a younger, smaller and cheaper brother of KSG, another bullpup shotgun. With only one ammo tube instead of two, it is much lighter and slimmer, and provides user with overall more ergonomic experience.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 美杜莎特别版 Kel-Tec KS7。 配备独特附件KS7 抑制器。 KS7 是一款由美国 Kel-Tec 公司制造的现代霰弹枪，于2019 年投产。这是继 KSG 之后推出的兄弟款无托型霰弹枪，枪身更小、售价更低。弹药筒数量由两个改为一个，更轻便、更小巧，带给使用者更出色的人体工学体验。

original.value: Medusa SIG MPX SBR Custom

translation.value: 美杜莎 SIG MPX SBR Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Medusa version of SIG MPX SBR Custom.\nSIG MPX SBR Custom is a 4-burst round sub-machine gun. Unconventional design. Unmatched performance. The SIG MPX redefines the submachine gun category with a new level of operator safety, in-field adaptability and proven reliability in the harshest enviroments. There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小\n美杜莎特别版 SIG MPX SBR 定制版。\nSIG MPX SBR 定制版是一款 4 发点射冲锋枪，采用非常规设计，实现无与伦比的性能。SIG MPX 将使用者的安全性提升到了一个新的水平，并具有很高的战场适应性以及在最残酷的环境下久经考验的可靠性，开创了一个全新的冲锋枪类别。SIG 独创，绝无仅有。

original.value: Medusa AM-17

translation.value: 美杜莎 AM-17

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special Medusa version of AM-17. Has unique attachment AM-17 Special Suppressor, AM-17 Special Silencer, OCS-77 Special Scope with fast zoom. The AM-17 is a new weapon, developed by the “Kalashnikov” Concern. Based on the previous AM prototype, AM-17 is intended for military and law enforcement use as a CQB weapon or as a Personal Defense Weapon.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：小 美杜莎特别版 AM-17。 配备独特附件抑制器、消音器、快速变焦准直式瞄准镜。 AM-17 是一款新武器，根据“卡拉什尼科夫”的概念设计而成。AM-17 是在 AM 原型基础上的改版，在军队和执法部门作为近战武器使用或者用作个人防卫武器。

original.value: Medusa Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

translation.value: 美杜莎 Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. Special Medusa version of Truvelo CMS 20x42mm. Have unique attachment Truvelo CMS Special Suppressor, Truvelo CMS Tactical Suppressor. Truvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 美杜莎特别版 Truvelo CMS 20x42mm。 配备独特附件Truvelo CMS 特别版抑制器、Truvelo CMS 战术抑制器。 Truvelo CMS 是南非反器材步枪系列，其中的 20x42 毫米改型是该系列中最小且最强大的步枪。该武器针对在敌占区进行空中部署而研制，在同类中属于相当紧凑和轻量级的武器，但是由于携带 20x42 毫米口径的巨型弹药，因而杀伤力极大。

original.value: Medusa SV-98

translation.value: 美杜莎 SV-98

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. Special Medusa version of SV-98. Has unique attachment SV-98 Suppressor, HSV-98 DTK Special Suppressor, ATACR V2 4.5x scope. The SV-98 is a Russian bolt action sniper rifle designed by Vladimir Stronskiy in 1998 and in production at IZHMASH JSC. It fires 7.62x54mm rounds with an effective range of around 1 kilometer. The rifle has been used in combat during operations in Chechnya.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 该武器可对改造人造成 200% 的额外伤害。 美杜莎特别版 SV-98。 配备独特附件SV-98 抑制器、HSV-98 DTK 特别版抑制器、ATACR V2 4.5 倍瞄准镜。 SV-98 是一款俄制栓动狙击步枪，于 1998 年由弗拉迪米尔·史托恩斯基设计并由 IZHMASH 股份公司制造。该枪使用 7.62x54 毫米弹药，有效射程约 1 千米。在车臣的军事行动中，这款步枪曾经在战斗中被使用。

original.value: Medusa TEC-9

translation.value: 美杜莎 TEC-9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Medusa version of TEC-9.\nThe TEC-9 gun is a Swedish-American made 9mm semi-automatic to fully-automatic handgun. It is known for having poor accuracy, but what it lacks in accuracy and reliability it more than makes up for with firepower and the ability to easily modify it to full auto.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n美杜莎特别版 TEC-9。\nTEC-9 是一款美瑞联合制造的 9 毫米半自动至全自动手枪，以精准度低闻名。不过尽管精准度和可靠性欠缺，但火力却非常强大，而且可以轻松改为全自动模式。

original.value: Howa Type 89 Custom

translation.value: 丰和 89 式定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment JCOMP Gen 2 Suppressor, Viking Tactics Vertical Grip, Howa Type 89 Reflex Sight.\n The Howa Type 89, referred to as the type 89 5.56mm rifle, is a Japanese assault rifle used by the Japan Self-Defense Force, the Japan Coast Guard's Special Security Team units, and the Special Assault Team. It was never exported outside Japan due to its strict anti-hardware export policy. It is known in JGSDF service as Buddy. The Japanese military are very proud of their product and consider this rifle the best of the best!

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n配备独特附件抑制器、垂直握把、反射式瞄具。\n丰和 89 式又叫作 89 式 5.56 毫米步枪，是日本自卫队、日本海岸警卫队特殊警备队和特别突击队所使用的日制突击步枪。由于严格的反硬件出口政策，这种枪从未出口到日本境外。在日本陆上自卫队中，它有着与战友相当的地位。日本军方对自己的产品感到十分自豪，认为这支步枪是万里挑一的杰作！

original.value: Gold Howa Type 89 Custom

translation.value: 黄金版丰和 89 式定制版

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Golden version of Howa Type 89 Custom. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment JCOMP Gen 2 Suppressor, Viking Tactics Vertical Grip, Howa Type 89 Reflex Sight. JCOMP Gen 2 Suppressor, Viking Tactics Vertical Grip, Howa Type 89 Reflex Sight. The Howa Type 89, referred to as the type 89 5.56mm rifle, is a Japanese assault rifle used by the Japan Self-Defense Force, the Japan Coast Guard's Special Security Team units, and the Special Assault Team. It was never exported outside Japan due to its strict anti-hardware export policy. It is known in JGSDF service as Buddy. The Japanese military are very proud of their product and consider this rifle the best of the best!

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 丰和 89 式定制版的黄金版。 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 配备独特附件抑制器、垂直握把、反射式瞄具。 丰和 89 式又叫作 89 式 5.56 毫米步枪，是日本自卫队、日本海岸警卫队特殊警备队和特别突击队所使用的日制突击步枪。由于严格的反硬件出口政策，这种枪从未出口到日本境外。在日本陆上自卫队中，它有着与战友相当的地位。日本军方对自己的产品感到十分自豪，认为这支步枪是万里挑一的杰作！

original.value: M4 Custom

translation.value: M4 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nHas unique attachments M4 CUSTOM Special Suppressor, HALO MiniVert Grip V1, MOD Billet Foregrip V1 and VORTEX VENOM® RED DOT with fast zoom.\nThe M4 Custom is a highly modifiable M4A1 carbine, based on the M16 rifle, that was designed as an ideal rifle for close quarters battle, and was also made to be extremely modular with additional accessories.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：低\n配备独特附件M4 Custom 特别版抑制器、HALO MiniVert 握把版本 1、MOD 金属前握把版本 1 和快速变焦 Vortex Venom 红点瞄具。\nM4 Custom 是在 M16 步枪基础上制造的高度可改装式 M4A1 卡宾枪，其设计最适合近距离战斗，而且极其模块化，能够使用额外的附件。

original.value: ACR CQB Custom

translation.value: ACR CQB Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment Razor HD Gen II 3x Fast Riflescope, ACR CQB Custom Special Silencer, ACR CQB Custom Tactical Grip, ACR CQB Custom Romeo 3 Sight.\n The ACR CQB Custom is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n配备独特附件Razor HD 第 III 代 3 倍快速步枪瞄准镜、ACR CQB 定制版特别版消音器、ACR CQB 定制版战术握把、ACR CQB 定制版 Romeo 3 瞄具。\nACR CQB Custom 是自适应战斗步枪（简称 ACR）的改型，而 ACR 则是美国陆军一项耗资约 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。由雷明顿武器公司负责制造。

original.value: Raid F90 MBR

translation.value: 黑木 F90 MBR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail. Recoil: Medium Special "Raid" version of F90 MBR. Have unique attachment F90 MBR Special Grip. F90 is a lightweight assault rifle manufactured by Thales Australia to provide soldiers with increased firepower in the battlefield.Assault Rifle is well suited for use with amphibious forces, enabling operators to swim with the weapon and fire the weapon immediately and reliably after emergence from the water.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “黑木”特别版 F90 MBR。 配备独特附件F90 MBR 特殊握把。 F90 是一款由 Thales Australia 制造的轻量型突击步枪，旨在为征战沙场的将士提供更强大的火力。这款突击步枪非常适合海陆两栖部队使用，步枪手可以在水中轻松携带此武器并在浮出水面后立即开始射击。

original.value: Raid M134-GAU19b Hybrid

translation.value: 黑木 M134-GAU19b Hybrid

original.value: Innovative hybrid machine gun for SED Special Special "Raid" version of M134-GAU19b Hybrid. Damage: High RPM: High Accuracy: High

translation.value: SED 专属创新型混合机枪 “黑木”特别版 M134-GAU19b Hybrid。 伤害：高 射速：高 精准度：高 这种机枪重量较轻，是专为 SED 战队研制的轻型款，射速快，火力猛。不过，必须随时小心监测这款武器的温度，因为它会比 SED 使用的其他机枪更快出现过热的情况。

original.value: Raid TAVOR TS12 Custom

translation.value: 黑木 TAVOR TS12 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Middle\n Special "Raid" version of Tavor TS12 Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the capability of being configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜。后坐力：中\n“黑木”特别版 TAVOR TS12 Custom。\nTavor TS12 是一款 12 号口径无托型霰弹枪，可经过配置用于左右手弹射和操作。这款导气式枪械配有一个两档导气调节装置和一个短程导气活塞，另外还采用十字栓保险。Tavor TS12 枪体紧凑、易于使用和维护、弹匣容量大，是防御和战术用途的理想选择。

original.value: Raid ACR CQB Custom

translation.value: 黑木 ACR CQB Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Raid" version of F90 MBR. Have unique attachment Razor HD Gen II 4x Fast Riflescope, ACR CQB Custom Special Silencer, ACR CQB Custom Tactical Grip, ACR CQB Custom Romeo 3 Sight. The ACR CQB Custom is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “黑木”特别版 ACR CQB Custom。 配备独特附件Razor HD 第 III 代 3 倍快速步枪瞄准镜、ACR CQB Custom 特别版消音器、ACR CQB Custom 战术握把、ACR CQB Custom Romeo 3v2 瞄具。 ACR CQB Custom 是自适应战斗步枪（简称 ACR）的改型，而 ACR 则是美国陆军一项耗资约 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。由雷明顿武器公司负责制造。

original.value: Raid HK G28

translation.value: 黑木 H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight Special "Raid" version of HK G28. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.< The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 配备独特附件H&K G28 消音器、H&K G28 抑制器、H&K 型垂直握把、Schmidt Bender 3 4.5 倍瞄准镜、Vector Optics Maverick 红点瞄具 “黑木”特别版 H&K G28。 该武器可对改造人造成 50% 的额外伤害。 G28 是民用半自动比赛步枪 MR308 的军用版本。指定射手步枪 DMR 采用成型的 7.62 x 51 口径，可确保 1.5 角分的精准度，同时完全具备夜间作战能力。在 600 米范围内，拥有最大有效射程和高首轮命中率的 H&K G28 还可以在 800 米范围内对人体尺寸的目标进行精准火力压制。

original.value: Samurai FN FAL DSA-58

translation.value: 樱花 FN FAL DSA-58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Samurai" version of FN FAL DSA 58.\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: 附件槽： 导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“樱花”特别版 FN FAL DSA 58。\n美国公司 DSA（David Selveggio Arms）制造了一种名为 DSA-58 的 FAL 复制版，它与 StG-58 使用同样的斯太尔-戴姆勒-普赫生产线设备。民用型号为半自动型，但是军事和执法单位的客户可以选择 620 发/分钟全自动循环速率的选射型号。该型号拥有别具特色的舒适战术握把以及能对四肢造成额外伤害和在远距离造成额外伤害的重型穿甲弹。

original.value: Samurai F90 MBR

AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

The Thompson submachine gun was famously used during the Prohibition era used by law enforcement individuals, marines and mafia criminals.

They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb.

original.value: Samurai Fostech Origin-12

translation.value: 樱花 Fostech Origin-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Samurai" version of Fostech Origin-12. \nProduced by USA-based manufacturer Fostech Outdoors, Origin-12 is considered to be the fastest semi-automatic shotgun in the world. Mainly used for sports and hunting, it packs a substantial punch and can use drum magazines with up to 30 rounds. Combined with the impressive RPM, it can create a real storm of metal downrange.

translation.value: 附件槽： 瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“樱花”特别版 Fostech Origin-12。\n总部位于美国的制造商 Fostech Outdoors 生产的 Origin-12 被认为是世界上最快的半自动霰弹枪。主要用于体育运动和打猎，射击目标时杀伤力十足，而且弹鼓可容纳 30 发子弹。这款武器拥有惊人的射速，能让目标感受真正枪林弹雨的滋味。

original.value: Samurai Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: 樱花 Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special "Samurai" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 配备独特附件Viper MOA、Osprey 9 消音器 “樱花”特别版 Marlin 1894 Custom。 Marlin 1894 是一款经典的杠杆式步枪，操控简单，能够快速射出威力强大的子弹。最初由赫本于 1893 年 8 月 1 日获得专利，1894 式的特点是具有重复发射能力的革命性杠杆系统。1894 式配备一个新的锁紧螺栓和一个两片式撞针，以及一个改进的一体式扳机和一个短接收器，使弹药筒与 1888 和 1889 型号兼容。

original.value: Samurai Benelli M4 Super 90

Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Samurai" version of Benelli M4 Super 90. \n The Benelli M4 Super 90 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: 附件槽：瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中\n“樱花”特别版 Benelli M4 Super 90。\n Benelli M4 Super 90 是一款枪管后坐式半自动反器材步枪，由美国巴雷特武器制造公司研发。作为一款被全球众多单位和军队使用重型 SASR（特殊用途狙击步枪），它也因为使用 .50 BMG（12.7*99 毫米北约弹）而被称作“轻型点五零”。

Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

Special "Samurai" version of Katana. The katana is characterized by its distinctive appearance: a curved, slender, single-edged blade with a circular or squared guard and long grip to accommodate two hands. It has historically been associated with the samurai of feudal Japan and has become renowned for its sharpness and strength.

translation.value: 武士刀 这把刀可击中更远的敌人。 武士刀能造成更大的伤害。 它的二次近战攻击力能干掉身着防刺背心的敌人！ “樱花”特别版武士刀。 独特的外观是武士刀的一大特点：一把纤细、弯曲的单刃刀，带一个圆形或方形的护手，刀柄可容两只手抓握。在历史上，它经常被与日本封建武士联系在一起，以其锋利和力量而知名。

The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 “阿帕奇”特别版 ACR CQB Custom。 配备独特附件Razor HD 第 II 代 4 倍快速步枪瞄准镜、ACR CQB Custom 特别版消音器、ACR CQB Custom 战术握把、ACR CQB Custom Romeo 3 瞄具。 ACR CQB Custom 是自适应战斗步枪（简称 ACR）的改型，而 ACR 则是美国陆军一项耗资约 3 亿美元，旨在为 M16 突击步枪寻求替换枪械的研发计划的产物。由雷明顿武器公司负责制造。

original.value: Premium Samurai AK-12

translation.value: 金龙 AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Premium Samurai version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 金龙特别版 AK-12 配备独特附件AK-12 特别版抑制器、AK-12 特别版消音器、AK-12 特别版握把、Romeo 4 瞄具。 AK-12 是一款现代版突击步枪，用于取代传奇的 AK-74 作为俄军的普遍配发武器。这款武器在它的前身基础上加入了很多改良，包括后坐力控制更佳、适用于各种弹药型号、兼容多种附件以及更出色的人体工程学。该特别版使用 5.45x39 毫米弹药，牺牲一定的精准度，获得了更大的杀伤力和更好的穿透能力。

original.value: Premium Samurai Howa Type 89 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Premium Samurai version of Howa Type 89 Custom Have unique attachment JCOMP Gen 2 Suppressor, Viking Tactics Vertical Grip, Howa Type 89 Reflex Sight. The Howa Type 89, referred to as the type 89 5.56mm rifle, is a Japanese assault rifle used by the Japan Self-Defense Force, the Japan Coast Guard's Special Security Team units, and the Special Assault Team. It was never exported outside Japan due to its strict anti-hardware export policy. It is known in JGSDF service as Buddy. The Japanese military are very proud of their product and consider this rifle the best of the best!

translation.value: 附件槽：导轨、瞄准镜、枪口。后坐力：中 金龙特别版丰和 89 式定制版 配备独特附件JCOMP 第 2 代抑制器、维京人战术垂直握把、丰和 89 式反射式瞄具。 丰和 89 式又叫作 89 式 5.56 毫米步枪，是日本自卫队、日本海岸警卫队特殊警备队和特别突击队所使用的日制突击步枪。由于严格的反硬件出口政策，这种枪从未出口到日本境外。在日本陆上自卫队中，它有着与战友相当的地位。日本军方对自己的产品感到十分自豪，认为这支步枪是万里挑一的杰作！

The Gilboa DBR Snake has two separate barrels, two magazines and two ejection ports — with two triggers as if two rifles had smashed into each other. The two triggers are to make the Snake legal for civilian use in the United States, as We Are the Mighty‘s Blake Stilwell noted, citing ATF regulations for machine guns.
